Reviews.Title: Get this faketv, it's really cool, better than leaving a tv on and saves electricity
Reviews.Author: MDT
Reviews.Content: I went to the website and knew immediately I wanted this.  I bought one for myself and one for a family member.  When I received it, I put it in an upstairs bedroom and partially opened the blinds.  I plugged it in and set the timer to dusk + 7 hours.  Other settings are dusk all nite, dusk + 4 hours, dusk +7, or always on.  That evening, I was outside and was amazed.  It looked like there was a tv on in the bedroom.  It changed light intensity and colors like a real tv.  My wife was appreciative because it gives her an added sense of deterrent which means a lot to me.  What is impressive is that the lighting of the faketv can be extremely bright like any tv would be.  However, the fake tv utilizes intensely bright LEDs that hardly uses any electricity but is a lot less than a regular tv or the high energy consumption that high definition tv uses.  During the day, about 3 blue leds are always on to let you know that it is operating and will turn on at dusk.  I am going to order another one for my mother because I know she would appreciate it.  I would suggest for the best location would be in a window that is not near a street light.

Reviews.Title: Kept My House From Being Broke Into
Reviews.Author: G. Hect "Retired"
Reviews.Content: I bought a Fake TV last year when we went to Florida for the winter.  I also bought/installed 2 Barking Rex motion sensor alarms and installed 4 electronic light timers.  The Fake TV I set up on an electronic timer.We live on a private road with several summer cottages.  While in Florida the neighor across the road (full time resident) and the one next door (summer cottage) got broke into.  Our house was not bothered! When our neighbor came to check on our house he said the Barking Rex scared the crap out of him.  I credit my passive security measures as keeping us from becoming a victim too.The Fake TV and 1 Barking Rex was passed on to my son.  So this year I bought 2 Fake TVs and 2 more Barking Rex alarms while we take an extended vacation.  The new Fake TV now has a timer installed, new and improved.  It can be on full time, come on at dark and stay on for either 4 hours or 7 hours.  There is no need to hook it into a timer.  Nice touch.As a retired police officer I strongly recommend this to anyone that wants to imrove the impression someone is home.  Set it up as instructions indicate to get the best benefit. Add Barking Rex and some light timers and only your neighbors will know you are not home.  We are trying to keep the stranger from breaking in, we trust our neighbors.  The stranger will see the lights coming on and going off, see the Fake TV lights in the window, and if they approach the doors hear a dog barking at them.  Enough to make them move on to a different house.

Reviews.Title: Incredible realism
Reviews.Author: The WB
Reviews.Content: I read about this product a number of months ago, thinking this is a great idea in night time home security.  If it truly worked, as claimed, it would be a great devise to deter someone looking to break in while you are away from home overnight.  I just couldn't see how such a small devise could pull off the illusion quality of a television at night convincingly enough to be accepted as real.Taking the plunge, I purchasing one locally and set it up at home.  My son and wife were also present when we did the first round of testing.  Baseline was our 27" color TV (what the company claims FakeTV is designed to replicate) on in two different rooms.  We went outside and watched for about 5 minutes to see the patterns and brightness of the television coming through the window shades.Next up was FakeTV.  To our amazement, we couldn't tell the difference!  The brightness and patterns looked just like a television being on at night.  The best part -- almost NO power usage, since FakeTV uses hi-intensity LED's for light power.  The timer mechanism of selecting its use are:1) Off totally2) On at dusk (photo-eye operated) for 4 hours3) On at dusk for 7 hours4) On continuously (24/7).I have mine aimed away from the windows, bouncing off a white wall, so there is no way to see the actual unit in operation.  Stealth is the name of the game with this unit.I highly recommend this unit to anyone.  It works so well, I'm going to buy a second unit for a different room in the house.*******4/6/2011 - UpdateI have owned these units for just over a year.  Between my neighbors and myself being out of town for extended periods of time, we have clocked up well over 200 days of use.  The longest was 4(+) months straight this past winter.In a nutshell -- they worked flawlessly. In fact, my neighbor drove to their house from their extended vacation when fake TV was on and commented to his wife "Did you leave the TV on the whole time we were gone?"  He forgot all about setting it up in the front bedroom.  They are still that bright, even after all this use.BTW, my neighbor just bought 2 units for themselves.If you are concerned about durability, our long term test has shown that they will last for the duration. My FakeTV's are just as bright today as the first time we used them.

Reviews.Title: This thing is GREAT!
Reviews.Author: S. W. Cantrell
Reviews.Content: When you unpack it, it is deceptively small.  Aim it at a window and it does the trick!  I have stood for quite a long time watching this thing in my window and my neighbor watching a real tv.  The flashing behavior looks completely real.  It screams "someone's home!!"

Reviews.Title: Works, not as bright as I thought.
Reviews.Author: J. Yoo
Reviews.Content: Bought this to keep the house 'occupied' while away on a trip and the unit seemed surprisingly well made. What I found though was that it didn't seem as bright as I thought it might be. Perhaps this was due to the fact that I tried to use it in my living room instead of a bedroom as pictured on the packaging and that we have fairly thick curtains as well. I think this would be highly effective in an apartment in conjuction with some audio.PS - It always makes my day to know that people find these reviews helpful. So, please vote (The "Was this review helpful to you: Yes or No" buttons) and leave a comment if you'd like, even if it's just to say, Hi!") When you leave a comment, I can go to your reviews and pay you the same courtesy.

Reviews.Title: It does what it says it will.
Reviews.Author: Walter C. Wojciechowski "Reverend Grim Daddy"
Reviews.Content: I have to admit I was a bit skeptical but I figured I would give it a try. Although my intended use for this is not specifically what it was designed for.  I am using it as a prop for television and independent film.  It will be shone on the actors faces to simulate them watching television.  I had my girlfriend go up to my sons room and do a test to see how authentic it looked through the closed curtains.  She set it on top of his TV.  Then to test it she turned on one of the items. I had to guess which it was, the TV or the Fake TV.  I couldn't tell the difference.  When we compared it to the larger TV in the living room it did not shine bright enough to fool me. It works well in smaller rooms to represent a smaller TV. All in all I rate it at a 4star.  If it was a bit brighter I would have given it a 5.

Reviews.Title: Works well
Reviews.Author: B. Pulsipher
Reviews.Content: This devices works as promised.  Only issue is you have to position it where it couldn't be seen through a window (thru the blinds, etc.) or you can easily tell it's not a real TV.  Probably better for 2nd story windows because of this.  Very happy though.

Reviews.Title: Needs to be brighter.
Reviews.Author: C. Vance
Reviews.Content: I borrowed one of these from my neighbors when I was gone for a couple of weeks.After night fell I turned it on then went outside. I couldn't tell it was on. I went inside and turned it so it faced the window. Then I could tell it was on, but could also see its lights through the drapes which would have given it away.I solved the problem by facing it away from the window then pointing it at a movie screen I had. Then when I went outside and checked, it appeared a TV was on. You could probably get the same results by pointing it at a large sheet of very white cardboard.Also the model they had was on all the time so I plugged it into a timer.If they'd put in brighter LEDs and a timer I'd give this five stars.

Reviews.Title: Great little device - wish it was more sensitive
Reviews.Author: Mattie's friend "offshore1"
Reviews.Content: Received this product in a timely manner, and it was just as advertised.  It really does look as though there is a real TV on when viewed from outside.  My wife wasn't too impressed when she first saw it, but then it went on and she's now a believer.  I do wish it didn't need the room to be quite so dark before it starts though.  I can see where this really would work as a burglar deterrent given that any little doubt would cause the thief to move to an easier appearing target.  A red LED status light when in the dusk + 4 hour mode, and blue when in the dusk + 7 mode.  I would purchase this fake TV again.________________I recently loaned this fake TV to my niece who went to family reunion in Minnesota for five days.  She set it up, in an upstairs bedroom. When she returned one of her neighbors thought she had canceled the trip.  This because of what appeared to be activity in the house.  She also had a regular light on a timer downstairs.  It was the fake TV that did the trick.  My niece and the neighbor both now have a fake TV. The neighbors - and a possible potential thief - thought someone was home.  That's the point of this valuable little item.

Reviews.Title: Awesome product!!
Reviews.Author: N. Luu "NL"
Reviews.Content: This little device is great! When I first received it, I thought it was missing something because the device is tiny! I was thinking it would be the size of a toaster or toaster oven but it's more along the size of a Rubik's cube. But don't let the size fool you! After I set it up, I went outside to see how it looks and it looks exactly like a TV is on! I actually bought 2 units and I have them on at different times -- one for the main floor and one for upstairs. The great thing about this device is that you don't have to set it up where there is a real TV (someone from outside doesn't know which rooms you have a TV in!).There are a few settings for how long the device is on based on the built in light sensor. I can't completely recall from memory but I believe they are dusk + 4 hours, dusk + 6 hours, and always on. I have my downstairs unit set to dusk + 4 hours. And I have my upstairs unit set to always on, but I have it plugged into another timer which has it come on around 9pm and off at midnight.Anyway, if you are worried about home security and want comfort when you are out of town -- BUY THIS PRODUCT! It is awesome and looks so real!

Reviews.Title: Simple and sound
Reviews.Author: Cycle Guy
Reviews.Content: this is a really great device. I've been using it for a few days now and it works as advertised. The LEDs consume very little electricity yet when pointed at a window with minimal drapery, completely illuminate the room with varying shades of color when viewed from outdoors.A wonderful idea that is easy to use and works well.

Reviews.Title: Great deterrent, looks like your home watching TV
Reviews.Author: J. Martin "J Martin"
Reviews.Content: I have these devices in my great room and upstairs bedroom.  I ordered another one for my 74 year old mother that lives alone.  Uses hardly any power to operate unlike a real TV.

Reviews.Title: Operates Fine
Reviews.Author: CarolD
Reviews.Content: The fake TV Burglar Deterrent operates as advertised, but isn't quite as bright as I expected. I moved it closer to a window (out of sight of course)and it looks more believable when viewed from the street.

Reviews.Title: a good device
Reviews.Author: Seek Felicity
Reviews.Content: For a long time I would turn on a television and several lamps when I went out to make the house appear more occupied than it was.  I don't like wasting energy but who wants to deal with a burglarized home?  I was skeptical but pleased to find the fake television device.I use the device on the second floor of my home and, from the outside, it looks like a real television is on inside.  The flashing colors are completely randomized and fade in and out and resemble the workings of a tv.  One of the negatives of the device is that if you had the device on a first floor, I believe it would be much easier to identify that it wasn't the real deal.  On the second floor, however, it is not possible for someone to analyze the shape of the fake tv (which is quite small -- see image gallery for a better idea of what I mean).Another potential negative for users is the thickness of your curtains. My curtains are thick and thick curtains will obstruct the light from the fake television.  You will either need to open the curtains partially or utilize curtains that are of a less dense material.Yet another consideration is that the fake tv requires an outlet to operate. You cannot place batteries in the unit.  If you are going away for an extended period and the electricity goes out, the device is not going to be operational.Despite the issues raised in this review, I do like this tool.  I like that it saves electricity and that it is easily portable. Initially, I was annoyed that I spent so much on something so small but it does seem to fulfill what it is made to do. It has three settings of operation so you can set it and forget it.  I would consider buying this for someone with an unrented property or vacant/vacation home.This product is made in Malaysia.

Reviews.Title: Plenty Bright
Reviews.Author: Patrick Laughlin
Reviews.Content: Perhaps because I have just ordered the fake TV and the company now has a brighter version - mine is plenty bright.  I compared my 50" plasma with the fake TV by stepping outside my home about 50 feet and looking at my windows with blinds and the fake TV is actually brighter.  Whether or not this will deter determined burglars is another question. Probably any deterent is worth a few bucks. I plan to use mine with a timer, turning it on at 6 p.m. & off at midnight.

Reviews.Title: a brief amateurish demonstration
Reviews.Author: Louie the Italian Jew "Lou da Joo"

} } } Length:: 1:15 MinsI've compared the FakeTV to my next door neighbor's real TV from the outside, and couldn't tell the difference. The only downfall I see with this product is obviously it only works at night. I think one must really consider their living area. This will definitely work a lot better for those that have an upstairs. The downfall I see with this product is that you would need to have your house lights go out at night, so if you're away for several days you'd need a timer, so you could have your interior lights on during the day.Note: in the brief demonstration, I pointed the FakeTv at about a 60 degree angle away from where I was filming. Anyway, I'm sure somebody can make a better demonstration, but I tried my best with what I had to give an idea of what this product can do.

Reviews.Title: Works!
Reviews.Author: JuJu Bee
Reviews.Content: It really works as the other reviewers stated.  Even when I first enter the house, it looks like the tv is on.

Reviews.Title: Fake TV Works Great
Reviews.Author: BZ
Reviews.Content: The Fake TV really works well.  It is very small, but puts out TV simulated light.  It really looks like the TV is on from the outside of the house.

Reviews.Title: Small Size, small power usage, timer has problems.
Reviews.Author: Douglas Blakkolb
Reviews.Content: I was surprised how small this unit is, the face is only 20% larger than a credit card and it is only 60 mm (2.5 inches) deep.  Not a bad thing because it doesn't take up much room.  I has an autotimer the comes on at dusk and stays on for 4 or 7 hours.  I set my for 4 hours, it came on at dusk but was still on 6 hours later?  I plugged the unit into a wall timer and set the faketv to the 'always on' setting and let the wall timer do the work.  I have mini-blinds and with a street light only 30 meters (100 feet) away from the window. I had to place the faketv 1 meter (3 feet) away from the window so it is bright enough to view from the street. When I stand in front of my house and watch the neighbors 'real tv's' flash on their front windows and I look at my faketv flashing it does a good job but I can tell the difference.  The patterns of the faketv are not as rapid and quick changing as a real tv, blame it on MTV for the quick changing patterns of modern tv programming.  That being said it will probably fake out anyone just casing the neighborhood and is an excellent tool to supplement the other security measure in your home.  I am considering getting another unit to place in a back bedroom for a similar effect.

Reviews.Title: Don't leave home without it
Reviews.Author: Opal aloha
Reviews.Content: It really does look like a TV flickering!Takes some trial and error to figure out a perfect placement--put it where someone looking in a window can't easily see it, and direct it toward a wall or ceiling to light up the room.  The second floor of a home is best.The sensor is very sensitive to light, so if you choose to use the setting which has the device go on after dark, you've got to make sure you don't leave a lamp on where it can fool the sensor into thinking it's still light outside.  Or you can set it to the "on" position and use an intermittent light timer and your house really looks occupied with the lights going on and off and the TV blasting away.  And we leave NPR radio on too because it has classical music and sometimes conversations, so it really sounds like a TV.Why don't we just put a TV on you say?  Well, I guess we could, but we've got a wall mounted giant screen TV and this doesn't use as much electricity.  Again, also looks convincing on the 2nd floor in the bedroom as if we are doing some late night viewing.I'd highly recommend this item!

Reviews.Title: Great, while it works
Reviews.Author: TEMS Medic
Reviews.Content: I have two of these.  The second one is on it's way back to Amazon after it quit working.  Using the other's power cord, it is clear that it is the unit itself that went bad, not it's power supplySometimes, it works great, realistic flickering, but at times, it seems to pause, and hang up in one mode, with no flickering of the lights for a couple minutes.  One of the reviewers complained that it couldn't be used on a first floor.  We have the vertical blinds closed on the first floor, as they would be at night, and the flickering looks very realistic... when it flickers, and in the unit that works.I use this on a vacation home.  On Ebay I ordered some Brinks window stickers, and a yard sign.  I hope that they are more of a deterrent than the lame generic fake signs available commercially

Reviews.Title: Works as Advertised
Reviews.Author: Bostonia
Reviews.Content: Does what its supposed to do, looks very real from outside.....only problem is on a cloudy day it turns on automatically during the day.....

Reviews.Title: Works Great
Reviews.Author: Jon A. Parr
Reviews.Content: Worked just as advertised...great product and works well for the small investment! Product is even smaller than I first anticipated, but lights up our entire bedroom.

Reviews.Title: Great Idea
Reviews.Author: J. GEHRKE "mad city"
Reviews.Content: There are many reasons to make your house look like it's actively engaged with human occupants. My brother had recommended it, but from his description I expected domething the size of a 15 inch TV! I was surprised at the size and amazed by the effects. It's no bigger than an old-school portable GPS unit. Find a place in your house where the sunlight isn't too muted in the afternoon and the "Dusk + 4" or "Dusk + 7" settings work like a charm. Or use a simple lamp timer for your own timed effects.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Neil D.
Reviews.Content: This is a great product.  Truly does simulate the light from a TV.  If this hold up well I'll be 100% satisfied with it.  Vastly less expensive than leaving a TV on and much simpler as well with the built-in optional 4 or 7 hour after darkness operating time choices.  Great shipper as well, very quick.  Not a single complaint and plenty of praise so far.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Random Dude
Reviews.Content: I've ordered two now and they work great. Looks just like a tv from the outside with my cellular blinds. Mine comes on at dusk and stays on for 7 hours. Other settings allow constant on, dusk + 4 hours, or off. The item is quite small..which is nice.  No larger than a medium sized fist.  Your blinds must allow light to pass through (so wood or plastic blinds will not work well) for the light to be visible from the outside.  Put on a second floor with no window covers would work too.

Reviews.Title: Great purchase!
Reviews.Author: Jim
Reviews.Content: This is my second FakeTV FTV-10 Burglar Deterrent. I have found that over the past week they have been very effective at keeping the burglars away. They have significantly reduced my ammunition costs, and should pay for themselves in no time...

Reviews.Title: A little extra safety
Reviews.Author: K. Gedgaudas
Reviews.Content: I work night shifts, so I always worry that my house is dark and empty at night.  I have a couple of lamps on timers...and have actually set my TV to turn on and off, but that felt like a waste of energy.  This little guy does a great job at replicating the lights of a TV (although since it is in my living room, I wish it was a little brighter...maybe the next generation could have a brighter/dimmer option to adjust for the room size...minus half of a star).  The 4 hour/7 hour/on option is great, and it doesn't come on until the room is dark.  My only other wish was that the cord was a little longer so that I had a little more room to play with where I set it up (minus a half star).  Delivery was quick, and it is ready to use right out of the box.  Overall, a nice little "extra" security that makes my nights at work less stressful.

Reviews.Title: Works well, and I use it regularly.
Reviews.Author: JPW
Reviews.Content: This is one of those gimmicky items that you buy, and you're not sure if you'll use it or toss it in a drawer and forget about it. Well, in this case, I have to admit that I do use this device regularly. I really like the settings which allows you to set the device to operate for 4 or 8 hours after dusk. It seems a bit expensive, but still one of the cheaper forms of home protection available.

Reviews.Title: It Really does look like a 27inch HDTV in the dark room.
Reviews.Author: kindred spirit
Reviews.Content: I found out about this in an email about how to protect your home. I went to the website and watched the video. Then came to Amazon.com for the unit at the same price but free shipping. I set it up right away and when I went out to see how it looked my neighbors where out by the window. We were all amazed that it indeed looks like a tv is on in the room. Coupled with music playing it says you are home.The LEDs use very little electricity so it is cost effective. What I really like is it is also a great night light to go into this room at night and find something. It is flashing but it doesn't hurt your eyes...well I guess if you stared at it then yes it may. But just to go into the room to get something it is fine. It makes no noise and it is very small. It looks like a car headlight in the picture but more like the size of a small fist.For the piece of mind and the price your really cannot go wrong. I am very satisfied and the seller shipped it in 2 days and packed it well.

Reviews.Title: Works Great!
Reviews.Author: Joseph
Reviews.Content: Works great!  It is very bright and the light looks just like a television is on.  I don't use it every night, just on random nights, even nights that I'm home, so that when I use it when I'm away it doesn't appear as if anything is out of the ordinary.  The product itself is small, which is nice, as it doesn't take up too much space or get in the way.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Lu
Reviews.Content: Item came on time. It does not feel or look flimsy. I set it up on a second floor bedroom and compared it with my TV in the living room, as well as my neighbors. You can't tell the difference. I would definitely recommend it. It seems to give more light output than my flat screen and old (big) TV, but that's even better. I just played with different locations to find the right one.

Reviews.Title: I wouldn't break into my house now...
Reviews.Author: WorldTraveler "world traveler"
Reviews.Content: I travel a lot - and a "light on a timer" doesn't hold a candle to this... I recommended it to my friends that travel (needless to say they just laughed, but i tried...)

Reviews.Title: Homebound 'Recluse' Watches TV?
Reviews.Author: William S. Hogate "Dixidude"
Reviews.Content: This is a very smart invention that does what it promises.  I suppose one could puta TV on a timer...but why subtract some life from your flat screen TV?  This deviceappears in a darkened room to be a COLOR TV!  Professional house-sitters:  thisdevice is a must/added client value.

Reviews.Title: Innovative product
Reviews.Author: KR "InfoSeeker"
Reviews.Content: I've used this a few times since purchasing it and it does a great job.  It really adds to other security items such as light timers but I wish it were a bit brighter.  If you have it pointing at a window you can see it outside but only if it's very dark in and out.  It is a good product and adds to an overall security regimen but consider buying more than one for better protection.

Reviews.Title: WAY better than Reality TV
Reviews.Author: eternalgreenknight "Chris"
Reviews.Content: About the same substance as Reality TV, and doesn't use as much energy.  After family members have watched enough Reality TV (trust me, you'll know when), simply substitute this, and they won't be able to tell the difference as it provides the same level of stimulus to a brain that has turned to mush!  As a bonus, you'll save money on your electric bill.  Oh, sure, you could also use it as a criminal deterrent for when you aren't home...

Reviews.Title: Fake TV
Reviews.Author: Gord Petracek
Reviews.Content: This is an amazing device! As a retired  police officer I am very security conscious. Finding home security devices that work and that I would recommend are few and far between, but this small device is brilliant! It can be set to come on automatically at dusk for, 4 to 7 hours. It looks exactly like someone is at home watching TV. It emits bright changing colors that flicker and oscillate just like a TV! It's well constructed and durable. It works exactly as described. Just plug it in and leave it. I have been to thousands of home burgularies and its always devasting to people! This little device is one step to protecting your home and having it appear occupied, which is a great deterrent to criminals! In 31 years as a police officer I have never seen such a device until now, finding it on Amazon.  I highly recommend this to everyone. If it saves you the grief and expense of a break-in, it pays for itself with peace of mind. Put some lights on timers and use this fake TV, looks like someone is home. The product was also sent  in a very timely fashion and well packaged!  GP

Reviews.Title: AMAZING PRODUCT
Reviews.Author: Maximilian
Reviews.Content: The Fake TV Burglar Deterrent is small, compact, and performs as advertised.  The changing light output of this electronic device, when the device is activated inside the house and strategically placed in a room that has a window with the blinds drawn at night, is very convincing.... A passerby would think that someone inside the house is either watching television or has fallen asleep in front of the TV.  The only drawback (if you can call it that) is if a desperate burglar gets close enough to the window and hears no TV sound, which may prompt him to revisit the same location two or three nights in a row to validate his suspicion of a decoy, and then decide whether to break in or not.  Additional Burglar deterrents, such as a live or electronic guard dog, a real or fake security camera, as well as security signs would probably reduce the chances of a burglar targeting your property.

Reviews.Title: Overpriced for what it is
Reviews.Author: Wumlet
Reviews.Content: The fake TV burglar deterent is a great idea, don't get me wrong. This unit, however, is smaller than what I expected, so it doesn't throw as much of a glow through my window curtains as I would like. I was expecting a larger unit that would glow brighter than this product does. Also, I don't think the light changing pattern matches what the TV screen would be doing - the lights change but more slowly than I would have expected. I will keep the product and use it, even though I would have liked a brighter, quicker changing pattern of lights on a larger unit for this price. It works, just not as well as I thought it would. I'm glad this product has been made, but I will wait to buy a second one once I see an improved version.

Reviews.Title: Fake TV
Reviews.Author: Gary W
Reviews.Content: Absolutely love it. We are retired and travel frequently. This works exactly as advertised.  Two of our neighbors have purchased one after seeing how realistic it is.

Reviews.Title: Fake TV
Reviews.Author: Kingsley Elbert
Reviews.Content: Everything as advertised. Projects the image of a flickering TV. I have two homes and this presents the effect that someone is home and the home is being lived in. I will purchase another for my second home. This is not a toy. It does the job.

Reviews.Title: Plenty bright, engineered well!
Reviews.Author: Swamp Fox
Reviews.Content: I placed the Fake TV on a second floor bedroom about 2 feet from some 2 inch white slat blinds, closed tight. From the outside it looks like a very bright tv is on in that bedroom. I think I can move it away from the window and place it on a dresser but will have to experiment with the changing light conditions since it operates on a photocell when in the 4 or 7 hour run position. There are 4 settings to choose, off, on all the time, 4 hour photocell controlled, and 7 hour photocell controlled. Additionally, when in 4 hour function and not yet operatingin tv mode, a red led lights up. 7 hour function gives you a blue led until the photocell picks up enough darkness to turn the unit on to tv mode ( same as the 4 hour). I thought that was a nice feature to add. The unit itself and the DC power cord are all made well. Good job to the engineering team who put this product together.

Reviews.Title: Great safety device
Reviews.Author: D.Williams
Reviews.Content: We travel frequently and use this whenever we go out of town.  Just place it in front of your TV set (or anywhere not directly visible from the window/doors) select your setting for how long it should be on, and let 'er rip.  I've gone outside to view it and it looks very realistic.  Recommended

Reviews.Title: A Little Wonder
Reviews.Author: Leon Z Newman
Reviews.Content: Small & can sit on a shelf. Works well as described - really believable from outside. Great auto timer starts from sundown. This is the second one of these I have purchased- they both work well. Highly Recommended.

Reviews.Title: Amazing simulation of television.
Reviews.Author: Twin Papa
Reviews.Content: I was doubtful of this product but when I plugged it in and went outside, I couldn't tell the difference from when this was on to when the actual television was on.Sure if you can peek in and see this thing it defeats the purpose but hello people, curtains!  If your curtains/shades block someone from looking in, but you can still see the indirect light from this device, I think any potential burglar would really think twice.I used this in combination with a randomized timer to really simulate the television going on/off at different times on different days.

Reviews.Title: Fake TV
Reviews.Author: H. Alanis
Reviews.Content: The product arrived on time and in good condition.  It works extremely well and definitely gives the illusion that the TV is on ( I guess it is up to the would-be criminal to assume that someone is watching TV).  I continue to recommend to my friends and family. I have purchased 2 in the last 9 months.

Reviews.Title: Works as advertised
Reviews.Author: Blue Hen
Reviews.Content: I plugged it into a timer because the standard settings did not meet my needs.  Also, you wouldn't want to be next to it while it is running in a dark room.  No one would ever guess that it is a little light and not an actual television.It works best when projected against  white mini blinds.  Doesn't project as well when no blinds are present.

Reviews.Title: FakeTV a winner.
Reviews.Author: Don Pendergraft
Reviews.Content: This is very effective, no one can go wrong in their purchase of this device. I went outside after dark to see the effects... it's exactly like someone is home viewing TV. It's especially effective if you plug FakeTV into a digital, timer like the Itermatic DT620CL where you can vary on's and off's of FakeTV activity. A winner! Make sure only the light of FakeTV or your actual TV set cannot be seen through any window. Don't choose to mimic a TV that people have normally been accustomed to seeing through a window, choose a TV that people have only been able to see the light from the TV set.

Reviews.Title: grrreat little light
Reviews.Author: dreamr
Reviews.Content: The fake tv is small and easy to use and the light is so neat to watch (from the side or back). The room has to be dark but it works just like it says. From outside really looks like tv is on. Great for snowbirds or just making your house look inhabited while you're gone. Nice to have a light on when you come home late.

Reviews.Title: trust me....just buy it!
Reviews.Author: lucy
Reviews.Content: don't you love it when you buy something and it turns out to be just what you hoped? i can't get over this cool thing. it is really little, but it looks exactly like your tv is on and someone is home. (it's great that we have these reviews to check. i wouldn't have bought it without reading here first)

Reviews.Title: Fake TV a real great idea.
Reviews.Author: Brooks7
Reviews.Content: Thank you for your product.  It puts my mind at ease knowing it gives the appearance of someone being home watching TV.  Thanks again.  Satisfied customer.

Reviews.Title: Clever idea... especially before everybody owns one
Reviews.Author: Gary
Reviews.Content: Clever idea, satisfactorily executed. I assume white LED's are brighter than the colored ones, so the impact they lend to the combined light explains why they're so many white and only a few colored ones. ... Still, creates a very satisfactory illusion.I find the concept and achieved illusion very amusing... but effective and well invented.I bet these will be less effective when they've sold millions and the 'bad-guys' are no longer fooled (like household timers)... but still seems very effective.

Reviews.Title: Burgular preventor
Reviews.Author: Larry Bloomer
Reviews.Content: Good product.  It works perfectly.  It is very sentive to even low light though, so a distant hall light will make it go off and then it will reset itself to start the time all over again when the light is out.There seems like something loose inside it.  A big clunking sound if you move it side to side.  I stopped moving it for fear of braking it.  I don't believe it was made to have something knocking around in it. Warranty?Looks great from outside the house; just like a TV is on inside.  Maybe the thieves or neighbors will come over while we're out and watch "TV"!L.

Reviews.Title: Fake tv burglar deterrent Review
Reviews.Author: eagle
Reviews.Content: This little device is amazing!It really does work.It mimics the output of a TV set giving the impression from anyone outside that there is someone watching TV.Quality construction.Just plug it in, set it to on, Dusk plus 4 hours, or Dusk plus 7 hours.Priced right.Great addition to one's security system.Thumbs up for this product.

Reviews.Title: I like it---
Reviews.Author: EJans "EJans"
Reviews.Content: I would have given this unit stars if it had the ability to be on from dusk to dawn etc. Statistically most break-ins happen between 3-4:30am, so thus ill have to put it on a seperate timer to reach those times. Overall i think its a great invention. It does look like the tv is ON which is the goal. It hardly cost nothing to run per year which is great. We use it when we are home as well and have it in one of the rooms. Which serves too as a great night light as well. Casting enough light to make it to the rest room. I laugh to myself on this because its a clever idea but like anything. If you can add a good watch dog, outdoor motion lighting, have a gun, install securty with cameras too with a few signs. With all these 99% of the bad guys will most certainly go down to the street.

Reviews.Title: Fake TV is realistic.
Reviews.Author: Richard D. Pugh "The Engineer"
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Fake TV after I read about it in Reader's Digest as another deterrent to buglars. Following the instructions that came with the product resulted an a realistic simulation of an operating TV in the house without the electricity use of a TV.  Be sure to place it where it cannot be seen through the string pass-thru openings in blinds. I use it in conjunction with lights on a timer and an active, monitored security system.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Idea!
Reviews.Author: J. Preece
Reviews.Content: A truly ingenious idea and well-executed product.  It does exactly as described- from an outside window it makes it look like a large TV is on in a room.This little box is surprisingly bright and uses a rather complex algorithm to simulate a real television's light output.  As long as someone from the outside can't actually see the device (place it carefully) there is no way they could not tell it's a Fake TV.I really like the on-at-dusk feature and the 4-hr or 7-hr program times.All around, this is just a great idea and a perfect compliment to your home security.  For the price, seriously, it's worth it (even if you don't travel much but regularly get home after dark).  Let the bad guy think someone is home and he's going to go somewhere else.

Reviews.Title: Great Item
Reviews.Author: Bruce Murray On Travel "Murray On Travel"
Reviews.Content: This unit works as advertised.  Bought it for my Sister, but considering getting another one for myself.

Reviews.Title: Not bright enough
Reviews.Author: NeoEngineer
Reviews.Content: 1. This thing is not bright enough.  As many other reviewers have said, it is relatively dim.2. Very cheaply made.  For the price of $35, I would be expecting MUCH MORE quality.  This honestly feels like a $3 toy at one of those gag stores at the mall.3.  The 4-way switch is super cheap.  It is very difficult to set into one of its 4 positions.  You have to slide it ever so slightly or else you will easily over shoot the setting you intended.  If you slide it too hard, it feels like it could very easily break.4.  The 4 way switch is for 4 modes:  A. Off  B. Light sensor on + 4hr runtime  C. Light sensor on + 7hr runtime  D. OnThe light sensor is crap.  I tried covering it with my hand and also going into our pitch dark walk-in closet and neither would activate it.  So, that feature is pretty much useless.Overall, don't waste your money.  Normally, we just use the timer on our flat screen TV's but we recently cut off our cable TV to limit viewing and it's expensive.

Reviews.Title: Fake TV for Security  - Not bad!
Reviews.Author: Jon J. Sanserino
Reviews.Content: It does what it says - make it look as if a TV is on in the room when viewed from outside.  I had this concept in my head for many years, I was glad to see someone actually make it.A lot of light comes out of this little device - it is only about 3x4".  Although it has a photocell, I use it on a timer, as I don't think that most people start watching TV at sundown.My only complaint is that I feel that it is relatively expensive. It should be no more than $19.95 - they would sell a lot more.  Because of the price I probably won't recommend it to my friends.

Reviews.Title: Fake TV works great!!
Reviews.Author: S. Nye
Reviews.Content: I purchased the "fake TV Light" after several break ins in our urban neighborhood.  I put the light in a back window that faces the alley.  It goes on automatically  and turns off in 7 hours.  Has other settings too.  The light emits a flicker of various tones that looks exactly like a TV.  It looks like someone is home watching a late night show without turning on your actual TV or using alot of electricity.  Anyone observing my home wiould assume that someone is HOME and AWAKE.  A good crime deterrent.

Reviews.Title: Excellent low-cost security tool!
Reviews.Author: P. Romero "Shoppier than the shoppiest shopper."
Reviews.Content: I have a pretty robust home security system, but speaking as a person who also deals with home security systems for a living, there are drawbacks.  The fact that thieves will still break in knowing there's a window of time before authorities arrive being the main one.With that said, one important element in home security is giving the impression that you're home.Light timers are a great addition to the house, but the actual "feel" of someone being home comes from the impression that there is activity going on in the house.  What better activity than the most common at-home pastime?This device is incredible at giving the impression that a TV is on for a fraction of the cost of leaving your actual TV on.  It features a light sensor and timer so it's not always running and is a very compact and easy-to-store little unit.I can't recommend this device highly enough in terms of value and usefulness.  It's a must-buy for anyone who spends evenings away from home or just comes home after dark and would like a little peace of mind when they get in.

Reviews.Title: Ok Product, but it's very small and the light emitted is weak.
Reviews.Author: eric albert "eric albert"
Reviews.Content: The product arrived in fine shape. However, it is tiny and the light emitted from it is not very visible from outside the house.

Reviews.Title: outstanding!!
Reviews.Author: DaveS
Reviews.Content: great product, very quick delivery - seems to be backed by a buch of guys who really care about their products. works very well, and the +4 and +7 timers are great .. what that means is that the unit will go on at dusk and stay on for either 4 hours past that (if the switch is in one position) and then turn off (e.g. like someone shutting off their TV to sleep), or go on at dusk and stay on for 7 hours past that (switch in the other position).  There's also a regular "on" setting for timer use or manual operation. the unit also lights an LED depending on the timer switch (one is red LED and the other BLUE LED) so you can confirm at a glance that you have it set the way you want it.the look is extremely realistic and the light is plenty bright.  and, the unit is nice and compact and the power cord is sufficiently long.one key is to make sure you can't see the unit directly from the outside. I ended up placing it on a window shelf in a 2nd floor room, and placing a box between it and the window, and then one on either side as well (I suppose I could just cut one side off a single box and use that as well, like a diorama would be) -- this ensured the light was not directly visible, and casts a shadow on the window that looks like the light is coming from the back of a TV.  I'm sure you could project it onto a wall facing the window, or other possibilities as well.sure it could be a little less expensive, but the price isn't prohibitive, and the company seems to promise great support as well (e.g. will send a new one if there's any trouble, etc).  and, for the money, it's a great additional deterrent and good value.highly recommended!!! (and I have nothing to do at all with the company, I just think they did a great job with this one!).

Reviews.Title: FakeTV
Reviews.Author: Kevin
Reviews.Content: This is a really good device for those who have weekend homes and primary home, we set our to come on at dusk for 4-7 hours and it really works and looks like somebody is home, brilliant idea.

Reviews.Title: Great idea and works like a charm...
Reviews.Author: Sunshine "Independent Traveler"
Reviews.Content: I wish I had thought of this, but I'm not a techie. Works great and really simulates real TV lights. Lv the fact it takes little electricity and has different settings. I leave it on all the time with the on at dusk for four hours setting...Also purchased Rex Plus doggie alarm. What a great combo. Rex sounds like our dog that went cuckoo every time the door bell rang. Makes me homesick for her, but scares the delivery guys. I always apologize to them for my crazy dog that just I put in the garage (turned off Rex). I also bought beware of dog signs for the windows. With Fake TV, Rex and the signs, I feel that snatch and grab burglars will pick easier prey, and I also feel safe and rather proud of myself. Thanks to these inventive product producers.STI ED-50 Rex Plus Electronic Watchdog, Barking Dog Alarm

Reviews.Title: smaller than expected
Reviews.Author: Chuck L.
Reviews.Content: The unit is used when we go out of town and want the house to appear occupied. This is an added level of security along with multiple lights on timers.  Any one wanting their home to appear occupied while they are away can use this item.

Reviews.Title: A great security enhancement.
Reviews.Author: Inman
Reviews.Content: Does exactly what it advertizes. From outside, looks EXACTLY like a TV is on in the room. Simple, cheap, effective. Highly recommend!

Reviews.Title: Fake TV FTV - 10 Review
Reviews.Author: t.a.
Reviews.Content: When i received the package i found it packed well and was surprised at the small size of the Fake TV Unit. After plugging it in and seeing how bright and animated it was i was anxious to see how it performed. When evening fell and i positioned it on an end table the surprise came. I walked out to the street and watched my dark house from several locations(much like a home invader or thief might do ). I was very impressed with the look the unit gave and i am pleased with it 100 %. A fake TV playing in the house is much better than a light on in a window. A potential thief wants to hit fast and go.........with the possibility that someone is up late watching TV that may not happen. It makes a person wonder if you are awake versus being sound asleep.We now plug it in and it operates from when we retire for the night until we turn it off in the a m . I realize that it is just one of many steps you can take to keep your name off the victims list. If it keeps a home invader from targeting my home it will be worth much more than the list price. The Fake TV is a good deal and gives me added peace of mind.Thanks for reading my first review on Amazon and stay safe. T.A.

Reviews.Title: So far it does what it is supposed to do
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I bought this item a little over a month ago.  It turns on at dusk and from outside the house it does look like a tv is on in the room. I can't vouch for its longevity, but I am happy with its performance so far.

Reviews.Title: Looks like an actual TV from outside -- Price high -- other modes don't really work as I would expect them to.
Reviews.Author: Robelek
Reviews.Content: The first thing I will say about this is the price; a bit high. I think it should be about 7 to 10 dollars lower but I think the company that bought this product really wanted to make a lot of money and who doesn't.I will post photos later on. There are 4 modes:Off -- Dusk + 4 hours -- Dusk + 7 hours -- ON all the time.I go for the latter option. When I choose any of the other modes, I notice that it is not consistent. I am sure someone will be bound to correct me on this. It would make more sense to have a random mode, such as the person is watching TV, goes to bed, gets up for a snack, watches a little TV, goes to bed. From the outside, I would think this person really needs to have a sleep study.The manufacturer even recommends plugging this into a timed outlet, such as the one I bought from (can't believe I'm plugging them . . . GE  . . . . blah!) but "GE 15154 Random On/Off 7-Day Digital Timer, White"  I haven't used this yet but I hope it does work . . .AMAZON. You in theory, set a time like 5pm on the GE Timer and have this little puppy already plugged into the GE plug and turned to the ON position. At that time, the Fake TV starts blaring away and the burglars are tricked into thinking you are an avid TV watcher.Though, if I saw this from the outside, I would think, 'Great, they're too busy watching TV. I can go in now and they won't see me' Just Great!I also bought for my house AutoChron for my light switches and lots of IP cameras from Panasonic. I think you can't go wrong there.

Reviews.Title: Not bright enough / need to open blinds / suitable for 2nd floor and up
Reviews.Author: S. MYDUR
Reviews.Content: ProsProduct idea, quality, simulation are good.ConsSuitable for 2nd and above floors(Apts/rooms etc).Light is not bright enough, so you need to keep open window blinds or curtain

Reviews.Title: It looks like TV, but is it HD?
Reviews.Author: frogstomper
Reviews.Content: I was a little iffy about ordering this item, but since we are away from our home a lot I thought I would give it a try.  The reviews were all around the compass as to effectiveness, but they all said that the little light box works well.I can see how it is perfect for a two or three story home, and that it has it's drawbacks in a single story situation -- which is what we have.At first I was aiming the light directly at the front window (venetian blinds) and if I moved my head around a bit I could catch the flickering light in a direct view thru the little slits in the slats of the blinds.  However, around the edges of the blinds I could not see the light directly, and the flicker off the walls was an exact mimic of a TV set.So, I decided to turn the light toward one of the inside walls...90+ degrees away from the front window, and I placed a potted plant between the light and the window (sitting on a coffee table).  From the outside all I could see then was the flicker of the light as it danced off the walls, and the potted plant covered any direct view of the light.  It works perfectly...!!!A few days ago my motion sensing barking dog, REX, arrived from Amazon.com (read my review).  These two gadgets working together while we are gone will give us a bit more confidence that we will come back to our home the way we left it.  We think our neighborhood is safe anyway, but you never know.  It's good to have something like this to help "guard" the premises.I also have a fan in another room that is set to go on and off at various times with a timer.  It blows toward the drapes moving them a little.  Just a little more feeling of security, but the FAKE TV light and the barking REX are the real deterrents.

Reviews.Title: Works as described - but didn't use the dusk setting
Reviews.Author: jalmquist
Reviews.Content: This works great - looks like a real TV from the outside.  One suggestion is to hook this thing up to a timer outlet and not rely on the dusk settings.  This worked well for me.  I've heard complaints about the dusk settings not really working that great, but cannot comment on this functionality because I never used it.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Nick "nick102"
Reviews.Content: This is a great product. Truly does simulate the light from a TV. If this hold up well I'll be 100% satisfied with it. Vastly less expensive than leaving a TV on and much simpler as well with the built-in optional 4 or 7 hour after darkness operating time choices. Great shipper as well, very quick. Not a single complaint and plenty of praise so far.

Reviews.Title: Works very well
Reviews.Author: E. Wilson
Reviews.Content: I travel a lot for business and otherwise, so I wanted to get a lamp timer to help ward off creepers. That is, until I found this handy little gadget. All I can say is no complaints and that it works as advertised. I had this one 18-day trip, and my neighbor who's a little snoopy asked where and how long I was gone (weird, I know), and after my reply he said something like "Oh that's cool, because I thought I saw someone in there watching TV". MISSION ACCOMPLISHED!

Reviews.Title: A great item
Reviews.Author: Bubble Baggins "Trichomaster"
Reviews.Content: Only gets 4 stars as the 3 hour & 7 hour timers do not engage.It is on from dusk 'til dawn.

Reviews.Title: Great idea!
Reviews.Author: Conrad Berg "H82luz"
Reviews.Content: This little thing is a wonder! It produces a random flashing pattern of light and color. If you cannot see the origin, the patterns on walls or curtains is just what would be seen if produced by a TV. Clever, and so good, you just watch it to see what it does next...Perhaps it will replace TV?

Reviews.Title: Fantastic for any homeowner
Reviews.Author: patm
Reviews.Content: This Fake TV item is a true lifesaver for me. It performs exactly as advertised!  My town and neighborhood are being engulfed by a large city where jobless rate is very high; the crime level has risen. While traveling out of town, it is a great comfort knowing that it appears that someone is "at home" at my street address.

Reviews.Title: Looks real
Reviews.Author: Callie
Reviews.Content: Would give the product 4.5 stars if possible. It's crazy how real this thing looks from the outside...as long as you have it pretty close to the window. The product is not as bright as I would have liked, but it is effective. It's nice that it has different timer settings and that it can turn on and off automatically.

Reviews.Title: added security
Reviews.Author: trlamb
Reviews.Content: I put my little unit on a timer, and it faces a wall near my computer monitor. The flickering, reflected light can be seen through an upstairs window. It seems like a good addition to a lamp that's on a timer in another room.

Reviews.Title: Must-have Device!
Reviews.Author: Happy with Apple
Reviews.Content: This little thing would be a great addition to your home security setup. When placed as directed, it automatically turns on and gives the appearance a TV is on in the room. It looks as real as can be from outside! I intend to get a bunch for Christmas gifts.

Reviews.Title: Nice product
Reviews.Author: Filloutthebox "Snake"
Reviews.Content: waited till dark, turned on the unit and went outside to check it out and it looks just like a TV light.

Reviews.Title: Amazing!
Reviews.Author: rwx "991234xhr"
Reviews.Content: The product is rather expensive for such a small device or i would have bought more of it, for other rooms.It's about the size of 2 packs of cigarettes and it emits randomized light patterns like those from a TV screen. Supposedly it consumes no more power than a night light. From the street, it has the effect of someone watching TV, deterring burglars. Coupled with a radio (NOT included with the product), it should fool even someone lurking just outside the window.Amazing!

Reviews.Title: clever burgler deterrent
Reviews.Author: SusieQ "Grammy"
Reviews.Content: I read about this product in one of the sections of the Sunday paper, and checked Amazon to see if they carried it. It was reasonable, so I ordered it. I set it up near the TV, and faced it towards the front window.  No lights can be on near the deterrent. When the deterrent came on, I went outside to see how it would appear through the window blind.  It does look as though the TV is on.  We also have a timer for a light in the same room, so now I feel much safer.

Reviews.Title: Fake TV
Reviews.Author: Jerry Zabin
Reviews.Content: I got this for my daughter and from outside her apartment, she says it looks as if the TV is on. Good product and seller. Shipped promptly. Works as promised.

Reviews.Title: a title
Reviews.Author: Donald J. Dupuis
Reviews.Content: you plug it in and it works as described in the literature.......don

Reviews.Title: GREAT PRODUCT
Reviews.Author: Richard A. Skraba
Reviews.Content: THIS ITEM MAKES IT LOOK LIKE THE TV'S ON AND WILL HELP KEEP AWAY UNWANTED GUESTS.

Reviews.Title: awesome gadget!!
Reviews.Author: Margarita Man
Reviews.Content: I wish I would of bought one of these years ago!  WAY better than having a light on a timer... you would swear a TV is on in the room.

Reviews.Title: Does exactly as advertised.
Reviews.Author: Andrew
Reviews.Content: The negative reviews are wrong.  I ordered this after seeing it in a magazine.  I was nervous the light was not strong enough after reading the reviews.  I placed this in a 12 x 15 room and it looks the TV is on.  Maybe if its in a bigger room it doesn't work, but in my experience it does exactly as advertised.

Reviews.Title: Good for a fake
Reviews.Author: John Hardison
Reviews.Content: This little device works great. I was surprised to the brightness and it does look like a TV is on throught our glass front door.. Amazing

Reviews.Title: Room must be pitch black!!!!
Reviews.Author: P. Mickey
Reviews.Content: I loved the idea of this, but upon receipt the light was really not very bright and would not automatically come on in my great room.  Your room must be "pitch black" to use the auto feature (on at dusk, off at dawn).  Had to return it, and Amazon handled the return great.

Reviews.Title: Does what it says
Reviews.Author: Linda L.
Reviews.Content: I've used this several times while we've been away, and the small cost is worth the peace of mind of having an added layer of security precaution. Tested it out for a few nights before we went away; from outside the house, it really did look like a TV was flickering inside, just like all the other ordinary houses with people inside. Very easy to set up. Would highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: it works
Reviews.Author: Len
Reviews.Content: Got it plugged in on the second floor, turned off all lights and sent my son to the street to see what he thinks of it, son doesn't think it mimics the true TV. Will keep it for the house we have up for sale to keep away potential bad players.

Reviews.Title: Home Alone? Great TV "fake-out" if you are away or...alone
Reviews.Author: Joanna Daneman
Reviews.Content: This unit mimics the light from the flickering screen of your HD TV. But it uses less power and it goes on automatically, stays on for 4 or 7 hours or it stays on continually. The instructions say to put it near your drapes or shades to emit some light to the outside, but I actually find it works better pointed at a white or light colored wall. Depending on how your windows are covered or how your room is oriented, pointing it at a wall may look more realistic than having it shine through a shade. You have to test this out for yourself and see what works for your house.I put this in my den, and when I come home, I can peer in to see part of the den door and it really looks like someone is home, watching the tube. Of course, it makes no noise, but a cheap radio can provide the sounds of people and activity.I actually have two of these (I tried another brand that was more expensive and there isn't much to choose between them.) I have the other one upstairs in a spare bedroom because it can look as if someone is awake in bed, another deterrent. I actually leave both set to run all the time, home or not, because I'm single. Even though I do have a watchdog, I like the idea of looking as if I'm awake and with company, so this is a very inexpensive addition to home security. It only uses the power of a night light, and if it discourages someone from making an unannounced "visit", I think it's a great idea.

Reviews.Title: You've got to see it to believe it!  It really works as advertized.  A 5-star product!
Reviews.Author: HarvF69
Reviews.Content: From the street, it really looks like your TV is on.  Just make sure the device cannot be seen through the window while it is operating.  There are two option settings besides the manual ON setting:  Dusk + 4 hours and Dusk + 7 hours.  In the summer, use the Dusk + 4 hour setting:  the unit will power on automatically when it gets dark [probably around 8pm] and will turn off 4 hours later.  In the winter, use the Dusk + 7 setting: the device will power on when it gets dark [around 4:30pm] and will remain on for 7 hours.And, if you have to leave the house right away in the evening, use the ON setting and the device will immediately start flashing like a TV picture and remain on until you manually turn it off, when you return home.  It operates on LED lights, so energy use is minimal.

Reviews.Title: Worth the money
Reviews.Author: Jeff L
Reviews.Content: Great product. If you have a very large room spend the extra money and op for a bigger unit. It works best if you place it in the middle of the room and aim it off of a wall. The light will bounce off the wall and you will not have to worry about the unit being seen from outside.

Reviews.Title: It's barely okay
Reviews.Author: Doris Bush
Reviews.Content: First of all, I see no UL tag on this appliance. I have some concern that it's safe to leave unattended. It is indeed "subtle" and in my opinion, it needs a bit more brightness.

Reviews.Title: Very well designed
Reviews.Author: Bob Haus "Haus"
Reviews.Content: This is the second one we ordered. It really goes so much better than just having a light on a timer. We were on vacation and one of our neighbors called our cell saying they thought we had a houseguest or had left our T.V. on. This really does a good job simulating a T.V.

Reviews.Title: meets my expectation
Reviews.Author: stacey
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with Fake Tv burglar deterrent. It really looks like someone is home which gives me peace of mind when we are away! The price is reasonable and it is good quality. I like the timer fetchers, and it is energy efficient.

Reviews.Title: FakeTV FTV-10 Burglar Deterrent
Reviews.Author: Kevin F. Gallagher "K"
Reviews.Content: Works as advertised.  Very cool. Kind of freaked my wife out for a while until she got used to to it.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Tiger
Reviews.Content: The Fake TV really works. You must follow the directions. The unit must be placed in the correct position to be effective. NOT VISIBLE but the light clearly shows a TV on through the shades or window blinds just like a real TV.In our neighborhood, burglars ring your front door and then if no answer: they climb the fence/wall and go around back and smash the sliding glass door. Then proceed inside to rob and ransack your home. You can also leave a radio on inside/outside. To date these have been highly effective. Much better than an alarm.

Reviews.Title: Excellent illusion of TV
Reviews.Author: Carla Borton
Reviews.Content: I think this little light is an amazing little gadget. I like to keep the TV on when I'm out at night, or on a timer when I'm away.I would be buying theses for all my family and friends if the price was a little cheaper.

Reviews.Title: Fake TV
Reviews.Author: home shopper
Reviews.Content: This little gadget puts out a very convincing glow.  From the outside of the house, it definitely looks like a TV is on inside.  It's just what I was looking for.  Thanks.

Reviews.Title: Amazing light emitted!
Reviews.Author: wombat81
Reviews.Content: This FakeTV light is a small item and the amount of intermittent light that emits from it is amazing.  It works exactly as described & may be used with or without the timer.  Planning to buy another one in the near future.

Reviews.Title: Fake TV
Reviews.Author: janice white
Reviews.Content: This devise simulates the lights on a color TV.  We like the random patterns that it goes through. Really looks like a TV.  The only draw back is if there is any other light source, it doesn't turn on.  Even how dim the light source is.

Reviews.Title: Works Great, Looks Awesome
Reviews.Author: MetalMan
Reviews.Content: Light flashes off and on, and with different colors it looks like a real TV is on!  Good Product and includes timer also....

Reviews.Title: Says what it does, does what it says. Works GREAT!
Reviews.Author: ARTORIUS CASTUS "99 Hunter"
Reviews.Content: .Purchased this unit because I was not going to be moved into my new home for a few months and need that “someone is home” look.  During that time it was mostly unoccupied and I wanted to give it that look as if people were there.  Friend told me about this unit and I looked it up.  I thought, based on the components, it was kind of pricy.  Forget about it!  Worth its weight in gold!  When I considered the cost of a break in and missing items (My German Shepherd were not at the new house yet) the money this unit cost was miniscule.  I purchased it, used it, worked great and now can loan it to friends who go on vacation or use it for  myself should I go away from home for any reason.  I'll just always have one now.  If you are considering this unit, just go ahead and get it.  Use a light timer to activate it and be certain you position it so it points at the largest window in the area you want it to be visible from.  Relax and enjoy your time away from home.  This unit will definitely make look like a television is on inside of your dwelling.  Worth every penny.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: KDBilly
Reviews.Content: Works great and actually looks like a TV from the outside. It's automatic so all you have to do is plug it in and leave it to do its job.

Reviews.Title: Fake TV should do the trick.
Reviews.Author: Jerry S
Reviews.Content: I already had one of these and only use it when we go away, but l wanted a second one for another room of the house. From outside, it looks like someone has the TV on.

Reviews.Title: Fake TV Burglar Deterrent
Reviews.Author: Jim G.   Orlando FL
Reviews.Content: For the price, this unique device is a cost effective way of creating the appearane of an occupied room.You must however go outside at night and look at the effect to be sure the color patterns are visible outside.The timer delay is a nice feature which turns it on and off depending upon lighting conditions.Saves the price of a random timer connected to a TV set, as well as the added electicy consumed.

Reviews.Title: My Fake TV
Reviews.Author: Snert "TC"
Reviews.Content: We recently ordered a Fake TV device for home security.  We tested the product and found it to be amazingly realistic in the effect it gives.  Now we have to decide where to place it in our home.  I would recommend this product to anyone who wants to make their home look like someone is watching tv while they're away.

Reviews.Title: as advertised
Reviews.Author: R. Wimmer "kingrollo"
Reviews.Content: i am using it in a spare room at night. turns on automatically and off after a couple of hours. looks pretty good from the outside, I have it project on a wall away from the window. I think it is very bright, even brighter than a TV (not sure what other reviewers are expecting), but if somebody drives by the house, i dont think they will evaluate the light output and think it is too bright or not bright enough. So for the price, it is a really good option to make your house a little safer!

Reviews.Title: first impression
Reviews.Author: Mary B "Mary B"
Reviews.Content: This small unit does put out a lot of light and does a good job of mimicking a color tv.Dark window treatments cover this but would do the same with a regular tv.Placement around light color shades or blinds works well but make sure you cant see the unit from outside.I plan to place this near the tv and aim towards windows  that have blinds and opaque window film on them so it looks like the tv is on in living room.Using prime we received it in two days .Update--After several trips friends that keep an eye on house agree that there appears to be a tv on.I use a timer to run during what would be my normal viewing times.

Reviews.Title: Awesome burglary deterrent
Reviews.Author: DanTheMan
Reviews.Content: I placed this unit in an upstairs bedroom on a nightstand, facing the exterior windows. Anytime my wife and I go out of town I plug it into a light timer so that the on and off times are randomized each night. From the outside it looks exactly like a television is on upstairs. I feel that it may certainly deter a burglar, as 99% of them don't want to find someone home during a break-in.This is certainly better than using a real television as it uses so much less electricity.

Reviews.Title: Great to have while gone
Reviews.Author: campers
Reviews.Content: I've just tried this out and I am very impressed with the brightness and the programing of the flashes.We'll feel much better when we go on camping trips and leave the house empty.

Reviews.Title: Works fine; good customer service
Reviews.Author: Akamai22
Reviews.Content: I think this is a worthwhile addition to home security lighting.  The color and movement on the shades makes a big difference in how occupied your house looks.And the feature which turns the unit on at dusk is a welcome plus.But mine arrived with a broken AC adapter.  Before I  could take action to replace the piece I got an email from the company asking if I was happy with the product.  I told them about the problem and three days later I had a new AC adapter at zero cost and minimal effort.  No questions. No "send back the broken one".  Just prompt and helpful service.

Reviews.Title: Only for use on a timer
Reviews.Author: Lee D. Mermelstein
Reviews.Content: The fake tv turn on when it shouldn't in complete darkness.  The light sensor doesn't work properly.  It's okay if you buy a separate timer to turn it on an off.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: Peptidemel
Reviews.Content: I set this up on a table next to the front window and I could see this from the street at night.  Very realistic and works great. It has 3 settings and plugs in.  It is about 4 inches wide. Left it on the whole time while on a trip.  Good buy!

Reviews.Title: Better than advertised. Well worth the money.
Reviews.Author: farmerbob
Reviews.Content: My daughter lives alone.I set this light to come on at random times during the night with a timer.From the street it does appear that a television is being watched.Small footprint puts out an amazing amount of constantly changing levels of light.

Reviews.Title: 100% satisfied with my "Fake TV" purchase
Reviews.Author: Birchman
Reviews.Content: Hi,I've read reviews on this product both pro and con.  Some complain it's to small and can only be used on an upper level, that's only if you have no imagination.  It can be easily set on a lower level to the right or left side of a window by bouncing the LED light off the back wall.  From outside it gives the same appearance as any flat panel TV that's wall mounted.  I am 100% satisfied with my "Fake TV" purchase.

Reviews.Title: A great gizmo
Reviews.Author: Ann Campbell
Reviews.Content: I have now purchased 5 of these: two for my home, one for my boat, and two as gifts to friends. They are especially useful in close quarters as on my boat. My past marina had a series of break ins and burglaries. My boat was not one that was targeted. I attribute that to setting up the fake tv in the aft cabin and turning on a radio to a talk-show station. Standing on the dock it is totally convincing that someone is on the boat, watching TV.

Reviews.Title: Works as intended
Reviews.Author: B(Florida)
Reviews.Content: Works great!  Initially I had it facing the window, but it looked a little too bright to me, so I turned it to face the opposite wall..

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Miguel
Reviews.Content: This is one of the best investment I made. It really works! Lights up the whole house when I am gone.

Reviews.Title: Works great!
Reviews.Author: BobbyJ
Reviews.Content: This is actually a really cheap security system in itself. We already have an alarm system and when going out of town we wanted a little something extra. It does have to be pitch black to start working.

Reviews.Title: We love it!!
Reviews.Author: H. E. Cope "LoriHarold"
Reviews.Content: Thank you for a great product!  We feel it will be very valuable in helping to keep our daughter safe in her new apartment.  Thank you!

Reviews.Title: works exactly as expected!
Reviews.Author: David Kramer "DK"
Reviews.Content: works exactly as expected!good simulated TV light patterns.low power consumption.has automatic on/off settings.can plug into external lamp timer if desired.

Reviews.Title: Sweet!
Reviews.Author: Wade
Reviews.Content: This product is as advertised and works extremely well. I am very satisfied with the purchase and believe it could truly help deter a burglary instance.

Reviews.Title: Smart product!
Reviews.Author: sunshine33
Reviews.Content: Very nice product, would definitely recommend to someone who is concerned about their home.  I bought for my grandmother lives by herself.

Reviews.Title: Works as expected
Reviews.Author: M. Degani "The Skeptic"
Reviews.Content: It does what it says it does. I have had it on ever since I purchased it about 2 years ago, and it never failed.

Reviews.Title: Right idea, not perfect
Reviews.Author: Bennett Barouch
Reviews.Content: If one looks at it critically, I am not sure the color or rate of change is that realistic, but it is probably sufficient for the purpose.

Reviews.Title: Great idea.
Reviews.Author: Arel
Reviews.Content: I've read plenty of reviews and decided it was worth a try.  I turned it on and watched it for a bit and am pleased that the product will do as it says.  Submits a realistic glare and will work well in my house.  Hey, if the tv goes out we can just sit and look at the light.  Of course this would work better in those states that have recently passed pro-marijuana laws.

Reviews.Title: Works as well as I'd hoped
Reviews.Author: Ceebe
Reviews.Content: This thing works exactly as I expected.  The color changes are random and seem to match those of a TV.  I can't say there's much that can be done to improve this device.I noticed some comments about how this device is not bright enough.  I'm not sure what people expect, but to me it has the same brightness as a TV.

Reviews.Title: works really well, looks real
Reviews.Author: Shaun
Reviews.Content: It showed up quickly and was easy to set and understand. I have gone outside and watched it. It looks pretty good. I don't think my actual LCD TV puts out as much light or chnages in light level. It gets confused if the day turns dark (storm) and doesn't reset when the light level comes back, it runs it's 4 or 7 hour course. So, if it's running at "real" dusk, the deception may be over earlier in the evening than you had wanted. As often as this would happen, it wouldn't be a real problem. Still like it. And will like it even more if my house doesn't get broken into.

Reviews.Title: But Wait, There's More!
Reviews.Author: SES51 "Steve"
Reviews.Content: This is not that difficult to figure out how to use properly!  But sometimes, you've got to out-smart the bear... or find somebody else that is to help you.  If you think you can just take this out of the box, plug it in, slide a switch, point it at a blind or draped covered window 20 feet away, leave all the lights turned brightly on in the room and expect this to make people in the next county believe you're watching TV... you might want to think again before purchasing this!  This item takes some planning and common sense to use properly.All kidding aside (actually, I wasn't kidding)...  If you've got room-darkening blinds or drapes, you'd probably not even see a spotlight through them, let alone a Fake TV.  This produce is meant to be subtle.  If you can't even see your own TV operating (flickering) from outside any way, this definitely won't work for you.  What makes you think this product would do any better?  C'mon... use that noggin on your shoulders.  Some planning or "arranging" may need to occur in your specific setting to make this thing "believable" to those thinking about using your keepsakes to pawn off for crack.  Thieves still are typically lazy and will move on to an easier target if you do your part, first, and take a little time to set this up properly.  Even just a little flicker might save you from having to make that 911 call when you return from your Bingo night or church's pot-luck supper.In my application, which I use for extended vacations, or even just an evening that I'll be returning after dark... I plug it in, of course, placed on the entertainment center or a stand less than 2 feet in front of the window, angled about 45 degrees off to one side.  It's aimed (up) towards the wall that has my window(s) that I want its blinking to be visible from.  I don't leave any other "glaring" lights on in the room either... but there still are some dimmer lights on in the room.  I have only blinds and I "crack" them open slightly so the light goes up and through them.  I also have (the advantage of) a gable window that allows the blinking Fake TV's light to reflect off of the vaulted ceiling and this is the most effective application I've found although I've used it successfully in other rooms.  Anybody on the street would think there is somebody home here with the TV on.  You also may need to obscure the area around the sensor (block off with books or a newspaper crumpled up) to ensure it comes on in a lighted room.Try different angles, tilts, blind/drape openings and/or reflecting off ceiling or walls to find the best results.  Of course, if you black-out your windows completely (or don't have any), nothing will work for you.  Then again, a little thought process before you purchase this may save you some trouble (or the need to write negative reviews).  This product may not work in your environment or setting.I've used this product for almost a year now.  It works suitably for my situation and it DOES look like a real TV operating in the room from outside.  There are, however, a couple items I'd like to see changed or added to it.  Of course, these would increase to the already reasonable price this thing now sells for.1.  Have a "random" on and off setting still retaining the 4 and 7 hour relative timeframes.2.  Have a variable sensor sensitivity like high, medium and low.3.  And this is really picky... have a 5 or 6 hour setting.  7 hours is still too long even for our winter's early sunsets.  It will remain on till well after midnight here, which is a dead giveaway that I'm really not home if you already know my "pattern" or observe my other light timers.Still, I love the Fake TV.  It gives me a reassuring feeling that my property is safe and sound when I do leave it for just an hour or for weeks at a time.  I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Surprisingly small but effective.
Reviews.Author: DW of Dallas
Reviews.Content: I installed the Fake TV in the middle bedroom/guest room of my home. It is set to turn on for 4 hours after dark.  It works exactly as claimed. I have left it on all this time even though we are home; it appears that someone occupies the room. YES, I would buy it again and have recommended it to many friends.

Reviews.Title: dlgator
