Reviews.Author: dlgator
Reviews.Content: I bought two of these a few months ago and WOW do they work good.Just plug them in and that's it; they know when to come on and go off.From outside it looks just like a television is on.Make sure you have the blinds closed and position the device so that it shines up on the ceiling near the window for best results.Great product.

Reviews.Title: Fake TV
Reviews.Author: Dr. Scott R. Mcadoo
Reviews.Content: It delivers what it promises. Looks like someone's watching TV from outside of the house.Go outside and look into your windows though, to make sure the device isn't visible to a potential intruder.

Reviews.Title: FakeTV FTV-10 Burglar Deterrent
Reviews.Author: maxdar
Reviews.Content: We were pleased with the order process, the shipping and the follow up. Very well packaged.The product is excellent. We set it up in our bedroom after nightfall and went outside to see if we could see any lighting change through the window. Even with the blinds closed, we were able to see light intensity and color changes. Yes, we have shared the information about FakeTV with our friends and relatives. Great idea!FakeTV FTV-10 Burglar Deterrent"Amazon Verified Purchase"

Reviews.Title: Buying a second one
Reviews.Author: Art Sindlinger
Reviews.Content: Works as advertised, now buying a second one.  My living room TV (~50") is backed against floor-to-ceiling windows.  Fake TV sits at the base of it.  After dark, this little box throws off light patterns very similar to what you see with the flat screen on.  Would be nice if something like this were available for < $35.  Whoever invented this has to be pocketing fat margins.  But more power to him/her I guess.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Product!
Reviews.Author: DannyBoy
Reviews.Content: Tried this the other night. From outside my house it looked just like someone was watching TV. With this and timers on other lights this will be a good deterrent for anyone casing our house.

Reviews.Title: Amazing little product
Reviews.Author: clsm
Reviews.Content: I was somewhat skeptical about how well this item would work after seeing it.  It is so tiny and totally unimpressive looking.  When you plug it in though, you will become a believer.  It truly does mimic a TV.  The only problem I had was hiding it as there are several windows in rooms adjoining the room where I wanted to place the FakeTV.  I decided to put my FakeTV on an independent timer so that I could more reliably control the time that it would run.  Just a footnote....during the installation process, I inadvertently dropped the FakeTV from about 6 feet up onto a hard floor.  Surprise....it kept right on working.  I think it's a great idea and well worth the purchase price.  Delivery was much quicker than I'd expected as well.  Overall, I'm completely delighted with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Fake TV Review
Reviews.Author: William E. Lawrence
Reviews.Content: I am very satisfied with the Fake TV product. I use it on a daily/ nightly basis. The fake TV pattern changes effectively. I am very satisfied and recommend it as a burglar deterrent over light timers.

Reviews.Title: Excellent value for the money!
Reviews.Author: Linda Tatum
Reviews.Content: I ordered this FakeTV as an enhancement to my security system already in place. It is surprisingly effective.  From the outside looking at the house, it is quite convincing that there is a TV on in the house. I am especially pleased that it plugs into the wall so it doesn't require batteries. I also like the fact that the unit has settings so you can adjust how long you want it to run after the automatic sensor turns it on at dark. This is a great value for the money.

Reviews.Title: works great
Reviews.Author: BmanD
Reviews.Content: This thing works very well. I live in a rural area were it is fairly dark and it realy looks like a tv on in the house. I have pulled in the driveway when it is dark and thought someone had left a tv on in the house only to realize it is the fake tv. I ended up buying several of them and giving to family members for gifts.

Reviews.Title: LANORRAN
Reviews.Author: Fred Flintstone
Reviews.Content: I am well pleased with the product and I received it in a very, very short time from ordering it.

Reviews.Title: fake tv ftv-burglar deterrent
Reviews.Author: Mary A. Sherseth "artsy gal"
Reviews.Content: this burglar detterrent add more security to my barking dog 'REX'.... THESE PRODUCTS ARE REALLY WORTH THE MONEY  THEY CERITAINLY MAKE ME FEEL SAFE!

Reviews.Title: Fake TV is great!
Reviews.Author: MrTV Guy
Reviews.Content: The Fake TV is a great product. I wish that I had thought of it. I placed it in a front bedroom and pointed it at the window. From all appearances it looks like someone inside is watching TV. We went on vacation for a week and I felt much more secure that no one would break into our place. I highly recommend!!

Reviews.Title: great product!
Reviews.Author: oneoff
Reviews.Content: this is what i needed, it looks exactly like the TV light through the windows , as long as you don't put it too close ...

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: JNW
Reviews.Content: This is a great gizmo for nights when I am coming home late or out of town on business. It really looks like the TV is on in the room. Love it!

Reviews.Title: Good practical product
Reviews.Author: CJP
Reviews.Content: The fake TV is a great way to give the impression that a TV is playing inside the house.  From the outside, the visible lights and the color, duration, fades, flashes, etc. really give the impression of a TV playing in the room.  Because the unit uses only color LEDs, it is low wattage (uses very little electrictiy), and because it plays for a few hours each evening after sunset, it looks natural.

Reviews.Title: Love this!  Works amazingly well!
Reviews.Author: J. Shimokawa "four of eight"
Reviews.Content: I plugged it in, went outside at night to see if this truly looked like a TV in the upper floor window and was amazed at how real it appeared with the colors, shadows, brightness, etc.  We are extremely happy with our purchase.  We are running it for the week so that when we go on vacation, it will looks like a usual thing to our neighbors!

Reviews.Title: Excellent Extra Protection
Reviews.Author: camy
Reviews.Content: I ordered the burgler deterrent after my son loaned me his during a recent trip.  It gives the illusion of a television actually being on in the house.  It made me feel more comfortable on my trip. I decided ro use it when I am home and it provides extra protection for me as a senior citizen.

Reviews.Title: What a product!
Reviews.Author: jmt
Reviews.Content: I ordered Fake TV for my parents.  They are getting on in years and I thought this would be a good product to help them feel more secure. Even when they are at home they like to put in on in a back room to make the house seem like there are lots of people home. I tested it out before I gave it to them by setting it up in my house first.  You can not tell from the outside that there not a real TV on in the house.  The set up was so simple.  I love this product!  I have been telling my friends about it and they all will be ordering them for their houses.  It is a great item to give your kids if they are away at collage or living anywhere on their own.  You will not be disappointed with your Fake TV.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: D. Rosenberg "A man with tools..."
Reviews.Content: I highly recommend this product. It works wonders if you use it properly. Should be part of a comprehensive security system.

Reviews.Title: Sould have bought this sooner
Reviews.Author: Av
Reviews.Content: I just received the "fake tv". It is so compact I leave it right by the TV. I used to set up a radio and a smaller TV on a timer, but this is so much nicer is easier.

Reviews.Title: Impressed
Reviews.Author: Ken S. Sato
Reviews.Content: Impressed with this product. Set up was easy.  Haven't tested it energy usage but I believe the rated 3 watts, it's about as bright a regular TV and uses far less power.  The auto on at sundown feature seems to work well.  Only have had about a week but so far would highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Fake TV
Reviews.Author: "Buff"
Reviews.Content: This is the third one I have purchased for gifts. I love the idea of being able to deterr a burglar.

Reviews.Title: Loved it!
Reviews.Author: Lisa
Reviews.Content: I love our Fake TV! It was surprisingly small but very convincing. Our neighbors were totally convinced we had a new TV in our bedroom! Great little product.

Reviews.Title: A very clever little burglar deterrent.
Reviews.Author: D. Ro "BadKitty88"
Reviews.Content: I am quite pleased with this product.  I have it in a front upstairs guest bedroom and I believe it will really be a deterrent for any burglar who might be considering breaking in after dark.  Looks like someone is still awake in the house.  I can see it might not be quite as effective on a downstairs floor window, particularly since there is no sound.  If a burglar were to walk completely up to the downstairs window and listen, and hear no sound, he might realize something isn't quite right.  But for the average troublemakers cruising around in a car looking for an easy target, this would cause them to think twice and probably move on.  It is very small, and very bright.  It does require the room be pitch black before it automatically comes on, or you can use the "always on" setting, although I think that would look unnatural if it were on til dawn every single night.  A bit of randomness helps keep it looking authentic.  That is where the 4 hour or 7 hour option helps it look legit.  Reasonable price too, and it seems well made.

Reviews.Title: Great idea for safety's sake!
Reviews.Author: NannyBee
Reviews.Content: After a rash of burglaries in the neighborhood, I was nervous to leave for vacation.  I'd taken all the precautions to make my home less vulnerable, yet I still was uneasy about leaving.  I remembered seeing this product on TV, perhaps The Today Show, a while back.  I ordered it after reading reviews, and it arrived in just a few days.  I practiced with all the settings, and I liked it on a timer. I stood outside and it looked like someone was watching TV....and was a night owl....GREAT! The second one I bought is for my single friend for Christmas -- she has everything, but not this!

Reviews.Title: Fools me, and I was a licensed private investigator
Reviews.Author: N22Tango "Film tonight at 10"
Reviews.Content: We live in a rural area on a farm and although my house sits 1,200 feet off the highway, it nearly shouts "COME ROB ME" to travelers going up and down the road. Our nearest neighbor is too far to see our property and despite having dogs here on the farm, I wanted something that would visually communicate "we are at home" at night, when we were really gone, for days (and nights) at a time.This device emits illumination inside my living room (or any room I want to place it) and from the outside, it looks like someone is inside watching TV.  I've actually done surveillance (as a licensed private investigator here in Texas) and have written in reports and synopsis that residences where surveillance has been conducted, "revealed television set was on, inside the house."  I was even able to tell what TV station the set was on... long story and you don't need the details...To me, as I set this device up inside my home and went outside to monitor the effectiveness of this device, IT LOOKED REAL TO ME!This tiny unit flashes illumination inside the room and colors change (from greens, to white, to blues and others) and it perfectly imitates a television being viewed. The trick is to place it so it illuminates a wall or drapes and make certain it can't be seen by a passerby.It was so convincing to me, I ordered a second one to put in my 5th wheel RV. Now, when we are gone, it looks like someone is not only inside our home watching TV, but it also appears we have guests staying in the RV...I am delighted in this product... It probably costs a few pennies per day to run, it doesn't heat up the house (like if leaving the real TV on) and it cycles off automatically when the sun comes up in the morning.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Deterrent
Reviews.Author: Kris Kipp "Kipp"
Reviews.Content: Very simple, plug it in and face it towards one of your window shades or a curtain that does let light filter through as the instructions state.  It flickers like a real TV.  It uses basically no power, the lights are LEDs.  It can be set to turn on at dusk and run for 4 hours or 7 hours.  One thing that surprised me is that it is tiny.  Just about as tall and wide as a credit card.  Some say that the light sensor is too/not sensitive enough, you can set the switch to the ON position and plug it into a standard timer.

Reviews.Title: good stuff
Reviews.Author: Irena
Reviews.Content: I set it up as suggested in manual which is in my upstairs bedroom and you can't tell it is fake tv. It is "set it and forget it" design and that is exactly what I wanted. I would recommend this product to anyone concern with safety of their house while being away.

Reviews.Title: Great value, just what I needed
Reviews.Author: slinkywizard
Reviews.Content: This product works exactly as advertised.  I placed the unit on the floor facing a window in an upstairs (unused) bedroom and keep the shade half drawn.  From the outside of the house it looks exactly like someone is watching TV.  I had several friends/family look at it from outside without telling them what it was, and they were all completely fooled.  I combine the fake TV with a lamp on a timer in the next bedroom over.  At night this combo gives the perfect illusion of occupancy from the front of the house.

Reviews.Title: Fake T.V
Reviews.Author: jeff g ginter
Reviews.Content: I purshased this product six months ago while remodeling a rehab home locatedon the southside of town. The Fake T.V really works while, from outside the lights appear asa real T.V reflecting through the windows. The product is very simple to operate, just plugin and set the length of time for operation. To get the best visual effect, I suggest youadjusting the height and angel of Fake T.V during the night. It's a great product, well worth the price.

Reviews.Title: Very realistic
Reviews.Author: SouthernbelleV
Reviews.Content: I bought this to put in my master bedroom, which already has a 50" TV on the wall.  I have the real TV on most nights, but wanted to make it look like I'm home on the nights I'm not. I put the FakeTV on Intermatic DT620CL 15 Amp Indoor Astronomic Digital Timer, which allows you to change the on/off times a little each day, so it would seem more realistic.  After getting everything set up, I first turned on the real TV and went outside to find out what it looks like through the sheer curtains/cellular-shades-lowered-from-the-top combination covering the street-facing window.  Then I checked out the FakeTV appearance from the outside, and it was virtually indistinguishable from the real thing.  It has random flashes of bright light (as you would expect during a tense moment of a show) interspersed with less-bright, random flickers that simulate the action of a TV show.  Since I really couldn't tell the difference, I have to think someone else looking at the house would conclude that the TV is on and therefore the house is occupied.This is a very reasonable price to pay for a great deterrent to criminals!  I would buy it again and have recommended it to my family members.

Reviews.Title: Works great! But I wish it was a little brighter.
Reviews.Author: Skier76
Reviews.Content: The unit is very small and easy to position. You have a number of settings you can use; we just leave it on all the time. Since it uses LEDs, it doesn't use much electricity or get warm. The lighting it puts out does in fact look like a TV.My only complaint is the brightness. To get the full effect, you really have to place it near/facing a window. And you'll need some sort of blinds or sheer to help defuse the light a bit. We do have a good amount of outside lighting on at night, so that may be part of the problem.If they could boost the light output a bit; maybe another row or rows of LEDs, this would be perfect. As it is now, it's a little pricey for what it is.

Reviews.Title: Get one; you won't regret it unless you later find it for less
Reviews.Author: Citizen John
Reviews.Content: I plugged it in one evening, slid the switch to 4 hours and went across the street to observe.  Truly it appeared that a TV was on in that room.  Further, it strongly gave the impression that somebody was there.Another good thing is this uses LEDs.  Therefore it uses very little electricity.

Reviews.Title: Tells neighbors (and thieves) you are home watching TV
Reviews.Author: Kingsley Elbert
Reviews.Content: I Love it. Works fine,  It is NOT a toy. Uses insignificant power. I travel between two homes and have a fake TV at each home. The home retains its lived-in look when I am not there.

Reviews.Title: Fake TV
Reviews.Author: Thomas
Reviews.Content: The effect is good.  The timer function with which it turns off either 4 or 7 hours after dark doesn't work.

Reviews.Title: Very convincing
Reviews.Author: Hank Hancock "Hank"
Reviews.Content: Living in the big city, I've been burglarized several times in the past 20 years. I've since added a number of security improvements to the home but realized that they don't actually deter a thief from trying to break in. If a thief thinks the occupants are at home, he'll move on and try another house where the owners don't appear to be home. With that in mind, I purchased this Fake TV Burglar Deterrent and put it in an upstairs room we use for a library that faces the front driveway.Being just a little skeptical of this little device, I waited until dark then went outside to see what it looks like. With my real plasma television on down stairs and this little fake TV running upstairs, I was simply amazed at how realistically it compared to my real television. Several weeks ago I was talking to a neighbor and he commented that he noticed our upstairs television running late into the night. When I told him it was this little fake TV, he said he was convinced it was a real TV. Needless to say, he placed his order for one too.

Reviews.Title: This thing really works
Reviews.Author: Imagine That
Reviews.Content: We were looking for something to make our house look occupied while we're on vacation.  We have automatic lighting, etc., but from the outside, this fake TV light actually looks like a TV is on.  We use it in an upstairs bedroom so we don't have some of the issues others have mentioned about being able to see it if someone looked inside your window.  It changes brightness and colors randomly and unless someone knew you had this device, would never know this is fake.  It's a keeper!

Reviews.Title: good product
Reviews.Author: Deborah Collins "book lover"
Reviews.Content: We bought this item on the recommendation of a friend.  The device works well and dependably turns itself on and off as scheduled.  I was surprised to see the reviews saying the light isn't very bright.  I had to move it further away from the window because the light seemed too bright to be believable.  With the gadget on a shelf across the room, from the outside it looks just like a tv.  Having it there makes me at least feel more secure while we're away.

Reviews.Title: Mom loves this
Reviews.Author: Michael D
Reviews.Content: My mom loves this. I bought her two. Makes her feel a lot safer. We added them to a timer.From the outside of the house, you'd be convinced someone was watching tv inside.

Reviews.Title: fake tv
Reviews.Author: R. G. Lippold
Reviews.Content: Works exactly as promised.  A great small investment to help keep out the bad guys especially when you're really not home.

Reviews.Title: Perfect!
Reviews.Author: Brian Wickett
Reviews.Content: We use this frequently and it works great. From outside, almost impossible to tell it's not a real TV. So impressed, I got one for my Mom.

Reviews.Title: Nice Little Device
Reviews.Author: MechEng
Reviews.Content: Smaller than expected but bright with a realistic looking light show.  Illuminated by LED's which suggests it should be long lasting.  Has photoeye, permitting 3 settings:  on, dusk + 4 hours, and dusk + 7 hours.  The on switch is a real switch, so the device can be used with a stand-alone timer as well.

Reviews.Title: Great little device
Reviews.Author: sn2002bt
Reviews.Content: I had this device for a month now.  It worked great.  From outside, it really appears to be big screen LCD turned on.  It should fool most people and provide some security.  I feel this is a good buy.  Now I just wish this device can hold on for more than a year.  So far no issue whatsoever.

Reviews.Title: Fun and functional
Reviews.Author: Tom H.
Reviews.Content: I know it's crazy to say I love this little box with flashing lights, but it's true.  I leave it set up for dusk +7 hours in an upstairs extra bedroom where it won't bother anyone at home at night, and I don't have to remember to set it up when we go away.  It's so realistic I just have to chuckle when I see that TV-glare going from outside at night.I'm tempted to take a star away because I can't convince myself that there's anything close to $35 worth of plastic, LED lights, and timing circuitry in the thing.  On the other hand, it is a pretty reasonable one-time investment in an unmistakable message that says "if you're a burglar, there's someone at home, so move along, please."

Reviews.Title: Fake TV Security Light
Reviews.Author: K. McW "Stuff"
Reviews.Content: I read the reviews here and would like to add:If placed to close to a window, with light showing through drapes or blinds, it will not look right from the outside.Has a "dusk" light sensor to automaticly turn light on for 4 hours, then off or 7 hours, then off.

Reviews.Title: Does what it says
Reviews.Author: Kevin
Reviews.Content: Fake TV comes out of the box looking pretty unimpressive, but plug it in and it does exactly what it claims to.  Very convincing, especially when used with a timer. Worth the money for the peace of mind it provides.

Reviews.Title: Safety First
Reviews.Author: Fran L
Reviews.Content: After recently being burglarized I purchased this item.  At night when we leave the house it gives the appearance of someone being home. I purchased one for both floors of my house as well as our vacation home.  Easy to use alone or with a timer.  This one is a winner.

Reviews.Title: a grand illusion
Reviews.Author: W Hankin
Reviews.Content: This deterrent is a small little box no larger than the palm of one's hand. You can program it to a couple of settings which give you a long or shorter duration of hours of operation. Overall, it does the job and from looking outside at a distance of over 50 yards it creates a decent illusion that someone is spending an awful lot of time behind the tube. I recommend this product because it has it's own timer. Once it gets dark the device kicks in.

Reviews.Title: I fooled all of my friends and neighbors
Reviews.Author: Boston Joan
Reviews.Content: We left town for a month and used the FakeTV unit in our den, where I normally watch TV at night.  All of my friends and neighbors thought we had someone staying in the house because the FakeTV was so realistic!  We also had timers on lamps throughout the house but the FakeTV was the frosting on the cake!  It was so effective in fooling my friends and neighbors that I ordered 3 more for family members who often travel.  It is a tiny device with a big effect!

Reviews.Title: experienced user
Reviews.Author: Cape Cod Bill
Reviews.Content: This is the fourth unit I have bought from you for family houses, and we are all happy with the simplicity and quality of the performance of the TV deterrent.

Reviews.Title: Delivers the Goods
Reviews.Author: BigMac
Reviews.Content: This product is definitely worth the money.  It does exactly what the advertising says it will do.  Assuming you don't need sound, it's a far superior solution at $29. to using a real TV to create the impression someone is home.  It consumes less energy than a real TV & if it burns out, well it costs $29. - waaay cheaper than an LCD panel.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely COOL !
Reviews.Author: sah "sah"
Reviews.Content: You gotta see this!  Inside, it looks cool....go outside, you'd never know it wasn't a TV!  Someone really put some time into the algorithms and got it right!  COOL, MAN !  A TRIP just by itself!

Reviews.Title: Very real from the outside
Reviews.Author: Tim
Reviews.Content: Tried this out tonight and it's pretty neat-turned it on, went outside and it looks like my TV's on-flashes, flickering and all.Using it along with other home security items: light timers, motion sensor lights etc will hopefully will make the baddies think twice.

Reviews.Title: small, but works good
Reviews.Author: lymanspond
Reviews.Content: Delivered on time as promised, when people said it was small, well I thought  ok, but its smaller than what I thought..using it in a small bedroom and went outside , the light was very bright and may have to use a piece of paper as a shield  to tone it down a bit,

Reviews.Title: Works much as I had expected
Reviews.Author: Professor
Reviews.Content: Based on pictures, I expected the unit to be about the size of an auto headlight. In reality, it's smaller. However, it works about as expected. Some of the information implies that total darkness is necessary for it to come on automatically, but I found that my unit comes on in dim light when set in the automatic mode. It creates a light pattern that's about what one would expect from someone watching TV.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Product!
Reviews.Author: Happy!
Reviews.Content: I purchased one for me and was so impressed I purchased an additional one for my Dad!  Great product!

Reviews.Title: Cheap Limited Deterent
Reviews.Author: D. Webster
Reviews.Content: This device will keep a thief "at night" questioning as to whether or not anyone is at home in the house or dwelling they might be considering breaking into.  However, without the normal accompaning sound that would be heard when someone is watching TV, would, I think give rise to doubts from any individual considering any type of criminal activity.One would have to have other types of criminal deterents, such as dummy video cameras and or an actual monitored burglar alarm system.

Reviews.Title: Works Great
Reviews.Author: Strokerace
Reviews.Content: Works great. Gives outside appearance of someone watching tv inside. I use it for my lake home when I'm not there. I have it set to run for four hours after it turns dark then a lamp on a timer comes on for the remainder of the night.

Reviews.Title: Fake TV a must have
Reviews.Author: AloeSkin
Reviews.Content: This was a great buy.  Looks like a real TV is on.  Now my home never looks empty this is great addtion to any alarm system that you may have already in your home and a great burglar deterrent!I received this product fast!  Thanks for prompt speedy delivery!

Reviews.Title: Could have fooled me
Reviews.Author: D. CARDWELL "Don The Matrix"
Reviews.Content: Purchased this Fake TV based on an email I received about things burglers look for when deciding what houses to consider for breakins.  Was headed for a vacation in Cancun MX so decided... what the heck, can't hurt.  Plugged it in, went outside and ... looked like there was a tv on in that room.Caution should be given to placement, so it can't be seen from outside (noted in instruction) and could be a little brighter.  Good news is it is not on a timer, so if you have a power outage it will NOT be affected... workes on dusk to dawn type timer...Would recommend this as an ADDITIONAL thing to use when away... d

Reviews.Title: Great Deterrent
Reviews.Author: Traveling Cue
Reviews.Content: This gadget works very well.  From the curb it actually looks like someone is watching tv in the room with drapes.  I have other street level rooms with only blinds that I'll definitely have to hang drapes in if I use this device in there because the device is detectable if you get close to the windows and look through the blinds (even with them closed).  All in all I'm glad I purchased three!!

Reviews.Title: The Perfect TV
Reviews.Author: gr8gramma of 10
Reviews.Content: This gadget really works. As we were driving away from our house and looked back, the windows would light up, then get dark, then stay bright for awhile before changing again. It looked like I really did have my TV on. The unit is very small and has settings on it. Pricey, but worth it.

Reviews.Title: fake tv review
Reviews.Author: mfields
Reviews.Content: This tool will provide the illusion that someone is home.  Hopefully the bad guy will try another place or easier target due to the fact someone "may" be home.  This $30 tool can easily be set on timer when your not home.  We promote this tool for community members who may be out of town or on vacation.Keep in mind that this is not a subsitute for deadbolts, dogs, effective lighting, and other crime prevention methods but a great addition to those that like to be proactive and deter criminals.Chief Michael FieldsYuma Police DepartmentYuma, Colorado

Reviews.Title: Fake TV for all
Reviews.Author: D. Liu
Reviews.Content: You get  a fake tv! You get a fake tv! Everyone gets a fake tv! If you are going away and want to simulate someone being at home watching tv. This is definitely the product for you. It's amazing how real it looks, but like everyone else said, make sure it's on a 2nd floor where people can't see it.

Reviews.Title: Works, could be improved
Reviews.Author: Mike L "Mike L"
Reviews.Content: It's much smaller than it looks in the pix which would be fine if the light output was as bright as I expected. It doesn't fill the room with as much light as a TV would so the conditions have to be just so to get a convincing effect.I have achieved what I need but I think I got lucky. I happen to have semi opaque white paper shades that catch and diffuse the light perfectly. Anything other than that I'm not sure would work.All in all, it works well for me and have bought two more for my lake house and spare bedroom.

Reviews.Title: Satisfied
Reviews.Author: D. Cox
Reviews.Content: The fake TV was delivered promptly and works as predicted.  It would be nice if it were a little brighter, but it is OK.  We turn it on whenever we leave at night.

Reviews.Title: Amazing product
Reviews.Author: wiser2day
Reviews.Content: Just received mine today and turned it on this evening to test it out... Wow. It works just as advertised. It really does look like someone is watching TV in the room. From outside it would be practically impossible to tell the difference. It was also super easy to figure out how to use it.It really surprised me how small this device is -- a little larger than my fist. I was expecting something larger. Extra points in my book because it really can fit anywhere there is a power supply.I also like the fact that it mimics the pattern of real TV-watching -- it turns on at dusk and can run for 4 or 7 hours after dusk. This means that when it turns on is variable depending on when it gets dark. Great for different times of the year when the sun sets earlier. I hate fiddling around with timers as the seasons change.Great product. Definitely worth the $30 for the added peace of mind.

Reviews.Title: Works well!
Reviews.Author: MM
Reviews.Content: It looked so small that I had my doubts about its effectiveness, but it works very well. Lights up a room and it certainly makes it look like a tv is on. Of course, the best deterrent for a possible theft is a dog that bites an intruder- and I have one of those as well.

Reviews.Title: Amazing little product!
Reviews.Author: MaMo
Reviews.Content: I've used the Fake TV a few times now.  I in short, it works as advertised... Quite convincing from the street.

Reviews.Title: It works.
Reviews.Author: Bass man
Reviews.Content: I gave this device to my son, he travels a lot because of his job. I drove by his house the other night and saw that the device was on, it does look like the TV is on.

Reviews.Title: a decent device.
Reviews.Author: Jim Drum
Reviews.Content: I think this is a decent adjunctive device for home security.I think that it is better than just having an auto light come on,I do think that you need to put the device closer to the window or it is much too vague of a light to look totally convincing that it is a TV. I'm glad I have it as an additional deterant , but it may be a bit gimicky and it is hard to say if it will prevent breakins.

Reviews.Title: Raccon control, anyone?
Reviews.Author: L. Munyon
Reviews.Content: No, this review didn't wind up in the wrong place!  We bought the FakeTV to deter raccoons out of our attic, and it works great!  All those changing lights are apparently very confusing and disorienting to the little masked pests.  We have searched high and low for a good, effective raccoon control to no avail, so we thought we'd try this on a whim.  The raccoons show up VERY briefly, and then leave every time. I'm sure the FakeTV is also great for what it is intended for, but we are SO happy to have discovered something that works for raccoons (and who knew??)

Reviews.Title: Great device
Reviews.Author: Maggie "Web shopper"
Reviews.Content: Fools the neighbors!  Everyone has asked if we are up late at night watching TV, it looks real from outside.

Reviews.Title: I love these so much, I have 3 of them!
Reviews.Author: KY Woman
Reviews.Content: From outside the house, these look exactly like a television is playing.  I have a two story home, so I have one on every floor when I'm not home.  You can even turn them "on" and plug them into a timer so it looks like someone is turning the TV on at random times.  They are small, lightweight and easy to use.  I highly recommend them.

Reviews.Title: TV
Reviews.Author: SC
Reviews.Content: this little device is awesome. Really looks like your TV is running. Have only tested it so far but plan to use it.

Reviews.Title: Very cool device.
Reviews.Author: Robert E. Dally
Reviews.Content: I was pretty skeptical when I unboxed this as it looks like a goofy box. What a surprise when I plugged it in and viewed it from another room.It looks EXACTLY like a television set is running. From outside, on a dark night, its uncanny how it appears that a TV set is on.......

Reviews.Title: Visible
Reviews.Author: Aaron
Reviews.Content: I plug this into my Vivint alarm outlet which allows me to turn it on and off via smart phone. I leave it on in another room while I sleep comfortably in another.

Reviews.Title: Lifelike
Reviews.Author: brenjohn
Reviews.Content: Thinking of purchasing another for another room. We were almost robbed and are trying any and all items we can muster up to further deter another attempt!!

Reviews.Title: Worked perfectly!
Reviews.Author: Melissa
Reviews.Content: We were robbed several months back and were very paranoid to go on our next trip even though we had a security system.  We stil wanted it to appear there was activity in the house and this did the trick.  We tested it out ahead of time and it comes on when the room is very dark as we needed.

Reviews.Title: Great Anti-Burglar Device
Reviews.Author: the berg
Reviews.Content: What a great idea this unit is. I use it whenever one of my rentals is vacant. This unit certainly provides that lived-in look from the outside. Easy to use and very effective. Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: Looks just like a real TV
Reviews.Author: cubsfan_84
Reviews.Content: Looks just like a real TV from the outside of the house. Use on an upper floor with sheer curtains and it looks like someone is home!

Reviews.Title: Peace of Mind
Reviews.Author: Vivian V. Sims
Reviews.Content: The intermittent flashing different color lights mimic a TV set. I use it every night, whether I'm home or not to provideconsistency. Easy to set up and  clear instructons.

Reviews.Title: What a nifty little device!  This works exactly as described.  I got two!
Reviews.Author: DMD "book worm"
Reviews.Content: This works great.  It looks just like a real television is on.  What a great and inexpensive way to deter someone from entering your home.  I have an alarm system but use this as well.  I'd rather that someone not even try to enter my home!  If nothing else, I think it would make someone think twice before trying.

Reviews.Title: FakeTV
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Works really well, neighbors report it looks just like a real TV.  Used in our vacation home in conjunction with light timers and an old analog radio on a timer.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely the best investment you can make if you want to fool those thieves !
Reviews.Author: Paradise Reviewer "Aloha Peeps !"
Reviews.Content: I plugged it in, positioned it according to the instructions and WHAMO! I go out side and I swear I was at home watching TV !!!  Very, very realistic as long as you follow the instructions to make sure that you position it correctly. The only thing better would be if you actually left your TV on. Five Stars all the way all day !!!....and night of course.Also has two setting besides just on. One setting turns it on for seven hours after it gets dark and the other setting turns it on after it gets dark and keeps it on for seven hours. So turn it on for four when it's summer and turn it on seven when it's winter. Or you can just turn it on and walk out the door like I do. The other option is that you can have it go on when you're off on a trip. If you do go on a trip make sure you have a couple other lamps in the house that are also on timer switches.

Reviews.Title: Good product to have for home security
Reviews.Author: Rebecca Stanley
Reviews.Content: After a series of breakins on our usually calm street, I started to look at improved security.  One critical issue with the houses that were robbed (there were multiple breakins on one night) was the lack of lighting.  Only one house left a light on in their living room, and they left the curtains open so it was easy to see into the house.  After that, a number of residences started to keep lights on and some also left TVs on as well.  I don't want to burn out my monitor, so this little device is a great substitute.

Reviews.Title: Different
Reviews.Author: Chuckalufagus
Reviews.Content: Just another good tool to deter someone.  I've used it when going on a few trips, and expect it gets noticed.

Reviews.Title: Doesn't really look to much like a TV if you
Reviews.Author: roni mellon
Reviews.Content: Doesn't really look to much like a TV if you watch it for a bit, but I'd guess it still deters people.  I've had no  one break in, but then I didn't have problems before, although there have been others in the neighborhood.  It's hard to prove a negative.

Reviews.Title: works as advertised
Reviews.Author: S. Fauble
Reviews.Content: I do not have anything else to add other than it works as advertised.  I wish they made a larger one as our TV is much larger and hence brighter than this but from a distance it will work as is.

Reviews.Title: Garbage
Reviews.Author: Fred Berger
Reviews.Content: Product does not work.  It still flickers after the switch is turned off.  Only way to stop it from flickering is to pull the plug.

Reviews.Title: Fake tv
Reviews.Author: David mellers
Reviews.Content: Well we have left it on and we haven't been burgled yet , as we have Ip cameras as well we can see what's going on  from anywhere.

Reviews.Title: TV
Reviews.Author: Karen Tarochione
Reviews.Content: Seems to do the job.........No installation required for this item and it does give the allusion of a tv that is on.

Reviews.Title: Does as advertised
Reviews.Author: Jersey Girl
Reviews.Content: I travel quite a bit, and previously have only had light timers as a theft deterrent while away. After a few burglaries in my neighborhood, I decided to ramp it up a bit, and decided that a Fake TV would be a good addition, especially since anyone watching my house while I was home would always see a tv on at night, and would not see it when I was away.... So I got this at a very reasonable price, and have been pleased with the performance. It took a while to figure out the proper positioning in the room so that it looked most 'realistic' from the outside (i.e., not too bright, not too dim), but it does look pretty realistic I think. I like the different on/off options as well. I think this will serve me well and put one more question mark in the minds of potential burglars about whether my house is the best one to break into!

Reviews.Title: So cool
Reviews.Author: Leslie C. Hand
Reviews.Content: It really works and it does look like a TV in the window.  If you have a property that you worry about, this works great

Reviews.Title: Looks like somebody's home!
Reviews.Author: MEEN
Reviews.Content: A burglar is only interested in stealing your stuff and doesn't want confrontation. If there's somebody home, he'll go somewhere else. That's what these lights do!  Make it look like there's somebody home, watching TV.I also know, from experience, most break-ins are neighbors, or even (so called) friends who know your work hours, habits, or when you're on vacation. These blinking LED lights look just like TV lights flickering as scenes change, and have a sensor that turns it on when dark for 4 or 7 hours, or leave it on all the time. (I leave mine on all the time) I have a vacation house I only go to twice a year. When I get there it's normally dark. It always startles me when I pull in the driveway because it looks like someone's home, watching TV!  I've had four of these things for over a year now and they still work fine. I place them in different rooms and even move them around sometimes. Plus,  I leave them on when I'm there. They make great night lights.Tip: Place them where you can't see them from looking in the windows. (They tell you this too.) Buy six fake cameras too! They're cheap, and an electronic barking dog as well. (They're amazing)  I tell my friends the cameras are fake and they don't believe me! Lol...This may sound funny but they work very well for presents. I Just bought another for my daughter's house and she loves it. If you buy fake cameras, make sure you install them high enough, but where it's easy to change the batteries. (about every six months) I have a couple inside my house too. Six cameras, a barking dog, and fake TV, $175.00.Want to know who's visiting? Game cameras are about $75.00 these days and will take pictures for months. You'd be surprised who comes to visit when you're not home. Don't forget to put up a few signs stating "Video Surveillance."

Reviews.Title: Very Cool
Reviews.Author: Paul Ramone
Reviews.Content: I don't believe anyone looking in from outside would ever suspect it is what it is.  A very worthwhile and inexpensive security solution.  Play with their heads a little!

Reviews.Title: very "real" looking
Reviews.Author: on-line shopper
Reviews.Content: I bought one of these many months ago and decided it mimicked a TV so well that I ordered another.  I heard about this device on a talk show and thought I'd see for myself if it looked like a TV on from the outside of my home.  It's extremely effective!

Reviews.Title: It certainly looks like a TV.
Reviews.Author: Walt in Pittsburgh "waltinpittsburgh"
Reviews.Content: This is the second one we have bought for use in another room on a different side of our house.  The most important thing is you need the room dark.  Even a small welcome candle in the window some 6 feet away is enough to slow up the color changing.  It will stay mostly white.  Having done this, I then put the FakeTV on its own timer to keep it on longer.  From the outside, it definitely looks like a TV is on.  We bought one for our neighbor who cares for our cats when we travel, and they recently used it and could not believe how much it looked like a TV was on in the room.  Buy it!

Reviews.Title: Kept the burglars away!!
Reviews.Author: T H
Reviews.Content: Was going out of town for 7 weeks and needed something to keep the burglars away.  Two neighbors had been robbed lately and they were only gone for a short time.  So I purchased this, told the neighbors about it, and went out of town.  Everything was fine when I got back.  No break-ins!!  It worked!!!!

Reviews.Title: Greater Than Your Expectations...
Reviews.Author: Ritchie A. Knox
Reviews.Content: Very dependable product.  Don't worry, it looks exactly like a tv, just make sure it's no viewable from outside the window.More Reviews At:[...]

Reviews.Title: Fake tv
Reviews.Author: Juan Sanchez
Reviews.Content: This little box works great looks like the real deal from out side at knight I Recamend it works like a charm

Reviews.Title: Better than just having lights on timers
Reviews.Author: Amazon.Buyer "Never argue with an 1d10t...the...
Reviews.Content: I have read reviews here stating that the light is not very bright. I dont know if they were reviewing a faulty unit, but mine is so bright you would see the tv lights on during daylight.The unit has 4 settingsoffondusk+ 4 hours anddusk+ 7 hoursThe dusk settings work with an ambient light sensor so you want to ensure that it can see daylight where you place it so it will be off during those times. Its operation would be similar to night lights you might have plugged in around the house. When you have it on the dusk + 7 hour setting, it has a low blue led always on to indictae that it is in that mode. If you choose the dusk + 4 hours, the led is red. Very useful setting to now that the unit is operational when you set it and leave the house.If you do not like those options you can set it on a timer plug and have it set on the always on mode so when the plug switches on, the unit will go on.For power consumption, the unit barely registers on the killawat in standby mode and when its on, it consumes less than my 40 inch lcd tv (granted, if it was an led tv, my tv consumption would be even less).I checked it from the outside and the light switching is random as if you were watching some intense action flick. At moments its super bright and others its quite dark. I have always used lights on timers and some timers are even a bit more random than just turning on at specific times (anyone remember home alone where the burglars knew the times the lights to deter burglars would go on?). But this technique is well known and the fake tv is not. As for the fake tv..well people will often watch tv at the same time to watch some regular shows, so even if one knew about the fake tv, they couldnt be certain it was that.So overall I am glad I purchased this and added it to my security system.

Reviews.Title: This is Great..!
Reviews.Author: Charles E. Judd
Reviews.Content: The 'fake TV' is a very clever device that appears to be a TV reflecting on the ceiling and walls in the room where it is located…as viewed through a window.  Very satisfied.  Good deal for the cost.

Reviews.Title: Nice, would have been five stars if the timer worked.
Reviews.Author: madmax
Reviews.Content: Quite happy with it. But the 'on for 4 hours after dusk' and 'on for 7 hours after dusk' settings don't work. It comes on at dusk and stay stays on all night. It will need an external timer to shut it off at a realistic hour, which isn't so bad since I want a timed lamp in the room.Good value, but the QC is lacking.

Reviews.Title: PERFECT
Reviews.Author: Alejo
Reviews.Content: HAVE A SECOND HOME OR LEAVING FOR A WHILE? GET THIS, PLUG IT IN, PLACE IT NEAR A WALL AND NO ONE CAN TELL FROM THE OUTSIDE THAT THIS LITTLE GADGET MAKES THE ENTIRE ROOM LIGHT UP LIKE A REAL TV. HAVE THIS IN MY SUMMER HOME AND IT LOOKS AS IF SOMEONE IS WATCHING TV FROM THE OUTSIDE. AWESOME GADGET. WILL RECOMMEND IT.

Reviews.Title: Great for when you are out of town
Reviews.Author: Char SRQ
Reviews.Content: I have had one of these for several years and always use it when I'm away.  It looks so authentic when you see it from the street.  I always tell my neighbors about it so they won't think I actually left a TV on while I'm away.  I ordered this one so I can also have one showing from my backyard window.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: efren campos
Reviews.Content: really like these  fake tv burglar deterrent  !!! i feel safe walking in my house  knowing the fake tv is on ,really feel safe and it really works

Reviews.Title: great!
Reviews.Author: paula genovese
Reviews.Content: this product is great, it really does look like a tv through closed curtains and it is an interesting nightlight too..

Reviews.Title: Burglar Deterrent
Reviews.Author: Georgi Macdonald
Reviews.Content: When looking from the outside in it appears there is activity going on inside the house. That is exactly what I was looking for and the timer is great so you can have it come on when you need it. I would highly recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: It works really well...
Reviews.Author: M. E. Munoz "Jack of all Trades"
Reviews.Content: I chose this after searching for a device that was more than just a light that turned off and on.  The FakeTV really looks like a TV in a dark room from outside.  Our house is positioned about 175 feet from the road and even from the road you can see the light flickering.  This would give anyone scoping out the area a second thought about targeting the house.There are 3 settings for the FakeTV.  The first is "on" which will keep the FakeTV on all the time.  If I had this unit on a timer, this is the setting I would use.  The other 2 settings are "dusk+4 hours" and "dusk+7 hours".  The first setting is meant to be used in the summer time when it gets dark later in the day so if it gets dark at 7pm, it will turn off at 11pm approximately.  The other setting is better for winter use where it gets dart at around 5pm which will mean it will turn off at about 12 midnight.  The only bad thing about those 2 settings is that it seems to get confused by lights.  So if you go into the room and turn on the light for an extended period, it seems to reset itself and will then go for darkness+4 hours again based on when you turn off the light.  In these cases, it would probably function best with a timer attached to it.Still with that limitation in mind, I would still give it 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: love my fake tv
Reviews.Author: canonapple "applecanon"
Reviews.Content: it's great for upper apts  or bedrooms. becuase it doesn't have sound, you don't want to set it up near winds or doors of first floor dwellings.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Donna Darling
Reviews.Content: I live alone and work mostly at night. When I leave the house, I find it comforting to know that it really appears like someone is home watching the TV. I can't even tell myself when I'm outside looking in if it's real or not. Expectations were exceeded.

Reviews.Title: Works as advertized.
Reviews.Author: M. Wende
Reviews.Content: At first I thought this was a bit gimmicky but once I had it in hand I was pleased.  It sits unobtrusively in the front room and flickers and flashes just like a TV is on.  The two time setting work well and compensate fot the changing sunset times throughout the year.  I would recommend this as another deterrent to folks who might think no one is home.

Reviews.Title: Works like a charm!
Reviews.Author: B
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a break in deterrent when we go on vacation. The last time we got home, my neighbor asked who had been staying to our place. They were convinced that someone had been home watching tv. This thing is great.

Reviews.Title: good idea, poorly made
Reviews.Author: KTB
Reviews.Content: This is a great idea but the timer doesn't work, it turns itself back on in the morning.  It works when its on but is not reliable.

Reviews.Title: Looks like they shipped me a returned item
Reviews.Author: Mark D Armerding
Reviews.Content: I received this item in its own cardboard box. Inside the box was the FakeTV, its power supply, and the original packaging materials all torn up. It looks like this FakeTV had been returned, and the seller put it all in a cardboard box and shipped it to me. This would not have been a problem except that I discovered why it was returned -- the power supply was dead. The seller apparently did not test the unit when it was returned to them. Fortunately I have several old power supply units, and I found a compatible one. The FakeTV works fine with a functioning power supply that I provided.I would have given this item 5 stars except for the shoddy handling by the seller. If I had not had a compatible power supply, I would have had to ship the whole thing back.

Reviews.Title: We have purchased 4 of these
Reviews.Author: House Flipper
Reviews.Content: We purchased a single Fake TV for our home and found it to be so realistic that we bought a 2nd one for our upstairs window and set the timer to stay on for a longer period of time- it looks like someone is restless downstairs and then goes upstairs to watch more TV.We then bought another one to place at a family member's house that's become vacant and it is very realistic, definitely gives the impression that someone is living in the home.I just purchased a 4th one for a rental house we are renovating to give it the same appearance of being occupied until we have a tenant in there. Overall, if you have drapes covering your windows, a timer on a few lights and one of these Fake TV's you can feel pretty confident that your average smash and run burglar will go elsewhere. Highly recommend!

Reviews.Title: Excellent!
Reviews.Author: Mark H. Blangger
Reviews.Content: My house was broken into a couple of years ago and I planned an 8-day vacation last year. Wanting to ensure I wasn't broken into while I was gone, I looked for burglar deterrents and came across the Fake TV and am very glad I did. I ordered 2 and did a nighttime comparison between the Fake TV and my actual TV from outside at night. Even with the blinds closed, there was no difference. I highly recommend this product if you're wanting peace of mind while away.

Reviews.Title: Works Great So Far!
Reviews.Author: VCA
Reviews.Content: It works great and simulates an actual TV. Looks very real from outside. So far so good! It also says it doesn't take much electricity-which will be great.

Reviews.Title: I love it.
Reviews.Author: Donna Wojcik
Reviews.Content: This is a nifty little gadget. Looking at my house from the street, you would swear that someone is watching TV. I am a "snowbird", so my house is left vacant for months at a time, but with some light timers and Fake TV, you sure wouldn't know it.

Reviews.Title: Fake TV deterrent
Reviews.Author: Judy Lucariello
Reviews.Content: I have used this every night since I purchased it.  I think it should be a little slower when changing brightness to make it more authentic.

Reviews.Title: Some reservations
Reviews.Author: Charles Haseltine "Charles the Social Worker"
Reviews.Content: I like the idea.  It would better suit me if there were a way to moderate the brightness electronically.  Configured as it arrived, the intensity of the lights is unrealistically bright to be coming from a smaller (less than 32") TV.  It looks phony from the outside of my bedroom.  I had to find a way to diminish its brightness, like place it under a table.

Reviews.Title: Fake TV
Reviews.Author: Richard Yakich
Reviews.Content: Terrific product.I have no further comments. This word total is stupid. I wont be reviewing any more products because of this. Why require  a large amount of words when one or two are sufficient.

Reviews.Title: Great Product!
Reviews.Author: zdravez
Reviews.Content: Nice, sturdy built; simple to use and install.At first this product seemed too simplistic and I wondered what good would an LED flashlight be as a burglar deterrent. But then I sat outside my vacant building and watched it work - I felt satisfied and my buyer's remorse (from spending $30.00 on and led flashlight) disappeared. The effect of a working TV was spot on. However, bear in mind that burglars are not morons (for the most part) and you would need some source of noise too (radio perhaps) to complete the illusion of a TV working. Hence the 4 star rating - this product needs to be coupled with some timed source of noise... then it would be PERFECT.Still I would recommend it as a BUY.

Reviews.Title: This thing is smaller than you think it's going to be, and that's a good thing
Reviews.Author: Safety Third!
Reviews.Content: It casts light as if it's a full-size TV, but it's about the size of a car GPS. From the outside, it looks like a large tv is playing inside. Great product.

Reviews.Title: Product is very convincing
Reviews.Author: Jim
Reviews.Content: About 2 weeks ago, my neighbor, a couple of houses down from me, was robbed around 9 pm at night.  I decided that it was time for me to do something about protecting my own home.  I knew about FakeTV from something that I remembered reading a year or so ago.  So I checked to see if Amazon had it (what doesn't it have) and what the reviews were like.  I ordered it and it arrived very quickly.  Initially, I thought it was smaller than what I expected but I had reason to use it that night.  As it got darker, I placed it so that it shined on our translucent shades and plugged it in.  I went outside and if I didn't know that I had FakeTV I would think that someone was home watching tv.  And that's the message that you want to get across.  I've used it several times since then (the timer feature, 4 or 7 hours is an added bonus) and am very satisfied in the way that it works.  I would give it 5 stars but it is brand new and I expect the product to work perfectly right out of the box (and it does) but let's see what the history of using it for months is like before I upgrade the rating.

Reviews.Title: Great product, looks just like a TV is on from outside.
Reviews.Author: MNJon
Reviews.Content: From the outside with the blinds drawn, it looks just someone is home watching TV. The timer is works great. A cheap home security investment that it more than worth the money if you travel a lot.

Reviews.Title: love it great buy
Reviews.Author: Ray S.
Reviews.Content: works great puts my mind at ease easy set up good value glad I bought it will tell my family

Reviews.Title: fake tv
Reviews.Author: Thomas gorospe
Reviews.Content: bought a second one for the upstairs bedroom, its like someone is always home don`t leave home without it on

Reviews.Title: Fantastic
Reviews.Author: Stan57 "Stan57"
Reviews.Content: I usually set up a couple of these when I go away, one of which is in the room where I normally watch TV when I am at home.  They look pretty convincing.  I add to the effect by putting a lamp that I usually use on a timer set to go off at my normal "bedtime."

Reviews.Title: Great burglar Deterrent
Reviews.Author: BAK
Reviews.Content: From outside the home, it indeed gives the illusion that someone is watching TV inside..I put mine on an electric timer and program it to set times.I would recommend it to anyone looking for burglar deterrent devices.

Reviews.Title: not quite there yet !
Reviews.Author: P. McConnell
Reviews.Content: great idea but definitely not bright enough and photo sensoris very picky. to be effective you need to put it on the windowsill.

Reviews.Title: Security deterrent
Reviews.Author: DFM
Reviews.Content: When I leave for a week, I put this in one of the rooms to make it look like I am home in the evening.  Leave a radio on during the daylight hours on a timer too.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Ted Santos "doowopted"
Reviews.Content: I use it to make it look like my TV is on when I am not home or also you can put the timer on and it will come on at night. Works fine.

Reviews.Title: fake tv
Reviews.Author: dana segner
Reviews.Content: seems a little point less  and a  burgalar that watched it for 10 minutes would know it was fake ,unless the were dumb as a rock

Reviews.Title: If you travel away from home, this is a must have!
Reviews.Author: Heyho
Reviews.Content: We have this on a timer and feel much safer leaving our home and possessions whenever necessary. Most of our friends have never seen or heard about this and were very impressed.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: Jesse
Reviews.Content: Works as described. From the outside it does mimic a television. Very easy to set up. Would definitely recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Looks real
Reviews.Author: amber
Reviews.Content: Had my doubts about this being a hokey item, but it actually looks real. A bit bright so we angled it back a bit, went outside & looks exactly like someone is home watching TV from the sidewalk.

Reviews.Title: Cheaper than a TV!
Reviews.Author: Rich Hanzel
Reviews.Content: I had a tenant give me three days notice when vacating and I didn't want the apartment to appear empty.  I put this on a lamp timer and voila . . . some one is home!

Reviews.Title: A great little device well worth the money
Reviews.Author: Shirley A. Long
Reviews.Content: This is a great unit for a smaller room. I also purchased another one that was for a little larger room.  Friends are shocked to see that that little unit really does make it look like there is a TV on in the room.  A very good burglar deterrent.

Reviews.Title: Very convincing!
Reviews.Author: Ingo R Johnson
Reviews.Content: I bought this to supplement my other home security devices and I must say, it is a very convincing simulator. Hooked it up one evening and went outside and walked by the house from across the street. It does give the impression of a TV on. Highly recommend this deterrent!

Reviews.Title: Great product!
Reviews.Author: esotto
Reviews.Content: This is a great little device.  It's well built, simple to operate, and does exactly as advertised.  From the outside of my home, I can see the bright lights flickering exactly like a real TV.  The unit is also much smaller than I anticipated it would be...which was a pleasant surprise.

Reviews.Title: Just enough to keep a thief guessing.
Reviews.Author: distantdark
Reviews.Content: I would have been happier if it had a built in timer but you can always add that between the unit and the wall.This thing works. It looks like you have a TV on at night. Just enough to keep a thief guessing.

Reviews.Title: Looks like a real tv in on.
Reviews.Author: mc
Reviews.Content: I have had one for several years and recently bought a second one for another family member.  This really looks like a tv is on inside a dark room.

Reviews.Title: Works For A Small Room
Reviews.Author: Mrs. Sillah
Reviews.Content: I purchased this device for  a very large family room, but it wasn't bright enough to illuminate the room.  I put it in a very small bedroom in the front of the house and it works great.  It's not powerful enough for large rooms.

Reviews.Title: Best Deterrent for Burglars
Reviews.Author: Mark Simon
Reviews.Content: Must have over any other deterrent out there.I have had many people tell me they thought I was out of town, but saw someone watching TV upstairs...works better than advertised!!!

Reviews.Title: Great deterent / security devise
Reviews.Author: joezep001
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my mothers home while she was in Florida for 3 months. It worked great every night and still works.

Reviews.Title: Exactly as stated in product description
Reviews.Author: Debi Simon
Reviews.Content: Works perfectly,and have used it at one of my properties for months.  Well worth the minor cost. It fooled the neighbors so well that I've gotten calls from people worried a vandal may have broken into one of homes as they could see a TV on and ask if they should call the police.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: Tony Zaderej
Reviews.Content: These fake TV devices ARE GREAT!  Even after being on every night foralmost 2 years it still fools me and our neighbors.

Reviews.Title: Great idea for cabins/basements
Reviews.Author: AJBeastro
Reviews.Content: I purchased one of these for my basement that isn't lived in but has a walkout and several windows that someone could peep into.  It truly looks like someone is in bed watching TV.  I'm hoping that any potential thieves would move along to the next place seeing something like this in action.  My folks have one of these at our lake house too.

Reviews.Title: Love it!  This is the coolest burglar deterrent!  It truly looks like someone is in the room/home watching TV with the lights o
Reviews.Author: Amber Quintana
Reviews.Content: It truly looks like someone is in the room/home watching TV in the dark.  I have it set to come on every night.  You can see it from the windows and it truly looks real.

Reviews.Title: works just fine
Reviews.Author: W Woody "Woody"
Reviews.Content: This little device works very well, in fact I bought an extra one for  my brother in law. Thumbs up.

Reviews.Title: Even tricks the Family members!
Reviews.Author: Lady Caroline
Reviews.Content: We have three of these on each level of our home and turned them on when we went out of town.  We had our mom pick up any UPS packages left on our porch to make sure no one knew we were out of town.  We didn't tell her about the Fake TV's and wanted to see if she said anything.  Matter of fact, she said she stopped by our house with a friend at 9:00pm and said she stared at the house and couldn't understand why someone was inside our home watching TV.  She said she thought maybe we came home early but that didn't make sense since she just talked to us.  She said she stared at the house and waited for someone to walk by. It really gives off a motion and energy that someone is inside the home.This even tricks the person who is watching your home while you are out of town.  Brilliant. :)

Reviews.Title: neighborhood watch member
Reviews.Author: Nancy K. McLain
Reviews.Content: After attending my first neighborhood watch lecture from the local police department. I was very impressed with all the information the officer presented. She  explained that she used the "fake television light" in her own home as well as other safety measures. My husband set it up in our house and I was really surprised as to how much light the product emitted. The instructions were also very clear as to where to set the device up for maximum efficiency. Until the presentation from the police officer I had never heard of the device. I think it is a wonderful addition to safety device.

Reviews.Title: Great product!
Reviews.Author: Peter R Veilleux
Reviews.Content: This thing does what it says. Looks just like someone is watching tv. Can use for any time you go on vacation.

Reviews.Title: Looks Real.
Reviews.Author: P. K. 72
Reviews.Content: Does the job when your not home. Place it so a person cant see it when they look in a window, and they will think it is a TV .Has a built in timer that work great. For what it is ,couldnt have bought anything better.

Reviews.Title: Better than perfect!
Reviews.Author: Sb
Reviews.Content: Hooked this up to a timer along with an old radio. The people watching my house called me while we were on vacation to confirm that we didn't leave the TV on.  Once we arrived home turning off the timer wasn't on my mind. Freaked my wife and I out when the "TV" came on upstairs! I highly recommend this for the illusion of someone being home.

Reviews.Title: Very clever device
Reviews.Author: Clifford L. Ascensio
Reviews.Content: We placed this device in a bedroom of one of our houses that are currently vacant. 2 days later we received a call from one of our neighbors stating that someone was in the house watching TV. We explained that we just installed Fake TV.We're happy to know that this device is doing its job!

Reviews.Title: Perfect!
Reviews.Author: Joan
Reviews.Content: Purchased two. One was the extra bright but I see not difference in the overall effect. I prefer the outside casing of this one over the extra bright model.  I don't really like the extra bright casing that has displayed on the front "Fake TV." Visitor (workman, handyman, etc.) enters the home and sees sees the device and you just announced you have a fake device.

Reviews.Title: Excellent security device
Reviews.Author: Amazon Frequent Flyer
Reviews.Content: This little unit is totally believable - bright light, dim, flickering, color.....everything you would "see" to tell you someone is home watching TV.  Plenty bright enough.  You just need to find the sweet spot.  It is perfect in my spare room since there is a moon window at the top that points towards the street, and another window with wooden blinds that you would walk by to the front door.  I dare anyone to second guess this.  Totally looks like someone is home and watching TV.  And having in the spare room, I never have to worry about it bothering me in my bedroom or any other room of the house.  Great for someone who works late, lives alone or has unpredictable hours....or just worries.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: a customer
Reviews.Content: I bought this a few years ago, and just love it.  I can see how it would deter unwanted intruders!  In my opinion, it looks completely realistic.  It is one of my purchases that I'm very proud of.

Reviews.Title: Looks like the TV is on
Reviews.Author: P. Groth "norsk dancer"
Reviews.Content: This is a great little device and makes us feel more secure having it on when we are gone or not.  :)

Reviews.Title: Great gadget! Does the trick!
Reviews.Author: Gadget Girl
Reviews.Content: I love this thing because it's so simple and works exactly as expected.  Makes the house looked "lived in" even when I'm out of town.  Highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Cool idea
Reviews.Author: James "JW"
Reviews.Content: Works well.  Auto light sensor and timer make it good for long term burglar deterrent.  Looks just like a real TV from a distance.

Reviews.Title: This thing really works!
Reviews.Author: J. C. Evans
Reviews.Content: This fake TV, paired with a timer, is a great addition to home security. Looks exactly like a tv from outside.

Reviews.Title: A LITTLE item with a BIG benefit.
Reviews.Author: C. Walper
Reviews.Content: What a great LITTLE item.  Makes it look way more like people home than lights coming on now and again.  No timers to fiddle with.  And the little size makes it easy to set up anywhere.

Reviews.Title: Innovative product
Reviews.Author: Stephen A. Almeida
Reviews.Content: Neat concept and it really works. From outside the house it looks just like a tv is on. The timer feature is clunky but adequate.

Reviews.Title: Terrific
Reviews.Author: Karen D. Mohr
Reviews.Content: Works great...happy with purchase....just as described. From outside it looks as if my tv is on. I feel safer with it.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding product! Highly recommended.
Reviews.Author: W. Pollard
Reviews.Content: This isn't brain surgery. Just a simple tool to foil would-be burglars.  This product is exactly as advertised, no hype.Easy to use. Works like a charm. Well worth the price.  Fool the bad guys and keep your stuff. AND the company stands behind their product.I couldn't be more pleased.  I'm thinking of buying another for a friend.

Reviews.Title: Simulater
Reviews.Author: Alice J. Grankowski
Reviews.Content: Item works as stated, we set it up with a timer. one by TV one by PC.The next day shipping ON TIME was great too.Thanks

Reviews.Title: Fooled My Neighbors
Reviews.Author: R1VideosdotCom
Reviews.Content: We left for a week and my neighbors were so fooled - they thought we were home watching TV the whole time. We we pulled in the driveway they asked if we left the TV running. This thing really does look just like a TV is on against your closed blinds or through glass that not clear. I put it on a timer plug. Had for about a year or so and it still works perfect. Great little security device!

Reviews.Title: you will
Reviews.Author: Nancy Barry
Reviews.Content: laugh every time you come home at night with this thing pumping its rediculous tv beams out against your shades. knowing full well how cheap those little leds are to run and what a great and convincing job they do.

Reviews.Title: It does the job!
Reviews.Author: retired educator
Reviews.Content: A good value for the money and it does replicate the look of of a real TV. I use it  in a second floor bedroom that is unused withno interior lights on!

Reviews.Title: Fake TV is GREAT !
Reviews.Author: Billy J Farmer
Reviews.Content: This is a product that any traveler should have in their home. It truly gives the illusion that the TV is on.It is easy to use and very portable. I now have one on both levels of my home.

Reviews.Title: thumbs up
Reviews.Author: marilyn caruso
Reviews.Content: I ordered it for a close  relative who wanted it.  works well and i am glad that i decided to order it but making me put unnecessary words is silly

Reviews.Title: Makes it look like someone's home.
Reviews.Author: J. Newton
Reviews.Content: Bought three of these (actually, 2 of them were the FTV-11 extra bright), as we've started to have some burglary in the neighborhood.Works as-advertised and very simply. I comes on with darkness and runs either 4 or 7 hours.You can also set it for constant on and use it with an external timer.I do that to make it look like the TV viewer is moving around the house. Also lets it come on in the dark (like early AM  when you leave for work before dawn like me.Even this smaller one is bright enough to show through thin roller shades on both sides of my house when it's pitch dark.If there is a downside, it's light changes are pretty dramatic at times and makes it look like you're watching action movies on commercial TV all the time.Still, beats static night lights for peace of mind while you're out.

Reviews.Title: 5 star
Reviews.Author: Mark Manas
Reviews.Content: My purchase with Amazon went smoothly. I first saw this  item when I was visiting friends. I purchased it as you know and it looks like a real TV is on. The random color and time patterns was consistent with what I observe when walking down the street. I haven't consulted with any buglers at this time (LOL) but as a board member of our local civic association when have had Police Officers  tell us to leave a tv on  when away as a deterrent.  I am also considering putting  a radio on a timer so there seems like voices. Highly recommend this product and well worth the price for a little more peace of mind. Well done!

Reviews.Title: Does The Trick
Reviews.Author: Drew
Reviews.Content: This thing really looks like a TV from outside.  I set it up and took my daughter outside and pointed up tot the window.  She got scared and said, "who is watching TV in there?" (no one else was home).  So I assume it would fool the bad guys as well.  This unit has a light sensor that allows it to switch on when it gets dark outside (at dusk).  There are two settings, "Dusk +4 Hours" and "Dusk + 7 Hours). My only complaint is that the "Dusk + 7 Hours" setting goes WAY beyond 7 hours.  I have found that thing blinking away at 3:30 AM, when dusk was about 4:30 PM.  So the bad guys would think there is an insomniac watching TV in the middle of the night - maybe not such a bad thing, but not what it is supposed to do.

Reviews.Title: What a simple but incredible idea!
Reviews.Author: Ari Zagnit
Reviews.Content: There have recently been a number of break-ins in my neighborhood.  Knowing that we were going away, I've been looking in to a number of solutions as visual deterrents.  I remember seeing this featured on the Today show and looked into it further.It definitely works as advertised and looks very realistic from the outside.I highly recommend this device.

Reviews.Title: big idea in a tiny package
Reviews.Author: Eastern Shore
Reviews.Content: I travel a lot and worry about securing my empty house. I heard about this and decided to give it a try. First, it's smaller than I thought--about the size of one or two bars of soap. Second, it's bright! I debated between getting this one and the more expensive one that is brighter and am glad now that I chose the cheaper one. I positioned it to face blinds and, even when they are completely closed, the Fake TV looks like a Real TV from outside. This is true even though I have a street light right outside my house. Could a criminal study the light long and hard and conclude that it's not a real TV? Maybe. But most break-ins are crimes of opportunity when a burglar sees easy pickings in an empty house. If a television MIGHT be playing in a dark room with one or more people in there watching that TV, I'm hoping the criminal will decide to move on down the line. I will update if it doesn't work over the long haul but everything worked out of the box exactly as it was advertised to do.

Reviews.Title: Perfect Simulation
Reviews.Author: Scott Robertson "-Scott"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this item for our vacation home in the mountains.  Let me tell you it perfectly simulates what a TV looks like in a dark room.  When we pull up to the cabin when it's dark, it looks EXACTLY like someone is in the house watching TV.  It should put enough doubt into anyone's mind that someone may be home that I think they would stay away.You have to be careful that nobody who might try to peek in the windows can't see this thing, otherwise the jig is up.This unit is the smaller of the two, not sure how bright the larger unit is, but this one is adequate for a large bedroom.

Reviews.Title: Very Deceptive--works well
Reviews.Author: Timothy J. Ryan "Drair"
Reviews.Content: I like it and it works as described. Be sure to go outside your home and see if it is producing the desired effect.  I had to open the mini-blinds just a little bit to let more of the light out, for example.  It has 4 modes: on, off, on at dusk for 4 hours, and on at dusk for 7 hours.  I also use a light timer in the room with this and sometimes the light will defeat/fake out the FakeTV, but then when the light goes off, the FakeTV comes on again. I actually like that because it seems more random and mimics the way a real person might use their lights and TV.

Reviews.Title: Works great!
Reviews.Author: Nan Herrig
Reviews.Content: Plugged it in and went outside in the dark and I'll be darn--does look like someone is up in the bedroom watching TV.  GREAT!!

Reviews.Title: Works exactly as intended
Reviews.Author: Larry R
Reviews.Content: Much cheaper than a real TV, and the programming's really not that much less interesting<g>. Seriously, this device functions as intended, and will actually detect sundown, turn itself on, and then turn itself off after a configurable number of hours. Probably not enough by itself to deter the bad guys, but definitely a worthwhile component of a larger burglary prevention strategy.

Reviews.Title: makes room look like a TV is on
Reviews.Author: cc
Reviews.Content: The product does what they say. With a choice of two "on" intervals, 4 and 7 hours after dusk, the flickering RGB LCDs really look like a TV is in the room. As long as outsiders can't see the very petite unit, the illusion is great. Small size is deceptive - it puts out a TV's worth of random light.

Reviews.Title: Really Works!
Reviews.Author: Gumbo148
Reviews.Content: We just began using the fake tv, so can't speak to the longevity of the product, but so far we're more than pleased with it.  We partially closed our blinds in the room we set it up, and at night we walked outdoors and were amazed at how much it emulates a real tv.
