It will really add to our sense of security, as would-be thieves are becoming more wise to the timed lights but might be more hesitant to try approaching a home where a person is apparently home watching tv. (at least that's what we're hoping!).

Reviews.Title: Great little unit
Reviews.Author: wlee
Reviews.Content: Very nice little unit. I wasn't sure which model between FTV-10 and FTV-11, so I bought both. I like this FTS-10 better and $10 cheaper.

Reviews.Title: This really works!
Reviews.Author: Compass
Reviews.Content: Several homes in our area of nice homes were broken into over the last year.Ours was not.  I think this is a good deterrent.  No one could tell from the outside that it isn't a real TV playing.It is very inexpensive and for those of us who can't afford the tops in security, these will do just fine.

Reviews.Title: perfect
Reviews.Author: Meticulous
Reviews.Content: It needs to be placed close to the window in order to work good. After proper placement, it makes it look like the TV is on at only a fraction of the cost to run it

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Anonymous
Reviews.Content: I bought two of these, one for me and one for my father.  It shipped quickly and arrived well packed.  It works as described.  For home use it comes with a AC to 9V adapter.  I built a cable so I can plug mine into a 9V battery and use it on my boat without the need to draw on my batteries.

Reviews.Title: Works like it should
Reviews.Author: JG
Reviews.Content: This is great to leave on when away from home. It really looks like a TV is on. Great idea

Reviews.Title: Works as advertised
Reviews.Author: Edward R Pellegri
Reviews.Content: Easy to set up and light is bright with colors and random pattern.  Nifty idea to give the appearance someone is watching TV.

Reviews.Title: Keep out trouble makers.
Reviews.Content: Great product.  Almost looks like an aquarium sometimes.  Yah, I noticed my neighbors have more problems than I do at night.

Reviews.Title: Great addition to an alarm system
Reviews.Author: Twig
Reviews.Content: Very realistic!  Works great with it's own timed settings or can be used with a traditional timer for more options.  Very quick delivery.

Reviews.Title: great tv effect
Reviews.Author: Rich D. "Rich D."
Reviews.Content: From the outside of the house it looks like flickering colors of tv light through the tightly closed blinds.  It goes on at dusk fine but I haven't seen it go OFF after the 4 or 7 hour settings.  It is still on in the morning.  I haven't figured out what I might be doing wrong.  I can live with it.

Reviews.Title: Good Idea
Reviews.Author: Craig D. Zimmerman "Craigy"
Reviews.Content: This really does look like a TV set is on, when viewed thru blinds or curtains.  The built in timer makes it an easy to use, compact unit.

Reviews.Title: Really does look like a tv is on.
Reviews.Author: elmaestro "elmaestro"
Reviews.Content: I face it towards the wall so it reflects off the wall and back onto the blinds.  Bought one for a friend who is out of town a lot too.,

Reviews.Title: Outstanding security product.
Reviews.Author: Gumball
Reviews.Content: These units are amazing to give the illusion of a TV on in a room.  They have two different time length settings and come on with the dimming of room light.  We have used these for years in our business and home locations.  We place them so they are not in direct vision through the windows and they flood the room with a flickering light similar to a TV screen.We have not used the extra bright units but I am sure they work equally well.  In the very dark these original units seem very bright to us and we notice they are easily visible from outside.  Perhaps in a more heavily lighted outside area the brighter unit would stand out?Wonderful security product - thanks.

Reviews.Title: THIS TINY GADGET REALLY WORKS!
Reviews.Author: Gina
Reviews.Content: It's everything I hoped for only more! Don't let the tiny size fool you...it does a big job !!! Love it! Will probably get more for upstairs.

Reviews.Title: A Real Keeper
Reviews.Author: Joseph R. Balint
Reviews.Content: This little, easy to use, device really lights up the room just as if the TV were on.  I was very pleased with its effect. It worked perfectly the whole two weeks while I was away.  Definitely as advertised.

Reviews.Title: Great protection when you are away from home
Reviews.Author: Flying Cat
Reviews.Content: It really looks like someone is watching TV in room where you put FakeTV.I also like the fact that it has built-in timer, so it automatically turns on from dusk and turns itself off after 4 hrs. It has 3 duration options.

Reviews.Title: Dude, turn up the lumens!
Reviews.Author: CORtempdoc
Reviews.Content: Great idea for a product.  Not very bright but looks real. Easy to setup.  Pretty much foolproof.  Very energy efficient.

Reviews.Title: Gives a little extra peace of mind when going away
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Seems gimmicky, but it really works. From the outside, it really looks like a tv is on in the room. The light sensor and auto shut off also add a nice bit of randomness.I first got this when I had to travel for 4 weeks during the holidays and no one would be at the house the whole time. I lived on a pretty busy street, so I didn't want it to seem like no one was around. With this and a few simple timers for lamps the house definitely seemed occupied and I felt a lot better about leaving.

Reviews.Title: Bit pricey for what it does but like it..
Reviews.Author: K Lee
Reviews.Content: Looks just like real TV but a bit expensive for what it does.  Also wish the colors changed a little faster.

Reviews.Title: simple & effective
Reviews.Author: Ethan "Gadzooks!"
Reviews.Content: When turned on, this product looks exactly like a TV from my window. It gives me a bit more piece of mind while I'm on vacation, and I don't need to worry about wasting electricity.

Reviews.Title: Well built, reliable and convincing..
Reviews.Author: W. Shelton
Reviews.Content: From outside the house, it really looks like a working TV in an occupied room.  After months of use, you forget about it, until you approach the unoccupied house at night, and are greeted with an "occupant". We've had it for 6 moths with flawless functioning.

Reviews.Title: Great product!
Reviews.Author: Kristen Hagen
Reviews.Content: Very nice! This product does exactly what it should. I will feel a little better now about leaving my house empty.

Reviews.Title: Someone's home watching TV
Reviews.Author: 1rene0
Reviews.Content: Love the FakeTV!!!!!  It really is bright and can be seen on the neighborhood street from far away!  I make sure the blinds are slightly open and aim this directly at the window.  Along with random lamps on random timers, this device is a must have!  If you live alone, it might just give you piece of mind just putting it in another highly visible room that's not occupied.

Reviews.Title: great in the dark, or in low lighting..smart !
Reviews.Author: BigCityMtnWoman
Reviews.Content: Seems very bright to me. It blinks lite about the room, in different colors, and certainly mimics a TV. I kind of think its sort of in 'action-movie' mode, as the lighting changes seem to be /kind of/ frequent.But it definitely shows thru to the outside of my home. Its smart. If someone needs a brighter model, they must be in a very brightly lit area.Typical streetlights or some low tv-watching lighting in that room do not deter its effect, they may enhance it  by toning it down a little. But its fine,  and very good on its own in a dark room. Or semi- dark! It saves electricity too, vs. the real TV that I have used for many years. Even when home….! Just because.. If you want the look of activity around your place, this is a good idea.

Reviews.Title: very good!
Reviews.Author: Lingitty
Reviews.Content: this product works as advertised. i'm so pleased with it i've just bought a second one to use in another room.

Reviews.Title: Simple solution
Reviews.Author: GoAir4Se
Reviews.Content: Plenty of brightness when 5 feet away from closed window shades. It seems the more expensive brighter model would be too much for my situation and look fake. This covers a large 4' x 8' window from 5 ft away.  It has a surprising small foot print.  It is subdued and does not draw attention unless you are looking at the house as a burglar would.

Reviews.Title: Unbelievably wonderful device
Reviews.Author: nanglo "Nannyglo's favorites"
Reviews.Content: FAB  U  LOUS !!!!!  Highly recommend this product. It is easy to use, takes up such a small area on table and from outside, I would swear the TV was on in the room.

Reviews.Title: Great product and it really looks like someone is watching TV
Reviews.Author: Lisa N. Palmer "LnicoleP"
Reviews.Content: This is a cool product and it really looks like the TV is on and someone is home.  We will use this every time we are out of town.

Reviews.Title: Good Product
Reviews.Author: WendyP
Reviews.Content: Looks like a TV from outside.  No sound.  Very happy so far.  Just used it once while I was gone for a week.  Can't speak to its long term reliability.  I put it on a timer.  I would recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Does Exactly What It Says  :)
Reviews.Author: J. Vincent Legg
Reviews.Content: This is the first television device on which the Kardashians finally make sense to me!Okay, in all seriousness, it's small, efficient, and does exactly what it says it does.The only thing that might slow a potential purchaser, is that I believe the same companynow makes a slightly brighter one (FTV-11), to better simulate the bigger TVs (40") of today…I used this one (FTV-10) successfully over a seven week vacation

Reviews.Title: Must have for travelers!
Reviews.Author: Rev Annie "Rev Annie"
Reviews.Content: Does the trick as we all know most have that TV on at night, so this works when not home!

Reviews.Title: Works great.
Reviews.Author: Thomas S. Pipia
Reviews.Content: Great little item that uses much less energy than a TV. Also works well with a timer. It's small size makes it easy to store when not in use.

Reviews.Title: Really works!
Reviews.Author: Randy
Reviews.Content: It really looks like someone watching a TV. Be sure to put it some place where it can't be seen by someone looking in the window. Leave a light on in the house in another room also. If you don't have an upstairs window close the drapes a little and us t that way. Just make sure its out of sight from the outside.

Reviews.Title: Looks like someones home.
Reviews.Author: Dennis A. Lepak
Reviews.Content: This is a very clever well executed device.  I put it in our guest room and it is always on unless there are guests present.

Reviews.Title: Nice tool
Reviews.Author: AG
Reviews.Content: Our new home was undergoing some construction and we had to stay in a hotel temporarily.  One of my neighbors who knew we weren't living there yet asked if I'd left the tv on in the house by mistake. So yes, it works.

Reviews.Title: Looks real.
Reviews.Author: D. A. Brown
Reviews.Content: It really is very convincing from the outside. I don't know if it has actually prevented anyone from breaking into my house, but it definitely makes me feel better about leaving the house for vacations.

Reviews.Title: Acceptable
Reviews.Author: Martin Locey
Reviews.Content: It was as expected.  It's only flaw seems to be its low light level.  It is borderline acceptable, but I new in advance that the brightness level was low.  The price was right.

Reviews.Title: Great idea for home security
Reviews.Author: PeteW
Reviews.Content: Great idea!  Works just like advertised & love the easy to use,built in timer options.  Well worth the price.

Reviews.Title: Not as bright as I had hoped.
Reviews.Author: DMTOM
Reviews.Content: The effect is good, but the power is a bit less than I anticipated.  It's not quite as bright as I had hoped.  You either need to use it upstairs in a room with a window without any drapes, or you need to have very, very thin drapes for it to show through effectively.  I'm tempted to say I would rather just put my actual TV on a programmable timer like the GE 15154 that I bought for my lamp.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic!
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey Adler
Reviews.Content: Fake TV is a fantastic product. Simple to set up and indeed simulates a real LCD TV. I travel a lot for work so my spouse is usually home by herself in the evenings. Having the Fake TV on gives her peace of mind, especially since we live in a secluded area. Thank you.

Reviews.Title: Does the trick
Reviews.Author: Paul
Reviews.Content: Love it. Would buy more. Don't let the secret out. From the street or sidewalk a bad guy would think twice. Won't fool a super pro, but the regular bad guy will look for another place to do his stuff.

Reviews.Title: Too Cool
Reviews.Author: Holly L. Rousseau
Reviews.Content: This is too cool, outside it looked just like I was sitting in the house in the dark watching TV, just like I do at night.

Reviews.Title: Works great!
Reviews.Author: Anna Jar "AnnaJar"
Reviews.Content: We loved this so much we bought another.  From outside it definitely gives the appearance of having a TV on.  Our neighbors were amazed to learn that we had been away for 10 days.  It is easy to use and along with timers on lights, gives your home that someone is at home look.

Reviews.Title: Like it
Reviews.Author: MSgt Shirley A. Bristow
Reviews.Content: It does work and it really looks like a TV.  The suggestion I would have is to be able to put it on a random timer.  I put a timer on mine.

Reviews.Title: My fake TV is excellent!
Reviews.Author: Pattie Lomax
Reviews.Content: The fake TV is perfect for my needs!  I can't believe it works so well, it gives me piece of mind...

Reviews.Title: Happy Customer
Reviews.Author: Andrew R Brown
Reviews.Content: We have a house that will not be occupied for a few months and have taken every precaution to show that someone lives there now. We have been able to drive by during the nighttime hours and have seen it working and are very satisfied with the results. I am a retired  Police Officer with 30 Years experience and highly recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Great idea!
Reviews.Author: Chris Casperson
Reviews.Content: This item was even smaller than I expected and works great.  It senses darkness and starts working and turns off with a variety of options.

Reviews.Title: works just great
Reviews.Author: Bonnie F. Riley
Reviews.Content: Performed great for having the look of TV playing while I was on vacation. Made my home seem like there was someone watching TV.

Reviews.Title: Amazingly realistic
Reviews.Author: Patricia Barter
Reviews.Content: At first glance, $30 seems like a lot to pay for a "fake" TV, but this little device when viewed through closed curtains or blinds looks EXACTLY as though someone is watching TV. I like the fact that it can be progammed to come on at dusk and stay on for a few hours, or be on or off all the time. It adds an extra layer of security and peace of mind. I'm going to buy another for downstairs. It can also serve as a night-light - not flickering like a TV.

Reviews.Title: An Excellent & Very Convincing Anti-burgular Device!
Reviews.Author: M. Eads "Lizel"
Reviews.Content: By simply plugging this device in, and turning a switch on, you can simulate the effect of a flickering TV.  From the outside of the house, you would swear there is someone inside watching television in one of your rooms.  The device uses almost no electricity, and it automatically shuts off in daylight, and then turns back on when it gets dark.This may not be the only device you need to deter burglars, but I consider it in to be in my top 4 or 5 things I do when I leave.....besides locking my doors.I have two of these, and I will buy more for friends and family relatives.This is not a purchases...this is an investment for you and your family.

Reviews.Title: We'll-satisfied
Reviews.Author: James F. Puckett
Reviews.Content: I live alone and my house is in a remote, isolated location. I'm away from home for a few hours every night and have been concerned about home security. This product works quite well and now I'm less concerned about home security.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Product - From Outside the House it really does look as though the TV is being watched
Reviews.Author: R. Kirkes
Reviews.Content: This is excellent and inexpensive burglar deterrent. Installation is a breeze. All you have to do is plug it in, point it in the general direction of the window (or doorway if that is your preference), and click the lever to whichever of the four self-explanatory settings that you prefer. The time is limited to either 4 or 7 hours of TV simulation.The "Dusk" detector to commence operation does have one limitation. If you have a light on in range of this detector at dusk, it will not engage operation until this light is turned off. The 4 or 7 hours of operation will then commence from this point onward (so, if you have it set for "Dusk + 4 hours", it will run 4 hours).As I have stated above, from outside the house at night, the FTV-10 really does make it seem as though there is a TV on in the house.

Reviews.Title: Realistic effects
Reviews.Author: Robert Mault
Reviews.Content: It works as advertised-pleasantly surprised. Flickers, goes dark,gets bright, changes color, lightweight. Viewed from outside at night through closed mini-blinds on window, you would swear a TV was on inside the room.

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: susie
Reviews.Content: I've ordered 3 of these.  The first 1 was for myself, but loved it so much I gave to my sister.  Ordered a replacement for myself, then gave it to my son.  Finally, I have 1 for myself...we'll see how long I get to keep it!

Reviews.Title: Works as advertised.
Reviews.Author: Donovan Vernon Borman
Reviews.Content: I recommend this product for anyone who spends a lot of time away from home, and/or wants to let the world know someone is home whether there really is or not. The main benefit is it can be placed in any room, and uses a lot less power than an actual TV.

Reviews.Title: GREAT LITTLE INVENTION
Reviews.Author: Lo Ko
Reviews.Content: So simple to use. Plug it in, set the time option and done!It turns itself on at dusk and turns itself off according to time set.From outside it looks just like someone is home watching TV.I intend to buy another for upstairs.P.S. I also bought two signs from * Zanysigns*  1) BEWARE OF DOG /  2) THIS PROPERTY IS UNDER 24 HOUR SURVEILLANCEMessage to would be burglars: "Yes, we're home, we have a scary dog and smile, you're on camera. Move along".

Reviews.Title: Fake TV
Reviews.Author: Jaegermeister "Jaegermeister"
Reviews.Content: Great item to deter the casual burglar or vandal!  We have several and use them in various locations!  It truly appears that someone is home watching.

Reviews.Title: Works as advertised.
Reviews.Author: Curt Spacht
Reviews.Content: Does what it says. Works as advertised. Would purchase again. Who knows if it deters anyone  but it surely looks real form the outside. Just make sure no one from the outside can see it :-)

Reviews.Title: Looks like the real thing
Reviews.Author: Scott's Mom
Reviews.Content: What a great idea.  Before going on vacation, we set it up for a few nights to see how it worked and where the best location in the room would be.  My nephew and his girlfriend stopped by and asked who was watching TV upstairs.  That sold it for us. Make sure you go outside and check to insure that you can't see it.  We had to lower it in the upstairs bedroom instead of just sitting it on the actual TV.  In the living room, I discovered if I reversed the blinds when they're closed so someone coming up to the door would only be able to look up and can't look down through the blinds, I was able to put the Fake TV fairly close to the window. One important thing, test it first to get the best location for your house.  Also, if you have it set to dusk for four or seven hours, you can't turn a light on in that room or it will think dusk happened later than it really did.  For example, if you turn a light on at midnight, when you turn the light off, it will start again and be on for four or seven hours depending on your setting.  It also will not work correctly if a light comes on because of a timer.  As I said, what a great idea.

Reviews.Title: Fake TV ~ A must have in every home!
Reviews.Author: Patti Lind
Reviews.Content: Everybody needs at least 1 or 2 of these, in their home! It totally looks like someone is watching TV, from the outside. 'Highly recommend. I have had one of them for over 3 years....still going strong!

Reviews.Title: Does the job
Reviews.Author: Raja Mitri
Reviews.Content: One of the most practical deterrents available. It does a great job  particularly in upstairs rooms . I gave some to the some family members and they love them.

Reviews.Title: Looks like a TV
Reviews.Author: Laura Gregory
Reviews.Content: This is good for "pretending" the place is occupied, and does give the appearance from outside the house that there is a tv playing- we put it in one front bedroom-blinds closed,  timer on to get it to start and stop.

Reviews.Title: Unique product!
Reviews.Author: Susan Dillahey
Reviews.Content: Great Security addition. Easy to use! Just what we wanted. Easy to follow instructions Recommend this product as an add on feature to home security.

Reviews.Title: Works Well
Reviews.Author: Grand Dad in NC
Reviews.Content: Works well as stated. I would use it on the 2nd floor. Even with the blinds closed, you could possibly see it on the 1st floor.

Reviews.Title: Creates a real TV effect
Reviews.Author: Picky Shopper
Reviews.Content: This little gizmo does everything its makers claim: It simulates a 27-inch TV; comes on at dusk; shuts off at four or seven hours or manually; and is super-easy to use. I got it during a wave of break-ins in my neighborhood, and it's a welcome addition to my anti-crook collection!

Reviews.Title: Pretty good
Reviews.Author: Judy Barnes
Reviews.Content: Timer is off on the one I have. It kinda has a mind of its own, but that's okay - it serves its purpose.

Reviews.Title: Works as advertised
Reviews.Author: Fossil
Reviews.Content: As others have said, the varying glow seems to imitate a TV.  As long as your normal TV cannot be seen from the street, this product should work well.

Reviews.Title: Product works exactly like described.
Reviews.Author: Corey Bearb
Reviews.Content: I really like it, I should have purchased the brighter version.  However it works as described. I recommend the FakeTV.

Reviews.Title: Great idea!
Reviews.Author: Petunia's Mom
Reviews.Content: I purchased this because I live alone in the middle of nowhere.  I was leaving the TV on during the night and when I traveled so it would look like somebody was home.  This little box works great.  It is a bit brighter than TV, maybe the lights could be softened just a little.  This makes me feel a little more secure.

Reviews.Title: Fake TV
Reviews.Author: Steven Stokes
Reviews.Content: From the outside of my house you cant tell the difference between this and the real TV. It Flickers just like the real thing. Great Security if you go out. Leave a Radio on to a news station for background noise.

Reviews.Title: It works
Reviews.Author: Vince
Reviews.Content: Actually looks like a TV playing in dark room. Look at it from the outside of the house and looks real. Set up is simple, just plug it in, stays on for 4 or 7 hours after dark, or put it on your own timer.

Reviews.Title: Provides realistic lighting effects.
Reviews.Author: W. R. Oyama
Reviews.Content: When the room is dark, the Fake TV provides a light effect that lights up the room with changing light patterns like a real TV.  I like the four position control switch with off, dusk on with a 4 hour delay off, dusk on with a 7 hour delay, and an full time on position.

Reviews.Title: works wel
Reviews.Author: swimmerllegs
Reviews.Content: it has its own timer no additional timer needed.  package came later than I was told on line so I received it after a vacation and was not able to use it when I was away.

Reviews.Title: I love it.
Reviews.Author: Pat B.
Reviews.Content: Works great! Really looks like a TV is on. Makes me feel like my house is safer when we're not home.

Reviews.Title: NICE
Reviews.Author: Ryan " The Birtster " Birt
Reviews.Content: This little guy serves as a nighlight and sure as hell still fools me that isn't a TV and I live with it.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: luvtahiti
Reviews.Content: Product works as described. If you have heavy drapes, I would recommend the brighter model. It really looks like a TV is on from the outside.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Mad Max 057
Reviews.Content: This Fake TV is great. it comes on automatically and realistically reproduce the flashing a TV makes through blinds. I use it every time I go out of town.

Reviews.Title: I feel safer when I leave the house
Reviews.Author: Frances M. Mulvey "grandma7"
Reviews.Content: We put this in the kitchen when we leave, and it really does look like I'm home cooking or working on a project. We also have a light on a timer. Works great.

Reviews.Title: It works!
Reviews.Author: Kenneth Baker "Ken"
Reviews.Content: This is one of those "as seen on TV" kind of things.  I actually saw a review of this on one of the news shows and thought it looked interesting.  I was a little skeptical, but when I hooked it up (just plug it in, or plug it in to a timer, set it on a night stand, and forget it) and went outside when it was dark, it looked just like a real TV was playing.Since I use other timed lights, I found it works best if I close the door of the room it is in so the other lights don't block it out.  Pretty high tech and cool for this old guy.I am very pleased with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: It works as advertised
Reviews.Author: D. Owen
Reviews.Content: I bought this to use in a back bedroom.  At night you can't tell it isn't a real television set on, but  I'm also lucky I live in a neighborhood with a lot of night owls.  This gives me a little piece of mind in a big house, along with my alarm system.

Reviews.Title: A very clever device!
Reviews.Author: MacMaster "Lost Horizon"
Reviews.Content: The cost-efficient FTV-10 Burglar Deterrent gives the exact appearance of a flashing television screen. Point this clever little unit at any window, wait until darkness falls, then step outside your home for an investigatory glance: the effect is remarkably authentic, and the FTV-10 uses very little power, indeed--most highly recommended!

Reviews.Title: Excellent idea
Reviews.Author: Rik
Reviews.Content: I had been researching indoor alarms, strobe lights etc, for effective ways to scare off burglars and realized that you really want to keep them from entering the house in the first place.I live in Kentucky where self defense is still highly regarded and if there is any sign of an occupant in the house your average burglar will probably avoid the place.

Reviews.Title: Fake out the burglars
Reviews.Author: TTinLA "TT"
Reviews.Content: If you never get robbed with this thing turned on, it pays for itself.  But I guess you'll never know.  I wouldn't go testing that theory by leaving it off during a 2-week vacation though.  If anything, this gives you peace of mind.  It's also a nice conversation piece for when your in-laws come over.  For once, you don't have to sit in an awkward silence for minutes at a time, with nothing to talk about because you have nothing in common with them. Staring intently at the actual TV even though it's just showing commercials. Your wife doesn't understand why you're so uncomfortable during family functions, but it's like a tiny bit of hell for you. But seriously, is it their fault? Or yours? They seem friendly enough. Or maybe they see you as a loser as you suspect, and they're just putting up a front to make your wife happy.  And that is why you drink. And get tipsy. And embarrass yourself and reinforce the whole loser thing.But anyway, just make sure the curtains are closed and point this thing at them from the general area of your TV.  This along with timers for your house lights, and it looks like you never left the house! Which, if you had your way, would probably be the case. It's a cruel, awkward world out there.

Reviews.Title: very happy!
Reviews.Author: Leia "leia"
Reviews.Content: Great little item.  You set it up and then you don't have to think about it.  For the settings I've chosen, it just goes on at dusk and shuts off 7 hours later.  Simple and easy.  It looks authentic.  Some have complained it's not bright enough.  If you want it to show through blinds or shades you might want to try the new brighter version.

Reviews.Title: Good overall unit
Reviews.Author: Buckeye K9
Reviews.Content: Its a good unit overall, and it does give the impression that someone is inside watching TV. Very realistic... The only feature I would change, are additional time settings. ie: 1 hour, 2 two hours, etc.

Reviews.Title: FakeTV FTV-10
Reviews.Author: Linda
Reviews.Content: A small unit that does not take up a lot of room. Different choices of the time settings is convenient.

Reviews.Title: Amazing TV simulation.
Reviews.Author: Michael A Scioli Jr
Reviews.Content: This little gadget is unbelievable. From outside my house it appears exactly as it would if a actual TV were on.

Reviews.Title: Works like a champ
Reviews.Author: MCR "Former peak bagger"
Reviews.Content: The FakeTV worked like a champ. It was easier to set up than the timers we put on some of our lights. It was judged convincing by the folks who were watching our house while we were away. I can't say for certain that it discouraged any burglars as I don't know that we had any casing the house, but its operation gave us greater peace of mind than the timers alone would have.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Null Set
Reviews.Content: This is a great product, even better than the description!  When you drive by my house it looks like someone is watching TV, and would definitely act as a deterrent.  If it was a reasonable thing to do I would buy a few more, but our house is small :)

Reviews.Title: Small but effective
Reviews.Author: William Angel
Reviews.Content: I was a little surprised by the small size but it works as described.  Very realistic when viewed from outside.

Reviews.Title: Highly recommended.
Reviews.Author: Lou
Reviews.Content: FakeTV FTV-10 Burglar Deterrent.Great product. Works only in dimly lit room and has a 4 or 7 hour timer or continuously on.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely necessary for my total security system.
Reviews.Author: Mike Honcho "The Honch"
Reviews.Content: I have a dog that likes to bark at strangers. I have lights on timers indoors and exterior landscape lighting on timers as well. I also have a security sign and a security system in place. But to top it all off, Fake TV is set on a random timer in the office/spare room that faces the street.Whenever I walk the dog in the evening and my Fake TV is on, I am so amazed at how it really simulates a working TV. There's a couple of settings on Fake TV: On and Dusk Plus a Couple of Hours. I wasn't happy with how the Dusk+ setting worked, so I just keep the switch on On and let my random timer take care of business.

Reviews.Title: Great deterrent
Reviews.Author: M. Yaspan "marge"
Reviews.Content: An ingenious device.  It will turn on at dusk and run for either 4 or 8 hours.  We pointed it at a drawn curtain, went outside to take a look and were amazed of the realism; someone has the tv on so let's leave this house alone!  It does not heat up so there is no fire danger.  Gives us peace of mind, along w/ the alarm system.

Reviews.Title: Fake TV
Reviews.Author: Julie P
Reviews.Content: We travel frequently and welcome subtle but effective burglar deterrents. Fake TV works great in that capacity. We are very satisfied with this product and are happy with our purchase.

Reviews.Title: FakeTV
Reviews.Author: R. Mancini
Reviews.Content: I was afraid it would look strange from outside, but when it's used on an upper floor, it looks realistic from outside. It can even be tilted to be visible from several upstair rooms. I was also amazed at how quickly it arrived after ordering.

Reviews.Title: Move on...someone's home
Reviews.Author: Mary
Reviews.Content: Great little thing!  Three different settings.  Looks like a TV is on.  It makes me feel more comfortable leaving my home.

Reviews.Title: This is Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Tara E. Thompson
Reviews.Content: Not only do I have one of these, but my friend does too. I recently recommended it to another friend as well. From the outside of my house, it really looks like a TV is on... I think it is a great deterrent!

Reviews.Title: Really works well
Reviews.Author: Allan Oakley
Reviews.Content: Saw this on some on television and I said it was perfect for our home.We back on to a public park but at night  who knows who is wandering around out there? Our house is very secure anyway but it always struck me that while we were away  the automatic lights were not enough of a deterrent. Now at sunset  on it goes for 4 hours. Even from hundreds of feet away it appears someone is watching tv. It may be psychological but for us the combination of alternating lamp timers and the Fake TV make us feel that it at least appears someone is at home.

Reviews.Title: Fake TV Works
Reviews.Author: Colleen Kelly "Colleen Kelly"
Reviews.Content: Purchased this item due to increased crime in our area. Just need to set a couple buttons and plug in.  Looks very realistic!

Reviews.Title: FakeTV Light is Effective
Reviews.Author: Ollivette Pearson
Reviews.Content: The FakeTV light provides realistic light variations that mimic a real TV.  The box is small, not intrusive and has a built-in timer.  I plan to order FakeTV boxes for other rooms.  NOTE:  The visual display is most effective in a dark room with the box facing the wall nearest the window. Bright lights lessen its effectiveness.

Reviews.Title: Feeling of security
Reviews.Author: joe carini
Reviews.Content: I bought one a year ago and was amazed by how well it worked that not only did I buy 2 more I bought one for a family member going on vacation. They loved it!

Reviews.Title: Almost perfect.
Reviews.Author: DMY
Reviews.Content: Great product. I was skeptical...but it is actually very realistic looking. I called my neighbor, (after dark, across the street) without telling her what I'd done. I asked her to look at my house and tell me what I was doing. Puzzled, She replied "Errrr?...you're upstairs watching TV." Little did she realize, I was calling her from 3,000 miles away on a business trip!My only complaint---The 2 "dusk until..." settings need to be capable of randomly going off. If the occupant in the home (a.k.a the timer) stops watching TV at the same time every night...that's kind of a red flag, in my opinion. What makes that issue better for me, is the fact that I've paired this item with the watchdog random light timer. I put 1 upstairs & 1 down. While the "TV" goes off at the same time each night, the watchdog light timers randomly go on & off, in no specific pattern. (10 minutes here, 30 minutes there) This helps to make the home appear that a person(s) is/are there.Overall--excellent product!!

Reviews.Title: Great fake!
Reviews.Author: Christine L. Wolf
Reviews.Content: Such a small gadget but it really works, really does look like a tv is on from outside the house. I prefer to turn it on and off manually than use the built in dusk + 4 or 7 hr timer because I need it to be on from a little before or after midnight. I will probably buy a regular timer for it.

Reviews.Title: Cheapest insurance ever
Reviews.Author: A Coustomer
Reviews.Content: It's extremely convincing from the outside when you have it set up according to directions - aim it at the wall that can be seen through the window, but don't let the device itself be seen. It uses a ridiculously tiny amount of power. There is no downside here.

Reviews.Title: minor problem
Reviews.Author: Valerie Gillis
Reviews.Content: Didn't give this 5 stars because it stopped working on the 4-hour setting a couple days after use.  So I put it on a timer and it works great. Still sad though, that it doesn't work as promoted on an "at dusk" setting.

Reviews.Title: Best gadget it a long time
Reviews.Author: m1
Reviews.Content: This thing really works good! its an idea you think of as you set your light timers, it would be nice to have a TV light flickering through the shades,I just happened to spot it in the line up on amazon, I real thought it would be another disappointing night light that had better advertising then a gadget that really worked as you would assume. O.k. I just got to try it. so It comes in the Mail thought it was smaller then it looked in the picture, I turned it on and WOW it's really bright so I place it near the window and with the blinds slightly open and ran out side, It looked just like a TV was on, I could not believe it works like it said it would, it has a built in timer that when it gets dark will turn on for 4 or 7 hours, that works good too, and a "always on" position as well. This is the best buy I have made in a long time when it comes to gadgets, found out they have a even brighter one, I am getting that one for the kids room, as long as a lamp is not between the FTV and the window you can see it flickering, if you point it to the ceiling it helps to spread the light out across the room, I am very happy with this little box, you can't go wrong to get one.

Reviews.Title: GREAT BURGLARY DETERENT..
Reviews.Author: Kenneth W Wells
Reviews.Content: WORKS AS ADVERTISED, IF IT ALSO HAD RADIO SOUND OR SOMETHING LIKE THAT I WOULD RATE IT A 5 STAR.RROM THE OUTSIDE, IT REALLY LOOKS LIKE SOMEONE IS WATCHING A TV PROGRAM.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Mimi Leonard
Reviews.Content: The Fake TV is all its advertised.  Its small enough to pack in a suitcase to take to the beach or vacation home.  The set was so easy that my 8 year old grandson read instructions and plugged it in for me.  We placed Fake TV in our spare bedroom, which is situated at the back of the house.  We use it even when we are home since that side of the house is more secluded.  Anyone looking over the back fence late at night would believe the house is occupied on all sides.  We are so impressed with the Fake TV that we are considering giving them as gifts to our family.

Reviews.Title: Fake TV is great!
Reviews.Author: Jim Larkins
Reviews.Content: Fake TV performs as advertised and does a good job.  It comes on when the room becomes dark and has a timer you can set for 4 or 7 hours.  I recommend this product!

Reviews.Title: Excellent Product
Reviews.Author: Robby Robinson "Globetrotter"
Reviews.Content: We were looking for something to make the house looked lived in while we were gone, and a couple of the neighbors let us know that they thought we were home, as the TV appeared on in the evening.  It works well and has a couple of settings to turn it off after a few hours.  Nice

Reviews.Title: Works great!
Reviews.Author: Lisa Corbett
Reviews.Content: I put this in an upstairs bedroom whenever we travel so it appears that someone is watching TV. It comes on automatically at dusk and turns off after 6 hours.  IT LOOKS REAL from the outside of the house!

Reviews.Title: Works great! I do recommend it! Fast Shipping too!  A++++++++++++++++++!!!
Reviews.Author: Liz
Reviews.Content: It's awesome! Works great! I do recommend it, but not only when you're on vacation, but also especially for ladies that do live alone. When they come home from a late shift or night out, it makes people believe there is someone home waiting for you watching TV while you're unlocking your door to walk in. Love It!Sincerely,Liz

Reviews.Title: The Best Fake TV I have Ever Owned!
Reviews.Author: Ed Lojko
Reviews.Content: Shipping met all expectations. My Fake TV arrived near the beginning of the promised delivery window.The product performs as described on the company's web site. The fake picture is marvelous. :-) It really does look like there is a TV on inside the house (at night) when viewing the draped windows from outside.

Reviews.Title: Flawless
Reviews.Author: JD
Reviews.Content: This items works great & fools everyone (including myself). The electricity usage is very minimal and should have very little to zero impact on your electric bill.

Reviews.Title: Sense of security
Reviews.Author: L. S. Prince
Reviews.Content: Looks like a real TV from outside. Like knowing that the house looks like someone is inside watching the TV.

Reviews.Title: super little device
Reviews.Author: L. Baird "skar23"
Reviews.Content: exactly as promised - simple compact and intelligent - standing outside  it looks exactly like someone is watching a television inside.

Reviews.Title: Does what it says
Reviews.Author: George M. Paquette "G"
Reviews.Content: This works. Haven't checked the energy used, but it does look like the TV is on and does what it supposed to do. Bought a 2nd one for the in-laws.

Reviews.Title: Great for home security.
Reviews.Author: Texas Book "Texas book"
Reviews.Content: I have 2 of these and I got another for a gift for someone. Would buy again.  From the outdoors it does look like someone is home watching TV.

Reviews.Title: Looks just like a real TV is on from outside the window.
Reviews.Author: Greg Grambor
Reviews.Content: We always used to leave a TV on in the house whenever we went away. Its cheap insurance. Well, lately my wife has been on an economy kick and is running around the house un-plugging anything with a dial lamp or a wall wort that feels warm. It drives me nuts but it has reduced our bill a bit. The last time we went away for a few days, she checked the electric bill. Four days of a TV running 24/7 added about $50.00 to our bill! When I finally got her calmed down, I told her about this nifty little gem which I had seen advertised on Amazon. She asked me to get it right away and it works great. Burns about as much juice as a night light and even has a photocell you can select so it switches on at dusk and stays on for a choice of 4 or 7 hours. Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: wonderful product.
Reviews.Author: ChristinaN
Reviews.Content: This fake TV flashes like a regular TV.  I have it upstairs in a bedroom, so it looks like the TV is on and someone is home.  Great burglar deterrent.

Reviews.Title: Love this home security gadget.
Reviews.Author: Jewelry Maven "Sports Lover"
Reviews.Content: Great for use in our home as well as our vacation home while we're not there. Simple to use, just plug it in and set whether you would like it to go on at dusk for 4 or 7 hours before it shuts itself off, or on concontinuously. Looks like the real thing. Very happy we purchased this. In fact, we'll be giving these units to family members for Christmas.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product look and works as discribed.
Reviews.Author: michael
Reviews.Content: I received product quickly with no issues with shipping. I purchased two and out of the box both units works great. I like how this products works automatically comes on at night and off during day. the product works great and I will recommend to my friends.

Reviews.Title: SURPRISINGLY REALISTIC
Reviews.Author: HB
Reviews.Content: I tend to be leery of gadgets such as this, and was prepared to send this back if it was not what it claimed to be. It is surprisingly realistic. From outside the house, you can easily believe there's a TV on.  I've only had it a week, so I don't know what to expect in terms of life span. We'll see. One observation: It only has two settings, 4-hour and 7-hour (or on all the time). I would like to see a third option that offers a random on/off cycle for a specific time period, which I think would be more realistic than a cycle that repeats night after night.

Reviews.Title: as real as it gets.
Reviews.Author: rojamsan
Reviews.Content: this item works like a charm, was asked by neighbors if tv was left on the night before. i guess it's doing its job.

Reviews.Title: fake tv
Reviews.Author: J. Cloward
Reviews.Content: Returned from vacation and nothing stolen so I have to assume we were lucky or this thing acted as a deterrent.I'll say one thing, it is a bright sucker and certainly could be mistaken for a tv

Reviews.Title: Actually simulates a tv.
Reviews.Author: Steve
Reviews.Content: I was skeptical at first, but from the outside of the house it really looks like the television is on. It give s me peace of mind when I am away from my rural location home. Nice simple product.

Reviews.Title: Lock the door & set your alarm anyway, but this is a very convincing "extra"
Reviews.Author: beckster943
Reviews.Content: This item is very convincing and fools people all the time.  From the outside, it looks exactly like a TV at a fraction of the electricity.Two main things to remember about the FakeTV:1) We use it on a main floor at a window with cellular shades.  This may seem like a no brainer, but dont use this if you have blackout shades or some other similarly heavy window covering. This will defeat the purpose :)2) we use this on the "wait for nighttime" setting, so it needs to be blocked from other light in the room.  It senses ambient light so if you keep an inside light on all the time, just keep something between that light and the FakeTV.All in all, we're very happy with this item and will be ordering more to give as gifts.

Reviews.Title: works great
Reviews.Author: Silent T... "Tony"
Reviews.Content: this item does what is described and works greatnow when we leave the house for long periods we can rest assured w. this set

Reviews.Title: Does the  job
Reviews.Author: ILuvMaine
Reviews.Content: I purchased this product after I bought a foreclosure that I needed to fix up before moving in.  The FakeTV really looks like you have an actual TV on in the house.  Easy to set up and shipping was fast.  I put it on a cardboard box in a room and hung sheer window panels.  The price is right and it uses very little electricity.

Reviews.Title: Seems okay to me
Reviews.Author: SHAWN P MCGILL
Reviews.Content: The unit is compact, and seems well-made. I tested it by viewing the effect from outside. It did look like a TV was on. I left it going in the bedroom, and then a couple hours later I walked down the hall and thought "Who left the TV on again?". If I fooled myself, it'd likely fool some criminal.

Reviews.Title: Superb!
Reviews.Author: tarac
Reviews.Content: I was away from home for 5 days. I turned it on for night mode. All the time it gave a feeling that I was at home. Problem solved :).

Reviews.Title: Great item!
Reviews.Author: Leticia Gonzalez "yTEL"
Reviews.Content: This just what I need it. It works great. Reviews are accurate. I feel better when leaving the house for a while. Highly recommended

Reviews.Title: A magnificent product...
Reviews.Author: Willy DelFango "Willy DelFango"
Reviews.Content: I initially purchased one FakeTV for a home in Mexico that is vacant most of the year. This device has been incredibly useful, so well that I purchased two more FakeTV devices, to set in other places of the home and give the perception that the home is not vacant.Operation, is very easy... Just set it in one of two modes, on or automatic (on at dark, off at dusk) and literally imitates the light pattern emitted by a TV being watched in the dark.The device works flawlessly, turns on and off on time every evening for the past year and a half, it does not get hot, it dows not make any noise and it does not consume much power, since it is LED based.The device is very small and compact with a very nice high quality build.I highly recommend this device, because I firmly believe that I have not been burglarized, because of it.

Reviews.Title: Works beautifully
Reviews.Author: jugador45 "jugador32"
Reviews.Content: Nothing to program. Four simple switch settings: off, four hours, seven hours and on. Comes on at dusk. Well made and solid. About the size of a pack of cigarettes. Generates random light colors of random durations. From outside looks for all the world like a TV is playing.

Reviews.Title: As Advertised
Reviews.Author: Sanjay Newton
Reviews.Content: I've got it installed near and upstairs window. I had to move a few items in the room I'm using it in, for it to look right, but now it definitely looks like a TV is on in the evening.

Reviews.Title: A little too expensive
Reviews.Author: cj mael
Reviews.Content: It will do as advertised. Seems economical and safe to leave on while you are gone, but if you have a cat...you might want to find a way to keep it ''way'' more solid wherever it sits. Cat's do funny things when nobody is around...lol. It's very lightweight. I attached mine to a square piece of 1x4 lumber, and it is now considerably more stable. It would be better if it were only about $15, instead of $30 or more.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: C. Land
Reviews.Content: Works great! I,love that we bought two of these. We simply love it and it works great! No problems yet.

Reviews.Title: TOTALLY CONVINCING!
Reviews.Author: Sergio Peckinwoo
Reviews.Content: In a era of poorly made products that don`t live up to extravagent claims, it`s nice to come across an item that truly delivers the goods and is affordable also. The illusion that a TV is on from an outside perspective is flawless and REALLY looks like someone is home watching the tube, especially with the intermittent changing light patterns. A small price to pay for giving the bad guys cause for pause!

Reviews.Title: Really looks like a TV is on from outside the house
Reviews.Author: Lorraine M
Reviews.Content: This is a fabulous burglar deterrent!  Everyone knows about lights on timers, but when it looks like a T.V. is on in your house, why would a burglar take a chance on coming in??  We went outside at night to look at it, and it DEFINITELY looks like a T.V. is on inside the house.  The nice thing is that you can set it to come on at dusk and automatically go off 4 or 8 hours later - otherwise it would look suspicious if on all night.So good, we bought a 2nd one for our vacation home!Highly recommended!

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: SCAT
Reviews.Content: Looks like someone is home when we are away . We even turn this on when we are at home , because our dog seems to like the light , he lays down in the bedroom floor if the light is on .

Reviews.Title: FakeTV does what bit says.
Reviews.Author: Hank.
Reviews.Content: This product simulates the lite given off by a tv and performs exactly as described. I couldn't tell the difference.

Reviews.Title: WONDERFUL....
Reviews.Author: Speechless
Reviews.Content: Excellent little gadget ever....loved it so much, I had to buy another one for the back room....you will love it too.....:)

Reviews.Title: Looks Like You're Watching TV
Reviews.Author: Shopperholic
Reviews.Content: A nice looking deterrent.  Placed it so it shines near a side window by the front door - looks great from the street.  After being burglarized during the day (with my real TV on loud), I realized there's only so much you can do, but this is cheaper than burning out the tv.

Reviews.Title: Very Reliable
Reviews.Author: WilliWu
Reviews.Content: Mine has been running continuously for more than a year with no problems. Recovers after power failures with no action on my part. Creates very realistic TV pattern outside a guest bedroom. I've given several as gifts and they all like them.

Reviews.Title: cool device
Reviews.Author: bruce m schulbaum
Reviews.Content: This inexpensive device really looks like a TV is on. I use it whenever I travel along with lights on timers and outdoor motion lights. It looks like I'm REALLY there!

Reviews.Title: Outstanding
Reviews.Author: Kevin J. Emmett
Reviews.Content: What an idea. Looking at the front of my house at night with Fake TV running in the front room, really gives the impression that someone's watching TV in there.

Reviews.Title: Good low tech deterrent
Reviews.Author: Shopper
Reviews.Content: I read about this in an article about theft deterrant.  Sounded like a good, inexpensive idea and the reviews on Amazon spurred me to buy it.  I have it near an upstairs window facing a blank wall.  When I come home at night, it looks like a tv is on in the upstairs room.  That's all I need.  Wish it had a timer or you could set it for different hours than the two options but it's ok the way it is.  Serves its purpose.

Reviews.Title: Very Convincing Deterrent
Reviews.Author: RickRed
Reviews.Content: The "Fake TV" is small, but puts out a lot of light. it changes color and flickers, just like a normal TV. it looks like a real TV when observed outside the house, but uses just a few watts of power. I bought two, one for the front room and one for the back of the house. The light sensor works perfectly to turn them on at night. I did need to reposition one so the Infra Red light from my surveillance camera did not shine on the Fake TV light sensor. Very happy with the performance of these "Fake TVs"

Reviews.Title: It does the trick!
Reviews.Author: Maya
Reviews.Content: Robbers beware! It really looks like a TV is on. I've cased my own house just to see what it looks like and it definitely looks like someone is home. I feel safe with it.

Reviews.Title: Bought a FakeTV - Great - might buy another
Reviews.Author: Coomanthemite
Reviews.Content: I just bought a FakeTV.  Everything that I expected!  No problem finding an appropriate location.  Especially like the feature of being able to turn it on for continuous operation, or on at dusk, remaining on for 4 or 7 hours. Can be used with regular timer, as well.  Might suggest a new feature of on-at dusk then 2 hours.  Very pleased with the product.

Reviews.Title: great product!
Reviews.Author: Dan
Reviews.Content: The product came quickly. I tried it out the first night and it was amazing!  really looks like there's a tv on inside the house.

Reviews.Title: Fake TV FTV-10 Burglar Deterrent
Reviews.Author: Pinky Ong
Reviews.Content: The  Fake TV was everything I expected and more. I am using it and bought them for friends & family.

Reviews.Title: Best Purchase Ever!
Reviews.Author: rnd.....
Reviews.Content: When I plugged this in, I thought.....Ya, this is going to work.... I just wasted bucks big time!  Along came sunset and Ta Dah!!! I love to drive by my house when no one is at home and see all the activity! Awesome, believable and genius!  I will be purchasing another for the back of my house.

Reviews.Title: Great item
Reviews.Author: H M Ward
Reviews.Content: This is a great item-- works as expected.  Wish there was a way to adjust the times when on "auto" mode to better reflect when I actually watch TV-- but otherwise, wouldn't go on vacation without using it at home!

Reviews.Title: Bang for the Buck
Reviews.Author: MtnMama
Reviews.Content: Our small town has been plagued recently by numerous burglaries; for the money, this is the best anti-burglar illusion yet.  The "TV" lights are programmed so randomly that my neighbor was completely convinced.  Just be sure that the little box is set so that it can't be seen directly through curtains.  I'll continue to recommend this product to folks who want to outwit the bad guys.  Thanks!

Reviews.Title: Cool Idea
Reviews.Author: Katie
Reviews.Content: Awesome idea, works great! I use it when I am away and I have a peace about my empty home now. I would recommend this to anyone even as a gift!!

Reviews.Title: CFC bulb light doesn't turn it off automatically
Reviews.Author: Erick
Reviews.Content: I would have given it 5 stars if it turned off automatically when I turn on my TV room's CFC bulb (13 watts).  It seems the light from the bulb is not bright enough, but it's not a big deal.  I usually have to unplug the unit, and plug it back in.  Strangely enough, the unit doesn't turn back on until I turn off the CFC bulb.  Regular bulb light turns off the unit automatically.Others have said that the unit's light is not bright enough to be seen from outside, but if you turn it towards the window, the unit's light is bright enough to be seen through blinds from outside.Erick

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Virginia F. Smith
Reviews.Content: It works just as they say. I went out of town last weekend and I felt very safe with the fake tv going.

Reviews.Title: This fake TV works great
Reviews.Author: CRN "writer's mom"
Reviews.Content: Read about this in the paper.  Had a trip planned so I ordered one.  It works just like they said it would.  My neighbor told me that I must have left my TV on.  Hope it fools any bad guys too.

Reviews.Title: This is our 2nd one
Reviews.Author: Nancy
Reviews.Content: It is so great that we are now buying them for people we love, Just set a timer and plug it in. It comes on every night in a spare bedroom and looks like someone is watching TV until about 4:00 in the morning, Looks amazing from outside.

Reviews.Title: Great for empty house
Reviews.Author: Jeff S
Reviews.Content: We use our FakeTV every time we leave on an overnight trip.  It, along with other tricks, makes our home occupied while we're gone.  Love it!

Reviews.Title: Great device!
Reviews.Author: safe harbor
Reviews.Content: This really does the job.  From outside it looks as if the tv is on. I have a more secure feeling when I leave my house knowing that this device will come on automatically .

Reviews.Title: Worked great!
Reviews.Author: S. Wrede
Reviews.Content: This worked exactly like I wanted it to.  I first tested it one evening before we left on vacation because I wanted to make sure that it would look real.  It did!  A stranger walking by on the street would never have known that there wasn't actually a television on in our upstairs bedroom.  I do suggest pulling your blinds/curtains to help to dissipate the light a bit, which in my opinion makes it look more convincing.

Reviews.Title: really effective
Reviews.Author: jay y2ktranz
Reviews.Content: I have purchased 3 of these and plan on buying more as gifts for family. The plug it in and leave it ability makes security a breeze. The product also doubles as a really cool night light while its on. I have installed alarm systems for many years and this is one of the best deterrents I have ever seen.If you harden your security(good locks ,clear brush from around your house, exterior lighting and a couple of well placed timer lights)and use one or two of these there is no doubt in my mind that burglars will avoid your home.

Reviews.Title: Works great.
Reviews.Author: Corey Brennan "bubbajones_1"
Reviews.Content: It does exactly what it says...I hooked it up and went outside to see for myself, and it does make it appear that a TV is on.  The unit is plenty bright.  I used it in a second floor bedroom with the blinds down, and I could see the "TV" from my driveway.

Reviews.Title: I am a repeat BUYER of this product.  I gave it as a gift to someone special.
Reviews.Author: aGUYinFLA
Reviews.Content: I am a repeat BUYER of this product.  I gave it as a gift to someone special.  I have had my 2 units now for several years.  A great product!

Reviews.Title: Incredible idea
Reviews.Author: William R. Vincent "Mr Hytech"
Reviews.Content: This thing really works well.  The random light patterns are very realistic - I would challange anyone watching the reflections on a wall to tell the difference between this unit and a real TV running in a dark room.  The designer(s) of the pattern / color generator circuit deserves kudos.  The most important thing is to install this in a room where it CANNOT be seen by anyone peeking into any window or door from outside - preferably on a second floor in the front of the house.  If it's on a first floor, make sure that any nearby "real TV" set cannot be seen as being "off" while the light show is running.  That would be a dead give-away.  And yes, it is bright enough to see its indirect light reflecting on walls, ceilings, etc.  I live in a rural area with no streetlights, so I'm not sure how it would perform in a bright city environment.  The unit triggers itself when the room is dark - not semi-dark, but dark.  That means no nightlights nearby or incident light coming through a window.  If those conditionsa are met, it will perform very well.  On one hand, I wish the best of luck to this company with this clever product, yet on the other hand, I hope it doesn't become so popular that would-be burglars get wise to it.

Reviews.Title: Great Light Show
Reviews.Author: fotoRon "fotoron"
Reviews.Content: Great idea, works as it should using LED color lights to imitate a TV screen.Easy to use and set up. Cool to touch.  Compact enough to store in a drawer when not in use.

Reviews.Title: Good theft deterrent
Reviews.Author: Jodi Eaton
Reviews.Content: I already own two of the Fake TVs.  I actually purchased this one as a housewarming gift for a friend who lives alone.  From my experience, anyone looking at your home at night will think a TV is on (and therefore, that someone is home).  I have one set up in the back bedroom, and one in the bedroom along the side of the house.  Those are the places where a burglar would be less likely to be seen by neighbors or pedestrians, so they are the perfect place for a little added security.  They are quite bright, and mine are very noticeable even from as far away as the back fence.  Therefore, anyone looking for a house to break into would not even come into my yard.  They are definitely worth the money.Note - I don't think they would be noticeable during the day.

Reviews.Title: Very impressed
Reviews.Author: Ken
Reviews.Content: I am very impressed with the quality and finish of this product, it definitely does not feel cheap or flimsy . I like the timer. Outside it really looks like a tv is on inside the room. Another added feature is that it uses very little power.

Reviews.Title: Works as Advertised
Reviews.Author: Jim Bob Traveller
Reviews.Content: The light is a little dimmer than a real TV, but the effect seems to work.  No one broke in while we were away.

Reviews.Title: Great light
Reviews.Author: Julie Livingston
Reviews.Content: I really like this light. From the outside of my home at night, this light looks like the TV is on. The light changes the intensity just like a regular TV. This is a great theft deterrent.

Reviews.Title: Love this Burglar Deterrent
Reviews.Author: Mari "Mari"
Reviews.Content: This is the second FakeTV FTV-10 Burglar Deterrent I have purchased, I just love this product. It looks real from the outside and I really feel it has worked because my vacation house has not been broken into while my neighbors were.

Reviews.Title: fake TV
Reviews.Author: J. Mullins
Reviews.Content: This does the trick, it really appears that someone is watching TV in the room where it is placed. Very clever invention.

Reviews.Title: Number one item
Reviews.Author: Richard Spivey
Reviews.Content: This is a dotnated gift that I use for my talks and people just love this item the most. It's perfect. Thank You

Reviews.Title: Fake TV
Reviews.Author: SeeMcSee
Reviews.Content: It works great! I bought this for my mother's home after she passed away, while I was going back and forth taking care of clearing out the place.  The power cord is a little short, but it does what it is supposed to do.

Reviews.Title: perfect!
Reviews.Author: Tung Mau Vu "dark star"
Reviews.Content: i have it for almost 1 year now. works great! standing outside of my house, it looks just like the TV is on. automatically turns on when dark  or hook it to a timer

Reviews.Title: Awsome
Reviews.Author: Jan
Reviews.Content: I had a pair of the slippers already, so knew that I liked them. Easy to clean and help "dust " the floors while walking!The Fake TV looks jsut like real, from outside you can't tell teh difference!

Reviews.Title: Works like a charm!
Reviews.Author: Allan Douglas "Movies 'n more"
Reviews.Content: Small (3" x 3"), simple, and with options I didn't even expect.  Photoelectric eye turns it ON automatically at dusk and OFF at my choice of either 4 or 7 hours later.  Plenty bright and produces a great random TV effect.  What's not to like?

Reviews.Title: Perfect Mimicry
Reviews.Author: S.Moon
Reviews.Content: This product beat my expectations.  We set it up on a nightstand in the bedroom and pointed it at three windows with shades on them.  There is also a triple glass slider door with vertical shades in the room.  With the bedroom door left open, there is enough light to activate it to come on automatically.  We chose dusk +4 hours, the other choices are on all the time or dusk +7 hours and off.  This can also be plugged into a time and the switch on the unit put to on to choose other times to use it.It is spot on for mimicking a TV.  The LED's are white, green, red and blue.  The light varies in intensity, going from bright to almost dark, with flashes of color, just like a TV does when no lights are on in a room.  We went outside and could see the lights around the periphery of the window shades and around the vertical shades on the slider.  It looked like someone was home watching TV.  Perfect!The only surprise I had, which was a good one, was the size.  I had ordered soaker hoses that came in the same order and the invoice showed the hose and the Fake TV to be in the box.  I couldn't find it at first because they had put the box inside the hose coil.  It is 3x3x2.5 inches in size and the box isn't much bigger.Such a simple concept and it does exactly what it's designed to do.

Reviews.Title: Terrific!
Reviews.Author: kbear "kbear"
Reviews.Content: I wanted the house to look like it was actively lived in when I wasn't there or even when I wanted to sleep and not worry about break-ins.  I set it up just under a window and it comes on/off via a timer and looks from outside like the TV is operating in the room. If you have a radio on a talk station you can also set it so the two together will make the home look alive.

Reviews.Title: Fake TV Burglar Deterrent
Reviews.Author: Louise Bailey
Reviews.Content: I live alone now and like the added security of being able to use this device to make it appear that someone is at home when I am away.

Reviews.Title: liked it
Reviews.Author: Tami L. Bednarz "spitfire"
Reviews.Content: I only gave it 4 stars although it likey deserves 5, but I just plugged it in to see it work.  Did not need it for some time, so I guess time will tell how well it works and how much I really like it.

Reviews.Title: Conviencing from outside
Reviews.Author: Twinrigger
Reviews.Content: Like the other posts have said well - this is an excellent burglary deterrent at a cheap price.  I've on several occasions and have now bought extras as gifts for the family.

Reviews.Title: More Than What I Expected!!
Reviews.Author: Natasha L.
Reviews.Content: I know what the advertisement said about the product, but I was not going to be 100% sold until I used it. It works EXACTLY like you said. It looks like the shadow of a real tv. If the product continue to work and the lights do not burn out, I am totally happy with it. Thanks for your product.

Reviews.Title: Very convincing in 2nd story room
Reviews.Author: James R Witte
Reviews.Content: Best if used in second story room. Very convincing light show when viewed from below.  We leave ours on every night to provide similar image of house whether we are home or away.

Reviews.Title: Works very well!
Reviews.Author: M. Mills
Reviews.Content: I was quite surprised at how well this works - it really does produce light that, when viewed through a shaded window, looks just like it comes from a television.It is important to note that if you have a bright outside light in the vicinity of the desired window, then you won't be able to see it as well - or even at all.  In my case, I placed the device in a bedroom on a dark corner of the house in question - and in this location, it works very well.  The window has mini-blinds, and is on the second floor - I cracked the blinds open, just a little bit, and placed the device on the bed, facing the window.I'm very pleased with this purchase.  I don't write a lot of reviews, but I thought this device deserved one.

Reviews.Title: Fake TV Burglar Deterrent
Reviews.Author: K. Gascon "book browser"
Reviews.Content: We all want to take steps to keep our home safe while we are away.  We lock our doors, we stop the mail, have lights on a timer, but this new device is taking it one step further.  Now while you are away your home will actually look like there is someone still in it while you are away!!  You can set this product to off, on, on continually, or on for just 4 hours starting at dusk.  Anyone who drives by will see the glow of what looks like a tv reflected out the window.  No one would ever think that no one is home.  This is the best low cost deterrent you can possibly get.  5 star rating for sure!!!

Reviews.Title: great deterrent
Reviews.Author: Scott J Dworkin
Reviews.Content: We use this at our house, and being at a crowded metro intersection, it's better safe than sorry! that's for sure.

Reviews.Title: Not bad... but $$ for what it is
Reviews.Author: InTheKnow
Reviews.Content: Much smaller than I had expected but thats not a bad thing (only a few inches wide). Works well, and I'm happy with it. I'm in the electronics manufacturing industry though, and suspect that the unit could be sold at 1/3 the price while still making 50% profit.

Reviews.Title: Works fine, a bit pricey
Reviews.Author: Kekolohe
Reviews.Content: Seems to work fine, but was a bit pricey.  I wonder if I've made the eleven word limit yet?  Yes?

Reviews.Title: Works as expected
Reviews.Author: Annie Tayong
Reviews.Content: This product works as promised. Set it up and when your house is dark you can see it out side @ the window (TV like light flickering ).Hoping this will deter unwelcome guests...

Reviews.Title: Amazing effects!
Reviews.Author: CaryBMW
Reviews.Content: House got broken into and this thing turns itself on when it senses darkness.  From the outside of the house, it looks like someone is in the house/room watching TV and it works really well!

Reviews.Title: Great little product
Reviews.Author: Bargin Hunter "lexusdcs"
Reviews.Content: Does  what it says. The effect is very realistic. i think this product would be better if priced way less.

Reviews.Title: There's Just No Downside!
Reviews.Author: LoveThatRonWhite "avidreader"
Reviews.Content: Set it and forget it. . .you can put this in a seldom-used back bedroom, turn it on, and you have instant occupancy.  The sensor causes it to turn on when it gets dark, and since this is variable, it's hard to tell that a timer is at work.  Genius!  Puts out a good bit of light, enough to serve as an effective night light, and makes it hard to tell exactly who is where in the house from the outside.  Could easily be grumpy old Grampa with his shotgun holed up in the guest suite. . .who's going to be stupid enough to take chances with that?  This is a good security product, an effective burglar deterrent.

Reviews.Title: Remarkably small
Reviews.Author: S.L.
Reviews.Content: When I received this I was surprised at how small this was - about the size of a small clock. When first testing it, like most people, when we open the package during the day time, I was wondering is this going to fool anyone? But then when I waited for night, and made the mistake that most people who don't read the instructions (come admit it...you follow the principle of when all else fails reads the instructions) - I aimed it at the window.When I looked outside, I was still thinking this isn't going to fool anyone. Finally my wife, said point it the other way (which is what ths instructions state), then sure enough. Hey it looks like someone is watching TV inside! The indirect light flickering against the wall really does look like a TV is on. For the price, this is a good product. Glad I purchased it.

Reviews.Title: Works perfectly
Reviews.Author: Mark E. Weber
Reviews.Content: This item was recommended by an alarm company. It works just like as advertised on TV. Gives your house that lived in look.

Reviews.Title: Good, Useful, and Fairly Priced Product
Reviews.Author: K. R. Mudgeon "Kerr Mudgeon"
Reviews.Content: Works exactly as advertised.  Have used it at our home when we are out, and my realtor wife uses it in houses that are vacant but are staged (with costly furnishing and decorative items) for sale and inspection by potential buyers. A good value that was delivered very promptly.

Reviews.Title: amazingly realistic
Reviews.Author: KingLerxst
Reviews.Content: looks like a real tv.. it would be perfect if this had a built-in actual timer.. instead of "7 hours after dusk" or "4 hours after dusk.." or "on." you need blinds to make this look real from outside..

Reviews.Title: Does the job
Reviews.Author: Roger Martin
Reviews.Content: It is simple to operate, and the three modes are useful. I would prefer to have a fourth mode as many timers do; i.e., a RANDOM mode that would turn the box on and off randomly for 10 hours after the time it senses sunset.

Reviews.Title: Even fooled my neighbor!
Reviews.Author: Rainy Day Runner
Reviews.Content: It is difficult to say whether or not it kept a robber away this last week while we were out of town because you never know if someone showed up and then left thinking you were home. However I did get a text from my neighbor across the street while I was gone saying that he knew I was out of town and wondered if I kept my TV on in my room. It was exactly what I wanted to hear! This thing totally looks like a TV from outside and my guess is it is the cheapest anti-theft device one could hope to find.

Reviews.Title: Looked very real from the outside
Reviews.Author: Joan
Reviews.Content: Worked amazingly well, from the outside it really does appear the TV is on, very realistic, it is very hard if not impossible to tell the difference as compared to a TV running in the same room

Reviews.Title: Fake TV works!
Reviews.Author: Lola
Reviews.Content: I bought this product a few months ago, and it has made we feel much better about leaving my home!  Anyone going away for a few hours or days would find the set up very easy.

Reviews.Title: Works Great
Reviews.Author: Petpal
Reviews.Content: The Fake TV works as advertised.  We set it up and when approaching our house it does look like there is a TV on. I love the timer that it has. We have only used it a few days, will be interested to see how it holds up.

Reviews.Title: Protection
Reviews.Author: Old Salt
Reviews.Content: Fake TV is a great product to dissuade would be thieves from breaking into your home.  It simulates the light of a real TV perfectly and has a built in timer.  I highly recommend this device.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!
Reviews.Author: LAKEGARDENER
Reviews.Content: LOVE THIS THING. OUR SON DROPPED BY AND SAID THAT DID WE KNOW THAT WE HAD LEFT THE TV ON UPSTAIRS. JUST THE EFFECT WE WANTED SINCE WE'RE LEAVING ON 2 WKS VACATION.

Reviews.Title: Works like a charm
Reviews.Author: Mango Ramekin
Reviews.Content: This item arrived and at first didn't think it was big enough to put out enough light. I was wrong. I set this up with a cheap on and off timer and waited till night. I walked outside to see what it looked like and it was plenty bright. I did some adjusting of position to fit my needs and it does look quite realistic for a TV playing in a room. Very pleased so far.

Reviews.Title: Effect is similar . . . .
Reviews.Author: dklj
Reviews.Content: Effect is similar . . . . to a very small TV. If there is indoor or outdoor ambient light the effect of simulating a TV is further reduced. More or brighter LEDs or both would be better.

Reviews.Title: Not what it looks like - from OUTSIDE your home!
Reviews.Author: Stephen L. Blythe
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a standard lamp timer to set up while away, knowing that it was about all I could do to make it look like just maybe someone was at home, when I found this product on Amazon. The reviews were good, so I ordered it. It is fantastic - it does exactly what it is supposed to do - from outside your home in the evening hours (it has adjustable on time) it looks just like someone is watching television. I suppose I could put a timer on the TV itself, but this makes so much more sense! My house is in the woods in a remote area - I felt much better being gone for five days knowing that this was there!

Reviews.Title: Just plug it in
Reviews.Author: Richard A. Glover
Reviews.Content: Very simple to use. We point it at the window and let it go 4 hours a night while we are away.

Reviews.Title: Works
Reviews.Author: Laurie Harmon
Reviews.Content: Works very well. I have walked the street at night in front of our house, looks like someone is home watching TV. Had it for over 6 months and still no problems. A YES for home security.

Reviews.Title: FakeTV FTV-10
Reviews.Author: JB
Reviews.Content: I bought this off another site 3 years ago. It does exactly what it says it will. It really looks like a TV is on in the room. You can set it to come on at night and stay on or you can do a dusk till dawn which will turn it off after 4 hours or 7 hours automatically. It's LED, so it uses virtually no electricity. The unit is very compact, but seems very well made and solid. Buy a ADT sign off of Ebay and one of these and you are good to go!

Reviews.Title: It's great
Reviews.Author: Robert J. Gay
Reviews.Content: I pulled the curtains over the window ( they are semi transparent) and stood outside and i would swear that my tv was on. They have a great algorithm lays the colors just right.

Reviews.Title: Fake TV
Reviews.Author: Chuck Borzileri
Reviews.Content: I like this device because it does look like a TV outside the home.It is programmed to go on at dusk for 4 to 7 hours and you don't have to mess with it everyday.

Reviews.Title: Works Fantastic
Reviews.Author: Robert Young
Reviews.Content: This little "FakeTV" works fantastic.  We installed it just before leaving for vacation.  The light from this unit is very believable.  We are now leaving it on every day, even while we are at home, so when we leave, there are no visible changes to the interior lighting patterns.  This is only one of many things you can do to deter burglaries.  We also got the Barking Dog Alarm from Home Safe (don't be fooled by other brands); another fantastic deterrent that works great.  Outside motion lights are also very important to your safety.  Stay Safe !!

Reviews.Title: Great Item
Reviews.Author: golfdog541
Reviews.Content: Excellent idea, and it really does look like a tv is on. We have a 55" LED in our master bedroom and the light from this little device is just as strong.  From the street it looks just like the tv is on in our upstairs bedroom.  We use it with a separate timer to get more flexibility in on/off times, which works great. Amazon got it to us quickly, as usual.

Reviews.Title: Super!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Wonderful burglar deterrent.
Reviews.Author: Juliette Brown
Reviews.Content: This  item makes it appear to have a tv on.  It beams colorful light in the room.  Can be seen from the front of my home.  Love it!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Very realistic
Reviews.Author: Mark A. Green
Reviews.Content: This unit is very simple to set up...plug it in and set one switch.  The lighting it produces is very realistic when views from outside the house.  It simulates a TV perfectly!
