Reviews.Title: Most burglaries happen during the day
Reviews.Author: Skyhawk
Reviews.Content: That's right, most burglaries happen during the day.However this is a useful deterrent at night. It is important to remember that most criminals are not deterred by lights. If the sun doesn't deter a criminal, neither will your 100 watt floodlight. In fact, some experts believe that lots of outdoor lighting only illuminates the criminals work area.What criminals do not like is a changing environment. If the outside of your house is relatively dark but you're using motion sensors to trigger lights, this is generally considered more effective.The FakeTV controls are not ideal. You have, OFF, DUSK + 4 HRS, DUSK + 7 HRS, and ON.The missing switch setting is simply, Dusk to Dawn.  About a decade ago there was a string of burglaries in our neighborhood, these burglaries generally occurred between 4 AM and 5 AM.  So, these burglaries occurred more than seven hours after dusk!  FakeTV would be OFF.I know of nothing better, hence the five-star rating.

Reviews.Title: Love this
Reviews.Author: S. Lane
Reviews.Content: Cool item.  Love the timer feature... Too expensive, but I do like this item.  Easy to use. I like the idea of this deterrent.

Reviews.Title: Works Great!
Reviews.Author: Robert L. Molfese "Bob"
Reviews.Content: Its amazing how well this simulates the light from an actual TV.  Looks like I'm always at home!!!  Love it!!!

Reviews.Title: Simple and Effective
Reviews.Author: SkyPig
Reviews.Content: I purchased one of these for my vacation cottage, which is unoccupied much of the time.  It's very effective.  Aim it at a translucent shade and it casts it's light on the shade.  From the outside, the light patterns cause it to look like there's a TV set on in the room.  It's very realistic.  It's simple, inexpensive and effective, too.  I'm so pleased, I ordered another for my home, to use when we are away at our vacation house! I would recommend this to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Great Deterrent!
Reviews.Author: RJ Hauswirth
Reviews.Content: We have it set up in a back room facing the window drapes and sitting outside it really does look like the TV is on. We use it with a timer.  Economical, easy to use, and when used in conjunction with common sense precautions (locked doors and windows) will add just another layer of protection.

Reviews.Title: Feel Safe
Reviews.Author: Angela M Barius
Reviews.Content: This gadget is in my upstairs window and it looks exactly like the TV is on when I am away.

Reviews.Title: Great product!
Reviews.Author: SANDY HUFF
Reviews.Content: This is a 5 star idea but I am giving it 4 stars because you have to be very particular about placement in the room. It took me several tries to find a spot where the bright white outline of the box was not visible from the outside, giving it away that it was not really a TV. Tho only other complaint is that it doesn't have a timer for coming on; it just comes on at dark. You can set the number of hours you want it to stay on but not the time to go off. In my real world I turn the TV in my bedroom on at 11 PM and set it to go off about 2 AM, I can't simulate that when I am away, without a true timer. All that said, I still love the product and would highly recommend it to anyone that is away at night.

Reviews.Title: Expensive?
Reviews.Author: Zobaz
Reviews.Content: $30 for this expensive?  Maybe so.  If you desire something which lights up a room like a TV whether or not you're home, has a built-in light-sensitive timer and uses minimal electricity give it a look.  It's been working flawlessly for me.

Reviews.Title: Great Deterrent!
Reviews.Author: wmh
Reviews.Content: The unit is smaller than I expected (good).  The on switch is easy to use.  Once set to go on at dusk, a single LED remains on so you know it's set and ready to go.  From the ontside of our house it definately appears that someone is in the room watching TV.  This is much better than another simple light timer.

Reviews.Title: Does what it says.
Reviews.Author: John D.
Reviews.Content: Product arrived promptly and was securely boxed w/o excessive packaging.  Easy setup: plug in, select 1 of 3 options, walk away.  2 of the options require darkness of dusk to activate so don't used timed lamps in the same room except in the always on mode.  Looks realistic from outside.  Returning from a trip I forgot I had set it up and was surprised to "see the TV was on" from several rooms away when I entered the house. Good low-cost addition to your home security.

Reviews.Title: Cool gadget
Reviews.Author: HoustonSue
Reviews.Content: We just set up our fake TV, and it is really cool.  I was AMAZED at the easy set-up, just plug it in, and it has a light sensor that does most of the work of figuring out when it is needed.  Very affordable price, very cool concept.

Reviews.Title: would like more control options
Reviews.Author: R. No "train"
Reviews.Content: its nice, but there is limited control as to when it is on and off.it would be nice if it were possible to set a reandom time delay or more specific hours of operation.

Reviews.Title: Great product !!!!
Reviews.Author: Kelldogg
Reviews.Content: Looks so very realisitc. Point at a wall and from outside it looks real !!! Great bang for the buck.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product!
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Piscitelli
Reviews.Content: From the outside at night it looks just like someone is home watching tv. So worth the money! Works great.

Reviews.Title: Fake Tv Burglar Deterrent
Reviews.Author: Sterling Gregory
Reviews.Content: Have trouble with the timing system but other wise works pretty good.  Husband  said would not recommend to another person.

Reviews.Title: Love the concept!
Reviews.Author: Shopper
Reviews.Content: We had some criminal neighbors move in next door.  I work 8 p.m. to 3 a.m. at a hospital.  I live on the 2nd floor and purchased two FakeTV's, one for the bedroom, one for the living room, along with keeping a radio set to a talk show format on while I was at work.  I never got the chance to go outside and look up at my apartment while the FakeTV's were on to see what they really looked like.  I had to have some sort of reassurance that my place was safe.  I guess the FakeTV's worked---the only home that was burglarized was the landlord's home who rented to the criminals.  As long as your home or apartment looks occupied, put lamps on timers, turn on the radio, and I also have the barking dog CD.  Before I got into my car I would wave at my apartment.  Might as well let them think that you're waving goodbye to someone at home.  I'm looking to buy a security camera that has a motion sensor to alert me when movement is detected and hopefully the security system will let me see my home via the internet.  Any suggestions?

Reviews.Title: Impressive compact unit with big effect
Reviews.Author: chacha4498
Reviews.Content: Projects onto translucent blinds, looks from outside the home like TV is on.  Easy to operate with options including dusk plus 4 hours.

Reviews.Title: really cool device!
Reviews.Author: Almond Joy "Dawnie13"
Reviews.Content: this device is so cool. kudos to the person who invented it! wish it was a bit cheaper, but will give us peace of mind while away, and that's priceless.

Reviews.Title: it really works.
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: Was skeptical but the FakeTV really looks like a TV is on inside, from the outside. We put it downstairs in the basement as our lights upstairs (on a timer) washed out most of the effect. In a dark room shining against a shade or something, it looks uncannily real. The light sensor on the unit works too, it turns off and on with a minimum of fuss.

Reviews.Title: exceeded my expectations
Reviews.Author: Joan Collier
Reviews.Content: I read the reviews before my purchase and this little flashing light box is just what I needed.  It's in an upstairs bedroom and the window can be seen from the street.  It only takes a few seconds to see that someone is home and watching TV. Thank you FakeTV!!

Reviews.Title: No Break-ins Yet
Reviews.Author: Larry M. Lauger
Reviews.Content: The product was reasonably priced, arrived quickly and was in new condition so I was quite satisfied with my purchase.  It's not very bright but if set up reasonably close to the window shades it does look like a TV is on inside the house and since many of us have a TV on most evenings it's good to show that face to potential thieves.

Reviews.Title: not enough time to test it, but......
Reviews.Author: herkjerk "herkjerk"
Reviews.Content: How can u go wrong with this fake TV. Haven't had time to test it but did plug it in to see if it works as stated.....it does ! Went outside and from a distance you can easily tell there is a TV on in the selected room. I then went up to the window and looked thru the curtain and could easily see the fake TV, and that let me know that i had it placed wrong. The fake TV itself should not be visible from any window, even thru a curtain. It should be out of view and only the changing illuminations should be visible....like on a light colored wall. I will now move it to hide it from view. I think this Fake TV will be a better deterrent than anything we have used in the past.

Reviews.Title: Realistic
Reviews.Author: J. Y. Fedorka
Reviews.Content: This is my 2nd one. The 1st has been on steadily for over 2 years with no problem. Uses only 2 watts/hr. Don't be put off by the very light weight. Don't use it on the ground floor.

Reviews.Title: Extra protection
Reviews.Author: Carolee
Reviews.Content: The Fake TV burglar deterrent is an added layer of protection against nighttime potential break-ins.  Especially helpful if you have to leave your home for extended periods of time because it activates at dusk.

Reviews.Title: Works Great!
Reviews.Author: Tomarti
Reviews.Content: When it arrived I was surprised at how small it was - I questioned whether it would be effective and frankly felt that I may have been ripped off.  Boy was I wrong!  It is amazing! YOU CANNOT TELL THAT IS NOT A REAL TV.I placed it at my vacation home.  The only problem I ran into was a neighbor who thought that I was wasting electricity leaving the TV on when he knew I was not there.  Now that I let him know the real story I fear that he is telling his guests, pointing to my house and explaining how cool my new theft deterrent is.  He also told me that the name "Fake TV" was apropos given that most shows on TV are fake.If you are thinking about getting this, think no more - buy it.

Reviews.Title: Works best in dimly lit rooms with sheer draperies or shining on 2nd floor white ceilings.
Reviews.Author: Peter Lund
Reviews.Content: We love this device!  There's been an outbreak of home burglaries in our neighborhood and this gives us a little piece of mind when we step out for the evening.  It's a small box with several LEDs inside that twinkle.  We moved it around a bit to find the most convincing position for the front of our house.  First we tried having it shine upward about 3 ft away from some gauzy window curtains in a ground floor window.  That was OK.  But then we tried aiming it at the white ceiling of a room on the second floor with its curtains wide open.  Even better!  From outside, the light seen bouncing off the ceiling looks pretty convincing.  Just know that this device works best in a dark or very dimly lit room at night time.  Doubt it would be noticeable otherwise.  We also bought a remote control outlet to operate it, so now when we leave the house we press one button by the front door and turn on the fake TV upstairs.  Would recommend this inexpensive gadget to any one worried about break ins.

Reviews.Title: FAKE TV
Reviews.Author: BIKER JOE
Reviews.Content: HAVE ONE AT THE HOUSE !!!GOT 3 OF THESE FOR CHRISTMAS GIFTS !!!WORKS GREAT !!!LOOKS LIKE A REAL TV FROM OUTSIDE !!!

Reviews.Title: Terrific product !!!  Is a must !!!
Reviews.Author: Manuel I. Cordero
Reviews.Content: This product works great.  I am buying another one for my guest's bedroom.  The effect is 100% convincing.  Makes for  a great gift as well.  Who wouldn't like to keep his/her property safe ?

Reviews.Title: Looks Real from Outside the House
Reviews.Author: Joe Homeowner
Reviews.Content: Works just as described.  Can't tell it's fake from outside the house.It has three settings for how to run it (always on, 4 hours after dusk, 7 hours after dusk).I set it to "always on" and plugged it into a programmable timer with settings for each day of the week.  This makes it look even more like someone is home.

Reviews.Title: Very cool!
Reviews.Author: Richard De Clemente
Reviews.Content: As long as the room you place it in is, somewhat, dark, it works brilliantly! May get another. Very cool!

Reviews.Title: Excellent product, and a great component for a complete Fake TV solution
Reviews.Author: Justin
Reviews.Content: As the tech specs say, the light output is equivalent to a 27" TV, it uses only 2W of power (I verified it running at .9-2.8 Watts during use) and looks realistic due to the patterns that don't repeat. This isn't just a collective of flashing lights, there are pattern algorithms that cycle 12 bright LEDs to make it look exactly like the light output produced by watching TV. The color cycling is extremely realistic when looking at a room from the outside as long as the unit itself can't be seen. Personally I think there's a slight bit too much green instead of blue, but that's just my opinion (how many burglars are that smart, anyway).The light sensor works well, and doesn't turn the unit on until it's pretty dark. Usually won't turn on during light rainy days, for example, if you want to use it with the +4 or +7 hour option and are concerned about it turning off too early.Pair this with a tuner like http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B001DVZXC0/ and an antenna like http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B008ATNW7G/ with some computer speakers like http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B000R9AAJA/ and you've got a cheap and extremely realistic simulation (an RCA to 1/8" / 3.5 mm audio adapter is needed for this solution). Of course you need to be in an area that receives TV over the air for this to work, otherwise you would need some more expensive equipment (produce recorded TV or have an active cable network provider and the associated tuner).

Reviews.Title: Nifty device, works great!
Reviews.Author: ParanoidGeek
Reviews.Content: I played around with the FakeTV a couple of times before I set it up to use when we were traveling.  I put it in an upstairs room facing the street aimed at some blinds.  From outside, it really does look like a TV is on.One thing that I like about the device is that when it is in light-triggered mode, it will display a dim LED pattern that indicates if you have it set for the short or long shut-off delay.  I liked having the confirmation that it was ready to go and not just turned off.

Reviews.Title: Burglar deterrent
Reviews.Author: Barbel Appleton
Reviews.Content: used the deterrent ..tried different position would not work ,to low lighting for our house unit need more power for us

Reviews.Title: Good security
Reviews.Author: Jeff
Reviews.Content: It works as suggested. It appears that there is a TV on in the room, but it is not as bright as I expected it to be.

Reviews.Title: Very goog
Reviews.Author: Lillie Lovette
Reviews.Content: Great for myth needs and of all the safety devices this is the easiest to use. Go for this item.

Reviews.Title: Everyone should have one of these!
Reviews.Author: Api Naqui
Reviews.Content: I bought this for use when I am away from home.  This looks EXACTLY like the TV is one and really makes the house look 'lived in'.  I cannot recommend this product highly enough!  This is SO cool!  Very compact and very small.  Can't believe this really works as well as it says.  I expected it to be a piece of junk, but this is awesome!'Fake TV' is well-made.  I have been using this in my home for a few months now and am very pleased. This looks SO real that my husband has arrived from travel and asked why I left the TV on upstairs!  No noticeable change in electricity bill, likely because it uses low energy LED lights, but it is as bright as a large screen TV.Here is an idea: This could be used as a theatrical prop onstage to create the effect of a TV, without the weight and hassle of a real TV.  :)

Reviews.Title: FANTASTIC CUSTOMER SERVICE 10 STARS
Reviews.Author: R. Harjala
Reviews.Content: I HAD A SMALL ISSUE WITH THE SWITCH AND CONTACTED THEM. QUICK RESPONSE AND REPLACEMENT WAS OFFERED. NOW THIS IS THE WAY TO DO BUISNESS. PRODUCT WORKS BETTER THAN EXPECTED, NEIGHBORS CALLED US TO SAY "CALL THE POLICE,  SOMEONE HAD BROKEN INTO OUR VAC SPOT AND WAS WATCHING TV." ..FUNNY BUT TRUE. WE HAD INFORMED THEM OF THE ITEM WE BOUGHT BEFORE WE LEFT AND IT STILL FOOLED THEM. SUPER EASY TO USE AND SET UP.

Reviews.Title: Fake TV
Reviews.Author: Jack l childress
Reviews.Content: Works great, I use to leave the TV on when I went on vacation,you can't tell the difference except there's no sound.

Reviews.Title: Get It!
Reviews.Author: Susie T
Reviews.Content: I highly recommend this item...it truly does give the impression that someone is home & they're watching TV. I'm getting a 2nd one for another part of the house.

Reviews.Title: Works as advertised
Reviews.Author: Eric M
Reviews.Content: Great idea I would definitely buy this again. Great for me since I live alone and I am always gone.

Reviews.Title: This thing is awesome!!!
Reviews.Author: El__Quijote
Reviews.Content: When we purchased this item, we were very hesitant to do so.  We read all of the reviews and saw some that were very positive and some that were very negative.  There was such a disparity between the reviews that we didn't know if it was a quality control problem (some came out great and others bad) or what.  However, since we travel a lot, and we work a lot when we're home, we wanted the extra layer of security for the house (we do have a monitored alarm system, but we don't want to tempt burglars either).We decided that, for the price, we should give it a try.  It is definitely not a cheap item (pricewise) so, if it were to not work properly, we were planning on returning it.Once we received it, it did look and feel cheap (qualitywise) but, then again, it is an LED lamp, and all of those are always light.  The power adapter is definitely a welcomed part of it, since most LED lamps on the market are battery powered and we didn't want to have to worry about batteries.We placed the lamp in an appropriate location (following the guidance from the manual), plugged it in, and waited for sunset.I must say that we were very pleasantly surprised by the outcome.  It does exactly what it says it will do and it does it very well.  We have had friends ask us who was in that room with the TV on (we've kept the secret, so we tell them we have visitors).As long as you follow the guidelines from the manual as to how to properly position the lamp to achieve the desired result, it works perfectly.We are even planning on purchasing a couple more for our parents and siblings.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Chucky
Reviews.Content: I was amazed of the reality that this divece projects, I install de FakeTV in a room on the second floor and went outside from accorss the street, it was as real as if a TV was on.

Reviews.Title: great, inexpensive product
Reviews.Author: Ms. Bargain Finder
Reviews.Content: we use this in our bedroom whenever we go away.  neat product!  recommend this to others for nice security when away

Reviews.Title: Looks Can Be Deceiving
Reviews.Author: keno
Reviews.Content: Hard to believe that a little cube can simulate the look of a television 10 times it's size, but it does it with ease. I plugged it in and went outside and watched the flickering lights of it in the window, I was impressed.  I could not tell the difference between this and the real TV.

Reviews.Title: Good Product !
Reviews.Author: art piatt
Reviews.Content: I like it ! It works well , it is compact and it is a fine unit . I recommend this product !

Reviews.Title: Nice product.
Reviews.Author: P&A
Reviews.Content: It's a nice product, and overall it works well. However, sometimes it does not come on by itself; we have to play with it to make it come on. But when it comes on as it's supposed to, it is very nice and from outside it seems as if a real TV is on. It is worth the value.

Reviews.Title: The proof of the pudding...
Reviews.Author: Regina Weiner
Reviews.Content: they say, is in the eating.  Came back to a safe home after a few days out of town, and the FakeTV was operating as it was supposed to.  It looked very lifelike (or whatever) as we came to the door.  Everything, except the tree branches from the snow and ice, was exactly the way we left it.

Reviews.Title: works great-every little thing to make crooks pass on by helps and this costs less than anything they would steal
Reviews.Author: All American Mall
Reviews.Content: if you keep it in a dark corner or place something in way of light to shadow it, then it will turn on before its dark enough outside that you can really see it from outside. This makes it gradually viewable from outside so you eliminate the "on every night at exactly 8:07". It genuinely looks like a average size tv is on.First time we used it we showed and explained it to person who came by to feed and water our dogs but they still got freaked out first time they drove up because they were 100% certain someone was there watching tv or we simply left tv on.If you want an additional step you can connect small radio to an xmas lights type timer and set it for a talk radio station.

Reviews.Title: Works very well - looks like a TV!
Reviews.Author: E. Harryvan
Reviews.Content: We travel a lot and our home is very visible from the street. We use timers on certain lights 24/7, home or not but I liked the idea of this to create some randomness in the perceived activity in our home. This works great!We also randomely turn it on when we are not traveling since our regularly used TV is located out of sight of the street. Good product!

Reviews.Title: Terrific deterrent
Reviews.Author: Michael Heryla
Reviews.Content: Great invention.  Now own three of them.  Bought one for a friend who travels frequently,.  Gives him an added peace of mind when he is away from home.

Reviews.Title: NEEDED TIMER TO USE
Reviews.Author: J. Howard Rasmussen ""Engraver""
Reviews.Content: My unit was used in a larger room than suggested and where the auto on and timer wouldn't work.  The Auto-on feature requires a room that gets very dark at sundown, mine doesn't, so a separate timer was used.  Because auto-on wasn't used, I can't speak to the auto-off feature.I also used the item in a larger room than suggested on the box, not in the ad description.  Not really faulting the ad description; as a seller I know how concise those need to be.  Anyway, I simply set the unit on the floor aimed up at our translucent window shades and the effect was perfect.  As others have said, the light source itself should not be seen since it gives the game away.With these caveats, I recommend the product.

Reviews.Title: Burglar Fake TV
Reviews.Author: Kristiine Richardson "kris"
Reviews.Content: This product is great!  We are very very pleased with it.  I actually got my son one also he uses it all the time.  It is amazing how it looks like a real TV from outside!!

Reviews.Title: Awesome product.
Reviews.Author: P. Stein "Bengals Fan"
Reviews.Content: We purchased a condo and had our vacant house for sale.Close the blinds or shades, set the timer, and it really looks like a TV is on.Our neighbors thought we were staying there at night.This is really a wonderful product that works.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Product
Reviews.Author: J. Yang
Reviews.Content: Great idea and works flawlessly.  I do recommend that you don't put it directly facing a window.  You should have the light bouncing off the wall.  I bought one for my sister too!

Reviews.Title: GREAT!!!
Reviews.Author: Allan
Reviews.Content: Get one it really works!!! Every home should have one or two. One upstairs and one down. To give the look someone is really home.

Reviews.Title: It works - I think.
Reviews.Author: James S.
Reviews.Content: This looked like a silly device but it's cheap so what the heck - I spent the money.  It does make it appear like the TV is on.  I have no way of knowing whether or not it'll scare off a burglar but it does give the "occupied" feel much better than a light on a timer does.  Coupling it with a radio on a timer might be even more effective.

Reviews.Title: Works awesome
Reviews.Author: Tadao Baba
Reviews.Content: This thing really looks like a TV on in the room, very realistic! Has a built in timer / light sensor, and is durable. Good to help with the illusion that someone is home.

Reviews.Title: Buy two, because...
Reviews.Author: Andrew Puzyr
Reviews.Content: ...while you're away, visiting for the holidays, the "bad guys" will think you're home!  And then next year, they'll think your relatives are home when they come stay with you!

Reviews.Title: Exactly as described
Reviews.Author: your average smart guy
Reviews.Content: This little nothing of a device is incredible. I have it a few months and  Im still amazed at how good it looks from outside my home.Even though I do have an alarm system I still  want this additional layer of protection. For $35 you cant go wrong. The sensitivity of the sensor is perfect unlike some other reviews I read. No trouble what so ever and an incredible device. You will love it. Everyone of my friends that have seen it ordered one for themselves.

Reviews.Title: Great product but be careful with....
Reviews.Author: catherine philpot
Reviews.Content: Great concept and it works, but, caution when plugging it in and then unplugging it, the first one I bought the casing came removed from the plug and I sent it back for a full refund

Reviews.Title: Works as advertized.
Reviews.Author: Twodogs
Reviews.Content: Small, simple, set and forget easy.I suppose the price of this item will fall as time goes on as it is neither large nor apparently complicated.  But, it's worth the current price to have it operating now.I just ordered two more for gifts.

Reviews.Title: Well designed and functional
Reviews.Author: D. Pitts
Reviews.Content: The design makes for effective and convenient use at very little cost, and the visual is very realistic, really looks like a television is in active use.

Reviews.Title: Awesome little device
Reviews.Author: Sporty
Reviews.Content: I was the victim of a burglary while I was away on vacation and lost around $10,000.00 in musical instruments and electronics.  The burglars destroyed my front door and if it had not been for an alert neighbor seeing a light on in my house it could have been worse.  After returning home and repairing the damage I started searching for things to enhance my home's security.  A wireless CCTV with a 30 day hard drive was installed as well as steel reinforced doors which are all good but I still needed something to give the appearance of someone being home.  I saw the Fake TV on Amazon and thought I would give it a try.The first time I used it was an evening out and when I arrived home after dark looking through my living room window it appeared that a television was indeed on.  I had a timer for the receiver to produce the sound of a TV program.  This is one amazing device that just might prevent a burglary.  I am well pleased with it and hope it lasts for years.I have already recommended it to all my friends and family urging them that it is an inexpensive product that very well could prevent damage to their home and loss of property.  Count me as one very satisfied customer.

Reviews.Title: Buy this!!!
Reviews.Author: PML
Reviews.Content: I have this for two houses. It works great. Even though I told the person checking my mail about it, he still was shocked when he went over. He said he would have sworn someone was inside.

Reviews.Title: Better than expected
Reviews.Author: E. Baleme
Reviews.Content: Very good design and easy to use. This device does make it look like the tv is on and doesn't use much power to do so.

Reviews.Title: Amazing little device
Reviews.Author: GM
Reviews.Content: You have to see it to believe it.  I use it with a timer to go on in the evening and there is no way to tell someone isn't inside watching TV.  Amongst my favorite purchases.

Reviews.Title: Love the product
Reviews.Author: Richard Grogan
Reviews.Content: Seems to work nice I just hope it deters all the jerks. it arrived sooner than I expected Thankyou again

Reviews.Title: Works wonderfully!
Reviews.Author: Dee "blackbelt bibliophile"
Reviews.Content: This product is a marvelous idea.  I have a property that I am "caring for"..currently unoccupied...a neighbor called me a week or so ago andcomplimented me on the Christmas Lights and said I must be glad I had someone staying there now...she had noticed the TV reflection 'behind thewindow treatments'.  I ordered two more after I saw how well it worked.  One for my friend in FL who frequently travels... and Iwanted to add one to my own home, when I go away.  Thanks for a great idea/item.

Reviews.Title: Great idea
Reviews.Author: Mark L. Herman
Reviews.Content: As a retired Locksmith who has great locks on his doors, this takes security one step further. Instead of leaving a TV on all the time we just leave it in a extra room and forget it. It does its job every night.

Reviews.Title: Leaves them thinking you're home watching TV ....
Reviews.Author: OgObOi
Reviews.Content: This sure fools anybody that's looking at your house as they're seeing this light flickering as if TV is on. Yea you can accomplish the same thing by leaving a TV set on but this Fake TV saves wear on your expensive TV and it's LED so very little expense to operate it. I went outside after I setup my Fake TV and it looks realistic.

Reviews.Title: Works great!
Reviews.Author: AlexanderG
Reviews.Content: This thing puts out a lot of light while using very little power. Looks just like a real TV from outside.

Reviews.Title: A greener alternative
Reviews.Author: Tech Guy
Reviews.Content: Excellent product. Consumes 2w vs around 100w for an average 32 inch flatscreen. Purchased one for a neighbors house that I monitor while he's away for the winter.

Reviews.Title: Terrific item.
Reviews.Author: alphonse
Reviews.Content: Low power consumption, auto activation and yes it looks identical to a real TV when looking up at the second floor windows. What a great product idea.

Reviews.Title: Tiny but excellent
Reviews.Author: radioreviwer
Reviews.Content: I just set it up (can't be easier), and i was surprised how small this thing is. It literally is about the size of an orange...I have no opinion on it yet, but can update later. It has 3 settings but no "random" setting, which i think would be useful.Anyway, i am happy with it. I recommend it to you.Update(10/5/13): this thing fooled my caretaker into thinking I was home. It has a useful sundown +4 hours setting that I use all the time. Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: It Works
Reviews.Author: 3dgirl
Reviews.Content: It works and does what was advertised.  If you are going away, could help with security.  I would buy it again

Reviews.Title: Not all that bright
Reviews.Author: Robin
Reviews.Content: It's OK, but it's not very bright. It really needs to be in a very dark room to be effective, but the thing is, I never watch TV completely in the dark, there's always a lamp on... So I can either use it in a darkened room, but have the appearance of doing something I never do, or I can have a lamp on, and this fake TV cannot be seen.

Reviews.Title: Burglar Deterrent
Reviews.Author: HappyLatina619
Reviews.Content: Looks like some one is home watching TV.  Lights are bright enough to look realistic, self timer works great. I love the 4 hour or 7 hour setting, turns on at dusk.

Reviews.Title: Fantastico guarda noturno
Reviews.Author: Paulo Garcia
Reviews.Content: Produto fantastico. Simula com imensa realidade a presenca de alguem em casa.Comprei no total 8 itens ja que diversos amigos tambem se interessaram

Reviews.Title: great for no one at home
Reviews.Author: indy
Reviews.Content: it work just as video. we stand outside to check window curtain during the nite.  haha bad guy have to giveup  or has to wait couple hour until we back home.

Reviews.Title: Looks like a TV
Reviews.Author: Wordup
Reviews.Content: Just as advertised, the FakeTV actually looks as though someone's watching TV. Would be better if the power cord was longer.

Reviews.Title: Great idea!
Reviews.Author: Ardent shopper "Careful Spender"
Reviews.Content: This does simulate the light pattern of a tv. From the outside of the house, it appears that a tv is on. Cool. Effective. The two function timer is also useful. Ours is on 24/7.

Reviews.Title: More comfortable leaving for longer periods
Reviews.Author: C. Swartz "TV Buyer"
Reviews.Content: People think you are at home watching TV....nothing to do after that.  Easy instructions, placement is key to getting the right effect.

Reviews.Title: Good Product
Reviews.Author: Amazon Nerd "N8"
Reviews.Content: We were a little skeptical as to how convincing this would be but it really does look like a TV is on when viewed from outside.  I can't vouch for the auto off feature since we really only used it while away, but seems to work great.

Reviews.Title: Fake TV Review
Reviews.Author: Rob
Reviews.Content: This is a very convincing security product. It's small, yet emits quite a powerful, random LED light pattern. I like the fact it displays a red LED when in 4 hour timer mode and blue when in the seven hour mode (this is while it is on but not in actual use), so you can always tell it's ready to go and for how long.It looks very convincing from outside the house. The light sensor, which activates it has the perfect level of sensitivity. The light from a lamp or a "real" TV is enough to prevent it from turning on when you don't want it to.Now just because I gave it five stars doesn't mean that there is not room for improvement. I would like the unit to have the ability to turn off when you come into the room it's in and turn on a lamp. Currently you must manually turn the Fake TV off then you can reset it if you like. If it had this feature, one would hardly ever need to touch it.

Reviews.Title: Great little invention!
Reviews.Author: Amanda Felix "angelbuff"
Reviews.Content: We bought one because my husband had heard about from a friend that often goes out of town. We tried it when we went out late one afternoon and came home well after dark. Since I forgot my husband had turned it on, when we drove up I saw the lights and I asked my husband if he had forgotten to turn off the television...he smiled and said it was the FAKE TV. I could not tell the difference. I have every intention of buying one for a friend that also travels alot....it really works and I do recommend it even if you only go out for the evening.

Reviews.Title: Timer not good enough
Reviews.Author: Albert Martinez "Al_Martinez"
Reviews.Content: I had to keep this unit on consistently and connect it to an external timer. It gets dark early and by 1AM the 7 hour internal light timer does not do the trick. I need this on all night long. I have a small room it's on by the corner of my home and it lights up the room very nicely. This manufacturer needs a delay on timer for after the sun goes down. It's just a few added lines of code on the MCU and another selector switch.You have 3 settings. Turns on after dark. 4 hr after dark it shuts off/ 7 hr after dark it shuts off or consistent on. I leave mine on consistent on and again, I have an external timer.

Reviews.Title: The Best Little Deterrent That One Can Have!
Reviews.Author: Mary Edmund "Music Lover"
Reviews.Content: We have had two of these for a few years now, and we have used them each time we have gone out the door. We put them near the TV's and turn them on.  We crack the shades just enough, so that they can be seen from a distance outside.  I ordered several more for Christmas gifts this year!!!  I think they are that important to have!!! I ordered them from Amazon and they arrived in great condition, all ready to wrap up!!!  I know my family and friends will be very happy to have them, especially my son who has been burglarized before!!!

Reviews.Title: Does exactly what it's supposed to!
Reviews.Author: A. Clausen
Reviews.Content: You don't have to outrun the bear, you just need to be faster than the slowest guy. It's the same with protecting your house. It doesn't need to be impenetrable, it just needs to look occupied so the potential thief walks past your house to a softer target (the dark house, hopefully not your favorite neighbor).This thing looks just like a tv. Uses a fraction of the power. No-brainer.

Reviews.Title: Fake TV LIght Is Excellent
Reviews.Author: Donald W. Hobbs
Reviews.Content: This Fake TV light is exactly as advertised.  When properly positioned, from the outside in the night it looks like a real TV is playing in the room this unit is installed.  It keeps excellent time.  I tested it for almost a week using a dusk plus 7 hour setting.  It turned itself off EXACTLY 7 hours and 3 minutes after it turned itself on.  I couldn't believe how accurate it was - even to three minutes a day.

Reviews.Title: Excellent and innovative device!
Reviews.Author: Welshboy
Reviews.Content: Works great...It really does look like a TV is on in the room.  Well worth the money as part of your home defense strategy.

Reviews.Title: Perfect!
Reviews.Author: Serena Reed
Reviews.Content: I have nothing but good things to say about this.  It has been a lifesaver for me.  No one ever knew that it wasn't a real TV!

Reviews.Title: Expensive, but worth the piece of mind.
Reviews.Author: jlgran
Reviews.Content: I went out of town for two weeks and picked up a number of security items from Amazon (digital timers, Kensington locks for computers, gate locks, etc.). When I first saw this item I thought it was gimmicky and expensive. Then right before I left, I thought about it again. I leave the TV on for the dogs, and everyone in the neighborhood probably sees the LCDs and plasma lighting up the house at night. I also fall asleep with the tv on, so I figured this whole Fake TV deal might be a good idea afterall.Well, no one broke in the house while I was gone! I can't prove it was the Fake TV that was a burglar deterrent, but it gave me a piece of mind (I did check my DLink IP camera from time to time to ensure the house was fine). I also had light timers set up in every room, but I think the Fake TV was pretty cool. I tested them out before I left and they are super-easy to use (just a switch to your selection). In the testing process, I did notice that the Fake TV went on late on a gloomy afternoon -- so a dark room might possibly fake the devie into thinking it's evening. Because of that, I'd chose to use the dusk +7hrs option in case it went on earlier than dusk. Overall, very pleased with the product -- but I think it's worth closer to $19.99 for such a simple device. I bought two (ouch!), but if the price drops -- I'd buy more.

Reviews.Title: Works very well
Reviews.Author: C. Wells
Reviews.Content: We've had this for 6 months.  It works exactly as advertized.  It comes on only when it is dark, and for the length of time (4 or 7 hours) after dusk.  It looks like a TV when viewed from outside.  Our window normally has shades across and is upstairs, so no one can peer in and figure out it isn't a TV.

Reviews.Title: Two Thumbs Up!
Reviews.Author: Fuzzball
Reviews.Content: FakeTV works like a charm! As stated in other reviews, the product does a great job at mimicking a real TV. We have dark blinds on our window so at first we weren't able to see the FakeTV from the street. However, once we installed sheer curtains and were able to crack the blinds a little, the FakeTV can be seen from the street. This product is great!

Reviews.Title: Great concept - works as advertised.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: The device really emulates the light - in varying colors and intensity - which would be cast on the windows as people in the room watched television. The "fake TV" is easy to use as, once set, it automatically comes on for whichever (four or seven-hours ON) time interval is selected.  The length of each of these intervals is accurate. My four-star rating is based upon  limited usage.  Once the unit has performed for a suitable period of time (let's say for several months), I will reassess the four stars and quite probably give it five.

Reviews.Title: GREAT ITEM IF IT WORKS
Reviews.Author: Dennis P. Weisbruch "Inspiring"
Reviews.Content: THE ONLY COMPLAINT I HAVE IS THE PHOTOCELL TIMER DID NOT WORK BUT CONSTANT ON IT WORKS GREAT SO I RETURNED ONE AND ORDERED 2 MORE. DEALING WITH AMAZON IS THE GREATEST THEY SUPPLY RETURN SHIPPING LABELS  AND SINCE I SIGNED UP FOR "PRIME" ITS EVEN BETTER SHOULD HAVE DONE THAT YEARS AGO.

Reviews.Title: Works well
Reviews.Author: Safeman
Reviews.Content: The unit is much smaller than I thought it would be so I was skeptical at first.  However, once I plugged it in I realized how bright it is.  The unit varies in color, pattern, and intensity providing a very realistic TV effect.I now appreciate the small size as it is not as noticeable in the room.I would recommend this to a friend.

Reviews.Title: fake TV
Reviews.Author: Harriet D. Burket "HB"
Reviews.Content: When I travel I am very nervous about leaving the house unprotected.  A "working" TV will convince most snoopers that someone is home.  I like this product and it is the second one I bought.

Reviews.Title: Fake TV review
Reviews.Author: luvmoose
Reviews.Content: This is a great product that I put in an upstairs bedroom.  It "turns on" at dusk for four hours (you can adjust it to keep it on longer).  When you're outside looking up into the window, it really looks like someone is at home watching TV.

Reviews.Title: this thing is awesome
Reviews.Author: someoneSomewhere
Reviews.Content: It fooled my wife, even though she knows we have it! I love that you don't need a timer, it turns on when all ambient lighting seizes then runs for a preset number of hours. I set it up under our real tv.. Delightfull!

Reviews.Title: Looks real to me
Reviews.Author: GS "GS"
Reviews.Content: This product works as advertised.  You can set it to be on for 4 or 7 hours after dusk.  Or, to have it on all the time. It is very easy to learn how to use.  A couple nights ago I went outside to view what the light looked like from the front yard.  I was fortunate to be able to compare it to a neighbor's TV. They looked very similar.  The flicker effect was evident in both the real TV and FakeTV. To be honest, it did appear a bit too bright. So, when I went back inside I focused the light onto an opposite wall instead of the window. I am glad I made this purchase for it gives me some peace of mind.  What is ironic is that I totally stopped watching television about a month ago. Now, it looks like I watch it 7 hours a day.

Reviews.Title: Peace of mind
Reviews.Author: Sarah
Reviews.Content: This product works exactly as described.  I like that my house is not dark when I return home from work.  Since I park my car in the garage, it gives the appearance to the street of someone being home whether I'm home or not.

Reviews.Title: Just Love It
Reviews.Author: LadyNewYorker
Reviews.Content: This little item works.  Looks just as if a tv is playing.  Has several settings.  So simple to use.  Just set it by using a simple slide switch and plug it in.  From the outside it looks like a tv is on and playing.

Reviews.Title: Small and Bright
Reviews.Author: Nate Gubin
Reviews.Content: If you're a thief and you're reading this, I don't own the FakeTV. Even though I'm tweeting from vacation there's a cop housesitting for us and he's watching reruns of Charles in Charge. His doberman is napping next to him and dreaming of sinking his fangs into some burglar bacon.

Reviews.Title: Unbelievable Product - looks like the real thing from outside
Reviews.Author: A. Attanasio
Reviews.Content: At first I thought the price was high for a product like this, but after receiving it, it's well worth it. I like the idea you have 3 options when using the product - always on, or sensor with 2 timer length options. Its amazing how realistic it looks from outside- Great security product! I like the fact that the company also backs its product with a 3 year warranty!

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: M. Raggett
Reviews.Content: Worth every penny.  Great for some piece of mind if nothing else.  Defintiely seems like it mimics a TV being on.

Reviews.Title: great item
Reviews.Author: Howard Green
Reviews.Content: fantastic idea for a deterrent..works super appears to be the real thing..am very happy with this product and highly recommend it to others

Reviews.Title: Fooled my neighbors
Reviews.Author: Amy Woodward
Reviews.Content: One of my neighbors looks after my house whenever I'm away. Which has been a lot lately. I've been travelling at least one week per month for work.One night, while I was supposed to be out of town, he saw my TV was on.He was a bit put out that a) I had not told him I was returning early from my trip, and b) I didn't answer the door when he knocked. Actually, and c) When did I buy a TV? ;)Of course, I was still out of town. That was my fake TV playing.Worked like a charm!

Reviews.Title: fake tv
Reviews.Author: j2lmill2
Reviews.Content: This is a great product.  It looks just like the TV is on in the room.  Very pleased.  My house has been broken into and hopefully this will be a deterrent.

Reviews.Title: The best TV On The Market
Reviews.Author: Prisoncop
Reviews.Content: The Fake TV is a much better deterrent toward crime than leaving a lamp on, while you are away. Even a light on a timer can be determined by a criminal-minded person that no one is home. People tend to watch TV at all hours of the night. This in my opinion, is the best burglar deterrent on the market today.

Reviews.Title: Looks real from outside
Reviews.Author: Hiker
Reviews.Content: This is a great alternative to leaving an actual TV on to make it look like someone is home.  From the outside, with shades drawn, it looks like a TV is on.

Reviews.Title: FANTASTIC
Reviews.Author: James Denig "jj"
Reviews.Content: economical power usage tiny size works like a dream!  youd be a fool not to own this product for the peace of mind it offers great idea great invention great stuff!

Reviews.Title: Does what it says
Reviews.Author: Berrs
Reviews.Content: I set it up in a few different places and went outside each time to check out my window until it was in a spot I liked best. It definitely looks like a TV is on. My place was broken into one time while I was away for the night. So now I like to take the extra precautionary steps to try to keep criminals from wanting to target me again. For the price, it can't hurt.

Reviews.Title: Fake TV security
Reviews.Author: Chef Annie "M. Chef"
Reviews.Content: Love this product.  It looks great from outside the house...exactly like there ia a TV on in the room.  I have two and use them when I am on vacation. I put them in rooms with lamps on timers.  When the lamps go off at night the TV goes on. The house always looks occupied.  I bought some for my friends who really liked them and they are also very pleased.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Charles F
Reviews.Content: I set up the Fake TV in a second floor room.  When we arrived home, we sat in the driveway and couldn't stop laughing.  It looked exactly like a TV was on in the room. Takes very little electricity. Great product.

Reviews.Title: Well constructed easy-to-use reassuring product!
Reviews.Author: Matthew
Reviews.Content: While any crook set on breaking into a home can do so, this product appears to be a terrific step toward making such a crook think twice and look elsewhere.  Solidly constructed gizmo with easily selected settings for a television appearance that starts once your home is dark enough. (Be sure to test your internal away-from-home lights-on situation first, to ensure things are dark enough for the FakeTV to start.)Very impressed with the product's quality from the moment I opened the package -- it's arguably pricey, so it's nice to know it's built well.  And I was even more excited once I tested it out in a dark enough room after sunset.  Awesome product!

Reviews.Title: Works like advertised.  Cheap deterrent.
Reviews.Author: Serge Blain
Reviews.Content: Acts like a real Tv.  from outside an apartment look like a real Tv is on.  Does not consume much power and turns off automatically after 4 hours.  Have a choice hours to leave on. Used to make house or apartment look like it is occupied even when I am not at home.  A very good deterrent.  Easy to set up and forget.

Reviews.Title: Love it.
Reviews.Author: Georgia Peach "Music Lover"
Reviews.Content: Works as advertised. Standing outside my house, it looks just like someone is watching tv at night. Takes up very little space and doesn't use much electricity. Great device.

Reviews.Title: Does Exactly What I Want It To :)
Reviews.Author: Kerry
Reviews.Content: $35 well spent for our sanity when we are not home. It looks exactly like a TV is on through the window. I highly recommend this!

Reviews.Title: Good product.  Needs minor tweaks.
Reviews.Author: J Bandl
Reviews.Content: This delivers a realistic impression outside.  I recommend.Being used in a non-tech relative's home; no fuss; good effect.Also serves as "night light" and some "shadow camouflage" during on-time.Three suggestions ...1.  Larger marking of switch options for 4 hr and 7 hr-from-dusk shutoff.2.  Run times should be 3 hr and 5 hr for Summer.3.  A filter wheel that can rotate over light sensor to better control  the dusk trigger, since some lights inside can interfere.(One clear quadrant, and three with various shade levels/hole densities.)(This could also serve as the seasonal adjustment.)

Reviews.Title: fake tv
Reviews.Author: Lau Kim Lon
Reviews.Content: Best use in dark area with its flickering lights facing the close glass windows to experience its best effects.Best use with a timer to control the switch on/off time.

Reviews.Title: Good juju; only a few cheap trinkets
Reviews.Author: El MacGuyver de San Joe
Reviews.Content: This, like so many other theft and burglary deterrent devices, is hard to gauge if it really works, or not, since if it does work, NOTHING HAPPENS! You return to your home just like any other time, and it looks the same as it always does! I (as usual) needed to test it out to get the "perfect effect", but it didn't take long; I found a good location for this shrimpy little guy (both in size and electricity usage; 9V and 200mAh, OMG!), and it truly delivers on the promise. It looks exactly like a TV running, and turned itself off at the prescribed hour.The best value of this device was the extra peace of mind that I had while away on vacation for a week. <$40 for my lowered anxiety is a VERY cheap price to pay.

Reviews.Title: Works great, good conversation piece
Reviews.Author: M. Sawyer
Reviews.Content: I bought this from another company on Amazon, but it wouldn't let me review it on that product page, so I'm doing it here. I bought the identical product.Reading about this product made me grin from ear to ear, as it was something I wanted for years, but didn't know anybody had manufactured. I was worried that the "randomness" of the LED displays would be too regular, looking artificial, but it really looks fantastic. Just as choppy and irregular as a real TV show or movie. In a bright outdoor environment, it would be harder to see through a window, but in a regular night-time environment, and with the living room lights off, the glow is plenty visible. Other reviews already pointed this out, but to reiterate, position the fake TV so it can't be directly viewable from outside the window--seeing that glowing box (as a burglar would by peering through the blinds) is a dead giveaway. But, positioned behind something as simple as a cardboard box, it's basically impossible to detect where the glowing is coming from. So I positioned mine behind closed Venician blinds, so the glow would be very clear between the remaining cracks of the closed blinds. It was a great effect, and it fooled more than one visiting friend.

Reviews.Title: Fooled the Neighbours when we were on vacation
Reviews.Author: Paul W
Reviews.Content: Purchased one of these for when we were on vacation for 2 weeks. Set it up on using the light sensor and 4 hr on mode and put it in one of the front facing bedrooms. Checked it for a couple of nights before we went away and it really does simulate a TV being on from the street, was actually able to compare with one of our neighbours who had a TV on at the same time and the effect is very good... so good that one of our neighbours emailed us when we were away because they thought we'd left a TV on! If it can fool the neighbours, I'm guessing it will fool the burgalars too. Very clever product, Recommended.

Reviews.Title: Fake TV Burgler Deterrent
Reviews.Author: Peaches
Reviews.Content: So far so good it works as described  and no burglers!  Well at least none that showed up at our house. My husband who is a big skeptic likes it so 'Nuff said.I think it is an interesting concept and it will save us some money and worry so in my opinion it is well worth the small investment.Peaches

Reviews.Title: burglar deterrant
Reviews.Author: Lynnette Selgrath
Reviews.Content: I love amazon they have everything i hav ever asked for.this item was an addon to motion detector light fixture and i thought "hey this would be a good idea". I still do and will order another.

Reviews.Title: Fake TV
Reviews.Author: HDTV Pro
Reviews.Content: Working great for a few weeks now. Looks like a real TV is running from outside the house. Place it pointing at a wall that faces the windows.-UPDATE: I just removed this from the rural property I had it running in. Worked great for about 2 years, and was still working great when I unplugged it. The temperatures went very low this winter, not much above zero at times in the house. Every time I pulled up at night it looked like someone was watching TV in the house. Well worth what it cost!

Reviews.Title: An Effective Deterrent And Additional Layer To Your Home Security
Reviews.Author: Ken
Reviews.Content: The light it emits is realistic in that it is sourced from multicolored LED's behind prism lenses that diffuse the light into the room, reflecting off the walls, ceiling, and windows. The randomness of the flickering is extraordinarily similar that of a real TV. The intensity changes, the color and hue changes, and the speed at which the flickering happens is identical to scene changes on TV... some rapid, some slower.The Fake TV has several settings that work with a switch and/or light sensor that knows when it is getting dark in the room. It can be set to run  for 4-hours or 7-hours after dusk. You may choose to connect the Fake TV to a 24-hour timer so that you can adjust the same time of night when you would normally be watching TV.I  believe this is a unique burglar deterrent, and an effective one. Consider adding this to an additional layer of your home security...A video review can be found here...[...]

Reviews.Title: Looks just like a TV from outside window
Reviews.Author: jimbaround02
Reviews.Content: This product works great and looks just like a TV is on inside the room.  As it says on the instructions, just be sure that you can't see the device from outside the window.  Unfortunately, the room where we installed the device has a spotlight outside the window that goes on automatically every night, so the spotlight washes out the "TV" reflection from that window.  However, we have an open floor plan in the house, so looking through any other window it appears that someone is watching TV in that room.  Very cool!

Reviews.Title: Works as advertised
Reviews.Author: Lou
Reviews.Content: Works great, looks like a real tv from outside. Just turned it on and set it up on a light timer so I can vary the times.

Reviews.Title: Works as advertise
Reviews.Author: Edivalle "edivalle"
Reviews.Content: Works a exactly as advertise. I made my purchase based on the good reviews I read about it and I have to agree with rest of the reviews, it's easy to use

Reviews.Title: Our Police Dept. Suggested this Product
Reviews.Author: Misty
Reviews.Content: Works great in our home.  Have one on a timer, and use the built-in sensor timer on the other.  Great concept.  We have mini blinds and looks real from the outside.

Reviews.Title: FakeTV is Perfect
Reviews.Author: K Jorgensen
Reviews.Content: Before I ordered the FakeTV, I wondered if it would work and look as good as the manufacturer said.  I was not disappointed.  The night I received it I plugged it in and went outside to take a look and it really does look like a real TV playing in the room.  I like the ability to have it always playing or to automatically turn on when it gets dark and play for either 4 or 7 hours.  I am happy with this item and I think that you will be too.

Reviews.Title: Works well and way cheaper than leaving a TV on
Reviews.Author: Bowser B "Bill"
Reviews.Content: When we're away, we'd like to have things turn on and off as though we're at home.  For lights that's pretty easy, and in fact, we use those light timers all the time, even when we're at home--so there is no difference in the pattern if we happen to be gone.  We used to keep a TV on a timer when we're away, so that it would turn on and off at times that look like someone is at home.  Of course, there is a cost associated with running a TV, both electricity and wear and tear on the TV.We have AT&T; U-verse for Internet and TV and no practical way to add an antenna.  U-verse TV works fine, but the receivers time out if there is no activity for a while, and they won't turn on via an outlet timer, so that's a problem for leaving a TV on.  The solution?  Put a radio and FAKE TV on a timer.  That way you have noise and flickering light to mimic a TV.  The Fake TV itself is good, but it's better with some sound as well.  I hope it holds up--that is a concern these days with inexpensive/cheap electronics--but if it does, we'll likely get another one in a few months to simulate a TV in another room.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely love it!
Reviews.Author: Nick Lozano
Reviews.Content: Wow! Great product! I wish I thought of it. It's really well designed and works as advertised. I actually bought two. If there is a lot of exterior lighting, the glow of the fake tv may be difficult to see, but a burgler can definitely see that there is either a tv or a computer monitor operating since they would be looking closely. If the lack of sound is an issue for you, you can always plug in a radio to supplement the simulated tv lighting. This is a definite requirement for any person concerned about preventing home burglaries. Thanks for producing such a great product!

Reviews.Title: FakeTV is great
Reviews.Author: Bill
Reviews.Content: I was skeptical about this but thought I would give it a try.  I like the idea of a deterrent to help protect my home.  When I got this and set it up, I went outside to watch and I could not tell the difference between a TV on and this unit.  When it runs it is LED lights so there is nothing that gets hot.  So far it works great.

Reviews.Title: Buy it... it works as advertised!
Reviews.Author: Steven E. Musselman "steveineaston"
Reviews.Content: Brilliant!I bought this for our second home. I installed it upstairs in a bonus room, and aimed it toward a window, making sure to have the light bounce off the walls and ceiling. Even after friends know that indeed I didn't leave the TV on, they still initially think that it's a TV.Can't wait for a more powerful unit, as this mimics a 27" TV. Heck, now most new TVs probably average 48" or so.When used as directed, it works!

Reviews.Title: Not working properly
Reviews.Author: Kenneth D. Mcrae
Reviews.Content: Several lamps (Maybe 3 or 4,  I  cannot  tell the number) next to the row of green lamps,  in  the upper  left  corner, do  not illuminate. Other  than  that,  the  device  works well,  as  advertised. I think  I will  return  it when I  return  from  vacation,  for  repair  or  replacement.  The  unit arrived  on  time  and  Amazon  packaging was  excellent.

Reviews.Title: Very convincing Fake!
Reviews.Author: Gail N. "Honest Reader"
Reviews.Content: We have a one story home and used this device quite successfully. We have Hunter-Douglas Duette shades on the window in the room hosting the new "TV". We placed the TV on the lowest shelf of a book case and aimed it at the wall with the window. The net effect was to dim the lights a bit and prevent anyone trying to peer in around the shade to see anything amiss. We plugged this into a GE Dual Digital Timer (Mfg Model #15079) We added a radio with a mechanical switch into the second timed outlet. Note: newer radios have electronic switches and so this will not work. Then both lights and sound came on simultaneously. Very pleased with the results.

Reviews.Title: very realistic!
Reviews.Author: S. Greenup
Reviews.Content: awesome product! Went outside and seriously it looked like a real TV was on. thanks for a simple, yet ingenious device!

Reviews.Title: It really does look like you are watching TV
Reviews.Author: Ann
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for home safety and in anticipation of a vacation I plan to take. This product is easy to use and can be set for dusk + 4 hours or dusk + 7 hours. Because dusk varies a little each night, the product turns on at a slightly different time each evening rather than on a set time like a timer would do.On my first use, I walked outside to see how it appeared from the street. It looks like someone is watching TV! Yes, I know that this is what it is supposed to do but it is very convincing. :)The box itself can be safely set anywhere since it really produces no heat that I can tell. I definitely recommend it for those who want a bit more peace of mind.

Reviews.Title: IT WORKS
Reviews.Author: J. painting "johnice"
Reviews.Content: very small footprint is deceptive...it packs a punch and has 4 settings...looks just like a TV in the room when viewed from outside.Question is ,will it last... will update if it fails

Reviews.Title: Fake TV
Reviews.Author: Jake
Reviews.Content: I purchased the FakeTV FTV-10 Burglar Deterrent for my son who lives in a Multi-Cultural neighborhood ( that's PC for high crime area ). He said it is very impressive in replicating the flickering glow of a TV. He is going to try it in various locations in his home. He feels that it will add to his home security.

Reviews.Title: great invention
Reviews.Author: billybruce
Reviews.Content: I even have to double check sometimes that I didn't leave the TV on.Well worth the small investment.I love it.

Reviews.Title: As described
Reviews.Author: Mario M.
Reviews.Content: When I received the product and openend the box, I was a little disappointed at the size.  It was so small!  I guess I didn't read that part of the description.  I wasn't expecting much, but I was surprised when I plugged it in and turned it on.  It is BRIGHT!  Much brighter that I thought it would be due to the size. The lights change so that there appears to be a TV on. When aimed at a window, you cannot tell from the outside (or inside from another room) that this is not a real TV.  I think this will be a good deterrent.  I am pleased with this item and recommend it to anyone looking for one.

Reviews.Title: very useful
Reviews.Author: Moni
Reviews.Content: I bought 3 of them at amazon.de and have them running in Germany without any problem. But the 2 I bought in the U.S. at amazon.com are both not working properly. The first one did not start working at dawn. The second one started working at dawn but did not stop working after 4 hours, was running all night until dawn. Is this bad luck?

Reviews.Title: A pretty good buy
Reviews.Author: Toffy78
Reviews.Content: Simple concept that works as advertised.  A good complement to other security measures in the home.  Just make sure you position it appropriately!

Reviews.Title: I guess we'll see
Reviews.Author: Kit-Kat
Reviews.Content: Well, it works, looks nice (like disco lights). As far as protecting me from burglars - I hope I will never find out.

Reviews.Title: Works very well.
Reviews.Author: Erik Klass
Reviews.Content: Very well made. The lighting variations are perfect. The only reason I gave it 4 starts is that it does not work perfectly if you have horizontal slatted blinds. I had to mess around for a while before getting it to work. If I faced the window, one could tell that it was a small point of light (not a TV). If I face it away from the window and light up a wall, it works well. In any case, I recommend it. Especially if you have pull down blinds. One other thing--if you have black out blinds, it won't really work (you can't see the light from outside, obviously).

Reviews.Title: Awesome product!
Reviews.Author: Michelle M. Clowser
Reviews.Content: I was concerned because I have very solid blinds, and I wasn't sure the light was going to be sufficient to mimic a t.v.  However, when I tried it out, I was pleasantly surprised that you can see the light around the edges of the blinds, just like if the t.v. was on.  Note that it mimics only the light from a t.v., not the sound.  As long as you follow the directions provided (don't have a light on in the same room, don't place it so you can see the device from outside), you really can't tell the difference between a t.v. and this device.  It is light weight, and has about the same lengthy cord as your t.v.  It is entirely easy to use because you just plug it in and set it by clicking on one of four switches.  It turns on with the sun going down automatically, and runs for either 4 hours or 7 hours--- your choice.  I have an exterior light on, and that didn't seem to bother the light sensor at all.  It is very much worth the price. I believe that it likely doesn't use all that much power either, because the lights are led. Don't use it on a timer, it takes care of itself with the automatic light sensor.  I also had a light on a timer in an adjoining room, where the light was not blocked by a wall, and it didn't effect the automatic light sensor either.  I guess you just experiment with it, since many would people like to use both.  Wonderful technology.

Reviews.Title: My Review
Reviews.Author: Keithmj "Noodj"
Reviews.Content: So far this is doing what it was designed to do, make it look like a TV is turned on, and it does. From outside the house you couldn't tell the difference between a real TV and this fake TV. I'll update as I use this so others will know how it works. I would say you won't be disappointed with this. If you want it to come on at different times instead of on 4 or 7 hours then just turn it on and use a Intermatic DT620 Heavy Duty Indoor Digital Plug-In Timer, White that is what I plan to do.

Reviews.Title: Ingenious product!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Jimmy187
Reviews.Content: After hearing about these somewhere (I don't recall where) I looked them up online and found them, conveniently named FakeTV!  I read about the features and decided that the product claimed to do exactly what I had in mind for an additional security measure for my house, and I was actually shocked by how inexpensive the product was, I figured this type of thing would probably cost around a hundred bucks.  A few days after ordering it on Amazon, my FakeTV arrived.  Let me tell you, this thing is COOL, ingenious actually, and engineered to perfection.  I simply set it on the "dusk plus 7 setting, and when I get home at night the FakeTV is doing it's thing!  It absolutely looks like someone is at home watching TV, its amazing!  I think for the price, Im going to go ahead and order another one and put one on both ends of the house....... and maybe get one for my parents too.

Reviews.Title: Recently got it
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I just got the Fake TV a week or so ago.  So far, it seems to work well.  It really does cast lighting with colors as does a real TV.  The ordering and delivery were very easy and quick, and the product arrived in perfect condition.  I will update this review in a few months or so, but for now, it gets 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: A Neat Idea from Amazon
Reviews.Author: George B. Archer
Reviews.Content: So far, have not been away from home for any length of time to get the full benefit of FakeTV's operation.  Did experiment however, by checking out its effectiveness at night.  Tried different placements within different rooms and FakeTV Burgler Deterrent appears to do what it's supposed to do.  Looks like a real TV with its various blinks and color changes. I bought this device primarily, to use when away on vacations.

Reviews.Title: Nice gadget, looks real!
Reviews.Author: Johnny da wad "Stud Muffin"
Reviews.Content: I bought this because we were going on vacation and I wanted it to look like someone was home, this thing works, looks like the tv is on and shuts on and off automatically.

Reviews.Title: Plenty Bright
Reviews.Author: J. Koster
Reviews.Content: This Fake TV is plenty bright enough and works very well to make it look like a TV is on in a room.  Make sure to read the tips in the owners manual about aiming it and not using it in a room that has a street light outside of the window.  Of course it won't show well if your window is being lit from the outside!  Just be smart and walk outside to make sure it's aimed properly and you can't see the actual unit, just the light from it.

Reviews.Title: great gadget
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I ove it! I don't know if it actually deterred a burglary attempt because I haven't been burgled. But it looks impressive. When you use it when you are away make sure the curtains are pulled so no one can actually look inside. From outside at night it definitely looks like the TV is on. The light flickers randomly and it is impossible to tell from the real thing.I like the fact that it has a timer option to make it even more realistic.This and a timer for table lamps together work fantastic.

Reviews.Title: FakeTV
Reviews.Author: King Sugar "Details"
Reviews.Content: Have only had it one night.  It worked as advertised.  It is suprisingly bright.  Viewed it from outside at night and it is pretty impressive.  Looks like somebody is watching TV.  It turns on at dusk and turns off as you selected either 4 or 7 hours.  In addition you can select on or off.UPDATE:  After several months this product works way better than I expected.  The biggest challenge is where you decide to locate the devise.  I would highly recommend FakeTV.

Reviews.Title: Fake TV Light - GREAT Product
Reviews.Author: Eric G. Petersen
Reviews.Content: This is a GREAT product!  It does a great job of simulating a TV set running to fool would-be burglars while you're away from home.  It's all automatic... contains a tiny photocell and has switches for 4 or 7 hours of operation after darkness.  And it's all LCD, so it costs about the same to operate as a nite-lite.

Reviews.Title: Fake TV Works Well
Reviews.Author: PaulK
Reviews.Content: This product works as advertised.  From the outside of my house it looks as if there is a TV on.  I have a ranch house with horizontal blinds on my windows.  The light from the Fake TV permeates the blinds and creates a glow, that from the outside looks like a TV.  The timer and ambient light sensor works well.  So far, very satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Fake TV fakes out the bad guys (probably)
Reviews.Author: T. M. Taylor "Nerdy Dad"
Reviews.Content: I bought a home alarm system and the site really tried to push this product on me.  Well, I checked pricing on Amazon and it was better (what, with Amazon Prime and free shipping and all that).  I kind of bought it as a joke.  But it turns out we really love it!  It's way better than leaving your light on a timer!!!  It really looks like there's somebody home watching TV.  The method by which this thing "varies" its light output is pretty cool.  For the first few nights we had it, I would go stand out in front of the house and watch it.  It's really quite amazing.  I have no doubt that a "bad guy" would take no more than one glance at my house and assume there's somebody home.  Probably the coolest feature is the "timer."  It's really a light sensor.  When it gets dark (evening time... about an hour after sunset), the Fake TV switches on and stays on for either 3 or 7 hours (you choose with a switch on the device).  Like I said, it's a quantum leap over the old-fashioned lamp timers.  With this thing, we can go on vacation for a week or two and know that our house will look "actively occupied" each night.I totally think it's worth the money.  Just know that it really looks like a TV is on in the room.  That's all it does.What a great concept!  I've told all of my friends and coworkers!  If you're looking for something like this, have no doubt, this does what it claims to do!

Reviews.Title: Simple to Use, This Device Creates a Realistic Effect
Reviews.Author: Derbydano "DB"
Reviews.Content: I was impressed that such a small device could create enough light to simulate a real TV at night. This thing is not much larger than a coffee mug, yet it produces almost as much light as my 42" plasma TV. It is easy to set. Four settings: On - 4 Hrs - 7 Hrs - Off. The cord is very short at 4 or 5 feet. It is tough to get the device in an ideal location without an extension cord. Any ambient light will prevent the device from turning on automatically after dark. Test your location. I think that it seems well made, but the price seems high for what you get. $15 - $20 seems more appropriate. Oh well. The way I see it, this is cheap insurance with an innovative twist.

Reviews.Title: Fake TV review
Reviews.Author: S. Miller
Reviews.Content: The product works awesome & I really like that they are super bright led's. Efficient on power consumption & it packs punch on faking out someone outside your house, because it looks so real from outside.My only con is I wish there was a option for random power on the unit itself or to have a different option from the 4+ hr or 7+ hr option..like maybe 2+, 4+, 6+, 8+ options. The way around this is to leave the unit power on & just have a separate outlet timer.Only other thing is wish it was a little cheaper, but someone has to make money off of it & power to them. I still wish I would've gotten 2 of them (one in my living room & put the other in a bedroom) eventually I will I'm sure. I'm using it in conjunction with my lamp in my kitchen that's on a random timer to deter people...I travel a lot for my job, and don't really have many valuables in my house because I put all my money towards a 15 year house loan, but I rather try and have a little peace of mind (lol I have a house alarm also, but I'm not going to pay for the monitoring when I have neighbors around me that are home most of the time). Sorry I ramble..hope the review helps a little.

Reviews.Title: small but big on delivery
Reviews.Author: roland
Reviews.Content: The fakeTV-10 is small but it does the job very well. Whether you have a one floor or two floor house the fakeTV looks like the TV is on the way it throws shadows on the curtains. I'm very satisfied with it and would recommend it to my friends. I set mine on a timer.

Reviews.Title: Fake TV
Reviews.Author: Roxanne
Reviews.Content: I ordered this product and knew immediately, I would order another one. It looks exactly like people are watching television as you look from outside to in. Its amazing also much easier to operate than lamp timers, you will get a kick out of your FakeTV I do. It  definitely does what its suppose to do.FakeTV FTV-10 Burglar Deterrent

Reviews.Title: Great item
Reviews.Author: Sunshine
Reviews.Content: I am impressed. I plug it in and went outside after dark to check it out and it does, indeed, look like there is a TV on in the room. I think it would be a good idea to have more than one if you have an upstairs and a downstairs. I was appreciative of the other customer reviews before I purchased the fake TV.

Reviews.Title: I love this!
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth
Reviews.Content: Our home is a three story brownstone that backs onto an inner-city alley.  We placed the FakeTV on the second floor rear which usually appears dark to people passing by.  With the TV light on it definitely looks like someone is home watching TV from bed. The FakeTV itself is perfect: totally simple to operate (set the timer and plug it in!), small and unobtrusive during the day, and inexpensive.  We are going to buy another one to use in the front of the house when we're away.

Reviews.Title: great device
Reviews.Author: Ruth A. Mirbach
Reviews.Content: device works very well.  I was so happy with it that I purchased one for my daughter.  Feel much better about leaving the house.

Reviews.Title: the Great Fake!
Reviews.Author: jmbubble
Reviews.Content: This little thing is SO cool!  We used it for the first time last week when we went out of town for a long weekend.  We were leaving at night so we were able to check out the fake tv before we took off.  It really looked like someone was up in our room (which is located on the 2nd floor in the front of the house) watching tv. I have already recommended this item to my family and friends.

Reviews.Title: Nice product!!
Reviews.Author: N. Kearnes
Reviews.Content: The TV burglar deterrent light works just great.  When it's dark outside, it really looks like a TV running from the outside of the windows of the room it's in.  The LED lights are nice and bright and the effect of the lights is random.  It has several settings so it can go on at dusk and stay on for either 4 or 7 hours.  Great for the difference in winter and summer hours of darkness.  Or you can just leave it on too.  When we're away for any length of time, it gives more peace of mind to know that we have some deterrent against anyone who would want to burglarize the house, even if it is fake.  Much better than lights on timers just going on and off. It makes it look like there's someone there watching television.  Good product!!

Reviews.Title: Great idea
Reviews.Author: Richard Forlano
Reviews.Content: It really works.  This is much better than just leaving a light on..  It looks like someone is inside with the TV on.

Reviews.Title: Works as advertised
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: So far so good-this little gadget works great--at night it looks (from the street) like someone is watching TV inside the house. If it will last a year it is worth more than I paid for it. I believe it will be a big deterrent to someone that might be considering breaking into a home.

Reviews.Title: good idea and product but larger might be better
Reviews.Author: Y. FEI "BookReview by Frank F."
Reviews.Content: i bought it because I can put it on 2nd floor during my vacation. After receiving it, I plugged in and tried how it works. If it's 20~30% larger, the overall effect will be better. It's kind too small now and hard to generate the real TV effect. Overall, I like this product and will use it in the future.
