Reviews.Title: Fake TV rocks!!!
Reviews.Author: lizzie
Reviews.Content: I really like this fake tv. Not only is it a burglar deterrent, but leave it plugged in and never again come home to a totally dark house after the sun has set. Living in a one-story home, I've got it set up on a bar between the kitchen and family room and have it angled so that in reflecting against the walls it also reflects out of the little half circle windows (above the main windows) in both my kitchen (facing the front of the house) and also the large family room window......so it would be impossible for a potential intruder to miss the illusion of someone being at home with the tube on. An added (huge) plus is that all you have to do is plug the thing in and as long as it's dusk or darker, it works!! WIll it actually deter a burglar? Who knows for sure, but I suspect that it most definitely will given the authentic looking lighting it throws off. To my mind, it's a fantastic safety prevention feature & a great bargain at only $35.....an added element to peace of mind in this day of rising crime rates.....

Reviews.Title: Good Addition to Alarm System
Reviews.Author: Dalausitas
Reviews.Content: Were someone to truly study my routine, they would know I watch TV every night, so it's nice to have the Fake TV fill in for me when I'm out of town.

Reviews.Title: Better than a dog
Reviews.Author: Jan1809
Reviews.Content: On a whim I bought the Fake TV and first used it when I left town for Thanksgiving weekend.  My neighbors called to tell me I had left a tv on; my next door neighbor also left town and unfortunately his house was broken into. I truly believe the Fake TV saved me from being robbed. I have since purchased a second unit and will use two, set for different on-off times. A great product that I believe has already paid for itself.

Reviews.Title: Burglar Deterrent
Reviews.Author: Customer
Reviews.Content: This little gizmo works and does what its suppose to do. I'll be purchasing two more as gifts. Very easy to set up. I purchased this item at Amazon.com...no hassle.

Reviews.Title: WORKS AS ADVERTISED !
Reviews.Author: dedapr
Reviews.Content: When I opened the box I was skeptical because this light was so tiny. It's smaller than a deck of playing cards. But to my surprise it produces very bright light and the light sensor to turn it on works just as it should. I recomend this product.

Reviews.Title: Burglar Protection
Reviews.Author: User
Reviews.Content: Awesome product, cheap and IMHO very effective. Works as described, easy to set up. Highly recommended device. Has two time settings.

Reviews.Title: Works Great!!!
Reviews.Author: V. Ford "Mommy of Lil Men"
Reviews.Content: It's a bit small but I think that's good because if it was BIG then it could be seen easily through your blinds.  It's really cool and even turns it self on and off.  Shipped Fast.

Reviews.Title: Does what it says.
Reviews.Author: Judith "judy"
Reviews.Content: I keep playing with positioning, but I am impressed with it's ability to mimic the light a TV throws off. Although my husband and neighbors were skeptical, they were impressed as we stood on the street in the dark and judged the appearance.  I have put it on a regular timer so it goes on and off periodically. I would definately recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: good product
Reviews.Author: DAD
Reviews.Content: This product works well and does everything they promise.  Maybe it's a little too expensive but it does the job.  Noting else like it on the market.

Reviews.Title: Great Idea!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "good daughter"
Reviews.Content: Our friends recommended this and we are glad we listened!!  Will be getting a couple more in the future!  We've used it twice now when out of town and are going to get one for our vacation home too.

Reviews.Title: not nervous
Reviews.Author: stu
Reviews.Content: The unit works well with my timer, and provides that lived in look when i am not home.  Great idea.

Reviews.Title: Nice little unit!
Reviews.Author: April Brown "vpilady"
Reviews.Content: From the picture, I was expcting a little bigger unit, but as small as it is- it still does the job just fine!

Reviews.Title: This will fool them...Guaranteed!!!
Reviews.Author: Retired Army Ranger
Reviews.Content: Your local Chief of Police, college dean, professional burglars or scumbag crackheads will not be able to tell if the television light in the window is real or not. This product works GREAT!!!  Installation is so easy, a six year old child can set it up to run that night.Security alarms are great, but they don't stop the smash and grab dirtbags from doing their two minute work day. But if they think you're home, they'll move on and hit your neighbor down the road on Sunday night while they are in church. Spend the 35 bucks, you won't be sorry.

Reviews.Title: FakeTV Burglar Deterrent
Reviews.Author: DONALD M.
Reviews.Content: WORKS GREAT I LOVE IT USE IT WHEN I GO AWAY. I HAD SAW MY NEIGHBOR HAD ONE USES IT ALL THE TIME LOOKS LIKE TV IS ALL THE TIME ON WORKS VERY WELL.

Reviews.Title: TV
Reviews.Author: steve
Reviews.Content: This little box lights up the room. It looks better then I thought it was going too. A must for people who are away from home alot. More real then having a light on a timer

Reviews.Title: Great product!
Reviews.Author: Richard Cheney
Reviews.Content: Works just as good as they said. As long as you can't see it directly, it looks like a real tv.

Reviews.Title: Appreciate the extra security
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "HT"
Reviews.Content: We really appreciate the extra security that this provides our cabin.  We were so amazed by how this approximates a TV that we bought a second one for our home and another for my parents for their Christmas gift.  The fact that it's LED-based so it uses minimal electricity was a selling point as well.  Hopefully the appearance of someone being at home causes any potential burglars to move on to the next home.

Reviews.Title: It Mimics a TV Well
Reviews.Author: Joseph P. Steele "Joeiron"
Reviews.Content: This is a good product for imitating a TV while you're gone.  It's quite bright, so even if you have a big-screen TV it will do well.

Reviews.Title: To Fool Potential Burglars
Reviews.Author: Piano Student "csharp"
Reviews.Content: FakeTV is tiny, about the size of a tangerine, but it can fool a burglar into thinking you're home when you're not.  Proper location is important.The best location is a second floor room well above the street or driveway.  This room should have light colored walls and ceiling and one or more curtainless windows facing the street or driveway.  Place the FakeTV near these windows but point the LEDs away from the windows, shining on the walls and ceiling. The effect is quite convincing, like someone watching TV in a bedroom.The second best location is on the ground floor.  Here the windows need curtains or blinds such that some light comes through but the burglar can't identify anything inside.  Place the FakeTV to shine on the windows facing the street. The effect is not nearly as good as on the upper floor but still workable.My house in in a rural area with no ambient lighting.  I don't know how FakeTV would work in a urban location with street lights.You can use the device's built in timers (4 or 7 hours after dark) or plug it into your own timer for greater flexibility.I highly recommend FakeTV as an economical device to add to your arsenal of burglar deterrents.

Reviews.Title: Excellent item!
Reviews.Author: Leith Tussing "I like tacos."
Reviews.Content: You open the box and look at it and think "this is it?"  However once you set it up and turn it on it's amazing how realistic it is in terms of emulating a TV being on.  I've tinted the windows in my house but this item is bright enough when placed near the window that it is still visible from outside.Placement is important.  You want to put the item near enough to your window that it shines out but not too close as to be able to actually see the device itself.

Reviews.Title: Fake TV is the cheapest and best burglar deterent ever.
Reviews.Author: Ed Hendrickson Jr. "ace"
Reviews.Content: I own two of these, in two locations, they both work great!  They look exactly like someone is up late watching TV (while we sleep). I put it in a room were the window is elevated slightly and away from any street lights, then open the mini-blinds just ever so slightly and pointed up and it looks exactly like a TV is on.  I love it, because it uses 1/200th what a real TV would use for energy.  [...]Energy: I tested a Fake TV on my kill-a-watt meter P3 International P4400 Kill A Watt Electricity Usage Monitor. In standby mode it registers zero watts, and my Fake TV uses only 1 watt when on, you can't get much lower than 1 watt!  I leave mine set to 7 hours after dusk so it probably uses 9 or 10 watts a day.  10 watts a day for 100 days = 1 Kilowatt, or about 3 KWH per year. At 15 cents per KWH that is only 45 cents per year to run.  [...]Highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Works! Sorta
Reviews.Author: Eugene S. Tiffany
Reviews.Content: Amazingly realistic TV lighting effect. VERY impressive. Would fool anyone. BEST to have it shining on a white gauze curtain from an angle so the unit is not visible from outside.  The auto on function at dark does not work on my unit. BUT I just leave it running all the time. The LED lights use little power.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Product
Reviews.Author: CSR
Reviews.Content: This Fake TV looks very authentic and realistic.  It's tiny and unobtrusive, easy to use, and I believe it would be an effective deterrent to any would-be intruder, as it really looks like someone is watching TV (just be sure to place it in a location where the device itself can't be seen from the outside, as that would obviously defeat the purpose).  It has a timer device which you can adjust to the setting you prefer.  One other point is that this device is only effective when it's dark outside.  Since many break-ins occur during the day when people are at work, you should consider getting Rex (the barking dog motion sensor) and/or the home sounds CD for daytime use.

Reviews.Title: Just Like It Says
Reviews.Author: S. Schmidt
Reviews.Content: This is a very cool item. We set it in an upstairs window and sure enough, from the street, the lights flash, flicker and vary in brightness and it looks just like the lights from a TV set. I watched for quite a while and did not see a pattern develop. Excellent item, great for an added security measure to safeguard your home while you are away.

Reviews.Title: GREAT PRODUCT
Reviews.Author: LEE
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with my fake tv.It gives me another burglar deterrent.It is easy to operate.No set up involved.

Reviews.Title: Vacation
Reviews.Author: Debbywoodstock
Reviews.Content: We installed this product, and all of our neighbors as well as oursleves couldn't tell the difference between our daughters tv flashing or the fake tv! So when we went on vacation, not only did timed lamps go on and off so did the most watched "tv". we would reccomend this product to anyone who vacations often.

Reviews.Title: Looks like the REAL thing
Reviews.Author: LD "Kneighthawke"
Reviews.Content: First of all do not worry about the size, they may fit in the palm of your hand, but when viewed outside in a darkened room they look like a real TV, EVEN through mini-blinds and curtains.I do not recommend using the two options of "Dusk +4 (hours)" or "Dusk +7 (hours)" because if there is a dark thunder storm like we had here the other day they would have come on and gone off before they were need.  Just put it to the "ON" all the time setting.  These are LEDs and the do not use much electricity and stay cool so not worries about lights over heating.I got two as recommended, one for the livingroom and one for the bedroom.  They arrived during the day so I could not test them.  When it was dark they looked great from the outside, even through mini-blinds and curtains (I have both on my windows).  They flickered just like a real television you wouldn't know it wasn't a real TV.They may seem expensive but for that little extra idea of "someone is home" at night look you can't beat it.  Well worth it.

Reviews.Title: Good item
Reviews.Author: RR1008
Reviews.Content: We bought this to use while we were out of town for a week long trip. It's very easy to use. It's smaller than I thought it'd be, but it worked well. I wish it was a little bit brighter, but overall, happy with it and would recommend.

Reviews.Title: Small but effective
Reviews.Author: Grigori
Reviews.Content: I was surprised how small the item is, but it does create the effect of a large TV at night. I should have purchased two or three units, but price went up since I purchased it for $23, so I 'm gong to hold on getting more.

Reviews.Title: Cheaply made, didn't work for even one day
Reviews.Author: C. Roberts
Reviews.Content: Unit failed the second time I turned it on.  LED's lit dimly for a moment, then would not work at all.  Very disappointed.

Reviews.Title: overpriced LED night light
Reviews.Author: JJB "JB"
Reviews.Content: This device is simply an overpriced LED night light with sensor and casts a pretty weak light over all.  Not at all comparable to an HDTV.  I think the manufacturers must have flooded Amazon with bogus reviews.  You can buy something similar for much less. Try for instance plugging in 2 or 3 Megabrite LED color changing lights, a 4 pack is less than half the price of the Fake Tv, http://www.amazon.com/Megabrite-Changing-Lights-Sensor-4-Pack/dp/B0041VG3T6/ref=sr_1_1?s=hi&ie;=UTF8&qid;=1309099240&sr;=1-1

Reviews.Title: Is that all it is?
Reviews.Author: Izzy Brody
Reviews.Content: OK, this thing does exactly what it promises to do.  It does light up the room so that from the outside it looks like someone is watching TV.  You have to be clever about positioning it just right...and you need to have the right kind of blinds/drapes so that the light is reflected well.  It is a very small, plasticy, light-weight contraption...kind of like a kid's toy and the light is not very powerful.  So, it lives up to its claims, but is disappointing in overall quality.

Reviews.Title: fake tv
Reviews.Author: sammy
Reviews.Content: Cheap made!!!The unit failed to shut off after one day.It doesn't really give off alot of light. More like a toy ...over priced should be made better for the price they charge.

Reviews.Title: Doesn't work well.
Reviews.Author: patm
Reviews.Content: I can't for the life of me understand what everyone likes about this product. I purchased it because of the great reviews.  Well, I have tried it on numerous occasions and it doesn't work well at all.  From inside the house it looks like a tv flickering, but from outside you cannot even see that there is a light on in the room.  I have tried it in four different areas of the room (on the floor, on a table, on one end or a room and then on another end). I have left the blinds open enough to allow light to show.  It has become the joke with my family every time I put it on and try to get it to work right.  I feel ripped off. I paid over $30 with shipping for this useless gadget!

Reviews.Title: It Works
Reviews.Author: S. Meurer
Reviews.Content: Looks just like a tv is on from the outside.  Using it in my empty for sale house.. Good deterrent

Reviews.Title: Inexpensive way to protect your home.
Reviews.Author: becky mccormick
Reviews.Content: We were shocked at how easy it was to set up. Standing outside it looks just like the TV does at night and having a timer is great.

Reviews.Title: Good buy
Reviews.Author: VCB "VCB"
Reviews.Content: Works nicely. Could be a bit brighter for a larger room but does exactly what it says. I put it on a timer for more flexibility

Reviews.Title: Useful
Reviews.Author: Charles Ibis
Reviews.Content: The flashing lights create a good impression that a TV is on when viewed from outside. I wish there was an option for sound.

Reviews.Title: what a great idea
Reviews.Author: M. Kiburtz
Reviews.Content: Works just fine and is just the right brightness to give the right illusion.  I combine this with programmed lights.  Thibkibg of buying a second one for another floor.

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: Sandra Clark
Reviews.Content: I used it for six days while I was gone did not get any calls that any body my place

Reviews.Title: Great burglar deterrent.
Reviews.Author: Mark Randall
Reviews.Content: This is one of the best ideas I have seen in a long time for anyone who has to leave their home unattended for any length of time. The intensity of the lights flickering are totally random and give the elusion of someone at home watching TV at night. It has its own self time and can also be hook up to the standard electrical time for more precise control. Highly recommended!

Reviews.Title: A Fake TV a day keeps the nosey people  away...
Reviews.Author: HouseLover "Mz. House Head"
Reviews.Content: Someone told me guy came by my house while I was away. They saw that my "TV" was on so they walked away. They told my neighbor that I would not open the door.Who knows if why they were coming onto my property.It works like a charm....

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: The light from this tiny little thing looks from the outside JUST like a TV running only it uses DC voltage off the supplied transformer so doesn't use anything like the electricity, and is easy to make inconspicuous in the room. Plus it has several timing options for when it starts and stops so as to confuse anyone looking for a timer. Nice product.

Reviews.Title: Works Great
Reviews.Author: Dickens
Reviews.Content: We wanted something besides lamp timers to help show that our home is occupied when we are away. This seems to be the perfect tool. When viewed from outside, it shows a "flickering" light similar to what a TV would show.

Reviews.Title: Worth every penny and then some
Reviews.Author: 7SFCW4 "rfc2307"
Reviews.Content: This is a really excellent product. I've been looking for something like this for years.  It arrived, smaller than I thought but well sorted out and functional.  Control are intuitive, well organized.  Without reading the instructions, I had it set up in less than five minutes.  With the curtains pulled, from the outside, it is frankly, un-believably true to life, you can't tell that it is NOT a television in the room.  I have recommended it to many friends, and they have all had the same positive reaction.

Reviews.Title: FakeTV Works
Reviews.Author: ftamemphis
Reviews.Content: We put the FakeTV in the bedroom. It is bright enough to be seen from the street. Stays on for four hours, as designed to do.

Reviews.Title: One small problem
Reviews.Author: L. Lionnet
Reviews.Content: We didn't figure anyone would be able to see through our wooden blinds, but you can actually peek in where the strings run through the boards and see the FakeTV. We weren't planning on getting curtains, but now they seem necessary. And that would appear to defeat the purpose of the device.

Reviews.Title: Did what it says it does!
Reviews.Author: R. Meade
Reviews.Content: We went on vacation and used this nifty gadget facing our vwindow.  Instead of the timer functions on this unit, we plugged it into a wall timer.  Works great!

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: mmjzig
Reviews.Content: This s exactly want I need for security when I'm gone.  It looks so real it fooled me. A must have

Reviews.Title: Fake TV
Reviews.Author: Nick M. Atalla
Reviews.Content: I think this is a great product but overpriced. I would give a higher rating if not for the product price.

Reviews.Title: Fake TV Rocks
Reviews.Author: Dr. Bob
Reviews.Content: Works as advertised. What a great idea!  Instructions could have been a little better, but it works. Here are some more words.

Reviews.Title: Very cool little device
Reviews.Author: kirk303
Reviews.Content: Is sounds a little goofy, but makes perfect sense.  We have a week-end home we set this up in, and sure enough, it looks like someone's watching TV.  Simple and effective, what more could you ask for?

Reviews.Title: Fabulous Device!
Reviews.Author: Kyle Toffey
Reviews.Content: Fabulous Device!Very happy with the device, its features, ease-of-use.  It is fantastic to get such a useful product so easily over the Internet.Good Job!

Reviews.Title: Very clever gadget
Reviews.Author: AZ dog Mom 2
Reviews.Content: My husband is the one who likes all this kind of stuff, and this works very well is very realistic that he is going to order another one for the 5th wheel. I love it and would recommend it highly.

Reviews.Title: Really works well
Reviews.Author: Cindee Cindee "Cutie Petuty"
Reviews.Content: It really does look like your tv is on.  What a smart idea.I really like it a lot..

Reviews.Title: People really think your home watching TV
Reviews.Author: Redemtious
Reviews.Content: I like the option that you can have it come on for 4 or 7 hours after the sun goes down. My neighbors thought I was home watching TV.

Reviews.Title: Fake T.V.
Reviews.Author: J. Disebastian
Reviews.Content: This is awesome. It's so cool.  It really looks like someone is watching t.v. inside.  I'm telling everyone to get one.

Reviews.Title: Didn't Work
Reviews.Author: cchernock
Reviews.Content: Opened up the box, plugged it in and turned it on....nothing happened. It was 'dead' from the start. Amazon did a nice job on the quick return with no hassles. I think i just got a lemon and may order again.

Reviews.Title: Fake TV doesnt work.
Reviews.Author: volboy81
Reviews.Content: I got the FAKE TV and have sent it back. (Still waiting on the refund....) It worked fine if you set it to the "ON" position, but if you set it for the "DUSK PLUS 4 HOURS" or "DUSK PLUS 7 HOURS" it wouldnt come on automatically. I tried it under every condition I could think of over and over and it would NEVER work! I wouldnt recommend buying this product.

Reviews.Title: Not worth the money
Reviews.Author: Michelle A Holtzman
Reviews.Content: Only one out of 2 I ordered worked. It is OK I guess, but not sure I would trust it when I leave home.

Reviews.Title: Design Flaw
Reviews.Author: Corporal
Reviews.Content: I would have given this product five stars, but it has a design flaw.  It has a switch with these settings: OFF, Dusk + 4 Hrs., Dusk + 7 Hrs., and ON.  The ON and OFF settings work as you would expect.  The Dusk + 4, turns the device on at dusk and off in 4 hours.  The Dusk + 7 turns it on at dusk and off 7 hours later.  So if dusk is at 6:30 PM, the Fake TV will shut itself off at 10:30 PM or at 1:30 AM.  So at 2:00 AM when the burglar arrives, the device has already turned itself off.  The workaround is to waste some electricity and leave the device on 24 hours a day.  I would recommend that Fake TV get rid of the two "Dusk +" settings and turn the device on at dusk and off at dawn.

Reviews.Title: Great Product - Lusy Vendor
Reviews.Author: J. Nagle "Olde Pharte"
Reviews.Content: This product is amazing!  The effect is great.  I would highly recommend it.  the reason I give it a one star is the vendor (3ybird) was awful!  The unit I received worked when it was on all the time, but the timer did not.  I called Amazon and the tech had me try a few things, but it still did not work.  He said it was definitely defective and to email the vendor, which I did.  the response I got said they would give me a $5 credit.  Now why would anyone want to pay $26 for a defective product? ! ! !  I contacted Amazons A-Z Satisfaction and they gave me a complete refund.  The product gets a 5+, Amazon gets a 5+ the vendor gets a 0-

Reviews.Title: Looks Like A Great Idea But.....
Reviews.Author: Rude Boy 1979 "Ralph"
Reviews.Content: This looks like a great idea, I'll be getting one, but has anyone else thought of that All In The Family episode where Archie got the fake guard dog machine? It would bark when it sensed something and it turned on for Archie but the burglars knew about it already and ignored it, lol.

Reviews.Title: waste of money
Reviews.Author: C. Glenn
Reviews.Content: I've heard about these fake TV's to deter burglars. I liked the idea and thought I'd try it. I even gave one as a gift at Christmas, which I think I regret. The idea is perfect-all the lights and "movements" a TV gives off, but with less power and you don't have to hook your TV up to a timer. I was under the impression that it comes on at dusk and stays on for either 4 or 7 hours, depending on the setting you choose. We used this once when we were out of town. I believe that it came on about midnight and then stayed on all night. I believe this because we left it plugged in after we returned home and I found it on in the middle of the night and then still on at 7 am! I think this would only make a burglar more curious as to why someone at our house watches TV from midnight until 7 am. Needless to say, I am not pleased with this product as an out-of-town deterrent. You have the option of just turning it on, so I may just use it as an out-to-dinner deterrent. But I can just leave the TV on for that.

Reviews.Title: It works great
Reviews.Author: Samuel Dachs
Reviews.Content: I bought the this item and it works fine---but unfortunately, there was nothing to watch, nothing at least worth my while.I said to my wife, technology is great, but content is really the most important thing, and this item proves it.It works just like it should but the programming needs improvement.

Reviews.Title: erratic
Reviews.Author: Ronald Parker
Reviews.Content: Does NOT function as advertised  - shuts off early or stays on hours after dawn on the auto setting

Reviews.Title: VERY SMALL AND NOT BRIGHT
Reviews.Author: A. Bear
Reviews.Content: I was very excited to receive this and use it at my moms house when she was out of town but it is not bright enough to show any color or motion through the windows and the "screen" is smaller than my palm.  It was fun to watch the colors move around when it is right in front of you but as far as a deterrent of any kind, it sucks.

Reviews.Title: Should not have bought this
Reviews.Author: Y. Schroeder
Reviews.Content: Never worked past the first test out of the box. Can't figure what I'm doing wrong. Anyway, it's now decorating my storage closet.

Reviews.Title: Piece of crap
Reviews.Author: Barbara Pennington
Reviews.Content: do not like it, the add made it sound wonderful; what a cheap product with an expensive price!  hATE IT

Reviews.Title: Not a good decoy
Reviews.Author: RoboSpy
Reviews.Content: I bought the FakeTV to confound burglars, but when they broke in to my house, they weren't fooled. They saw through my ruse, and stole my real TV instead of the fake one. Drat!

Reviews.Title: FakeTV FTV-10 Burglar Deterrent
Reviews.Author: Gregory Chervanyov
Reviews.Content: But I recommend it but for 10 $ More it does not coast  Not poor toy, does not only cost such money!

Reviews.Title: NOT SO EFFECTIVE
Reviews.Author: Raven
Reviews.Content: I went on vacation after i purchased this product after reading all the reviews on how awesome it was. I was only gone for the weekend. When I got home I found my back door ajar. Someone had broken into my home and stolen my FakeTV. I looked around to see if there was anything else taken and there wasn't. I found a note in the kitchen next to my back door that read " Thanks for the FAke TV, as a burglar it is nice to know that I can leave my home to go break into other homes and make it seem like someone is home to stop others from breaking into my home while i'm out breaking into their home." The thief also crapped on my rug. I will not be recommending this to friends.

Reviews.Title: Gee Whiz, Thanks !
Reviews.Author: Your average idiot
Reviews.Content: Thank you for this opportunity to tell everyone I have an anti-burglar device that is a fake.  What's more, that I may be linked to an unknown database, like the one the federal govt promises they will never maintain - when they ask me to register my firearms.  To wit, "FROM MY COLD DEAD HANDS"
